sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Diginex (NASDAQ:DGNX) Trading Down 7.1% - Here's Why
feed.summary: Diginex (NASDAQ:DGNX) shares fell 7.1% in midday trading to $2.86 on light volume, trading significantly below its 50-day and 200-day moving averages. Analyst sentiment remains negative, with a consensus "Sell" rating. Despite the stock's weakness, several hedge funds and institutional investors began or increased small positions in Q3.

feed.title: Bitwise’s Solana ETF BSOL reaches $500M AUM milestone
feed.summary: Bitwise's Solana Staking ETF (BSOL) has quickly reached $500 million in assets under management (AUM) within 18 days of trading, making it the largest Solana ETP in the U.S. This rapid growth, despite ongoing selling pressure on SOL, demonstrates strong investor confidence in the Solana ecosystem. BSOL offers a 6.47% annualized yield by staking through Helius Labs and has zero fees for its first three months or until it reaches $1 billion in AUM.

feed.title: HIVE Digital Technologies Expands into Paraguay, Launching One of the First Purpose-Built AI BUZZ Cloud Platforms in the Country
feed.summary: HIVE Digital Technologies Ltd. is expanding its operations into Paraguay through a joint venture with a leading telecommunications operator, launching one of the country's first purpose-built AI BUZZ Cloud platforms. This platform, located in Asunción and hosted in a Tier III data center, will provide high-performance computing and AI infrastructure to serve various sectors across South America. The expansion leverages HIVE's existing digital infrastructure and Paraguay's renewable hydroelectric power, positioning the country for long-term participation in the AI and high-performance computing landscape.

feed.title: CleanSpark’s Future Bright: Strategic Shifts Dominate Market
feed.summary: CleanSpark Inc. (NASDAQ: CLSK) stock has risen by 3.19% following a strong quarterly earnings report and strategic shifts towards high-performance computing, particularly in AI infrastructure. Analysts have set price targets as high as $27, recognizing the firm's operational effectiveness, exemplified by a 45.6% gross margin and 10% growth in Bitcoin production. This transition, alongside its energy capabilities, positions CleanSpark as a notable player in the competitive AI landscape.

feed.title: Riot Platforms (RIOT) Valuation Check As Bitcoin Sales Fund AI Data Center Expansion
feed.summary: Riot Platforms (RIOT) is transitioning towards AI-focused data centers, funding this expansion with the sale of 1,818 Bitcoin for approximately $161.6 million. Despite recent share price fluctuations, the company is seen as undervalued with a fair value of $26.44 per share by some narratives, though its current P/E ratio is higher than industry averages. The investment future hinges on the success of its AI data center projects and Bitcoin price stability.

feed.title: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ:DVLT) Announces a Distribution Date of February 21, 2026 for Warrants to Purchase Common Stock to Eligible Record Equityholders of Datavault AI
feed.summary: Datavault AI Inc. has set February 21, 2026, as the distribution date for warrants to purchase its common stock to eligible record equity holders. The distribution will be made on the basis of one warrant for every sixty shares held, with each warrant entitling the holder to purchase one share at an exercise price of $5.00, conditioned on holding a Dream Bowl Meme Coin II token. The company plans to file a prospectus supplement with the SEC regarding the sale of shares underlying the warrants.

feed.title: Western Union (WU) Target Lifted at Keefe Bruyette in Payments Sector Update
feed.summary: Keefe Bruyette raised its price target on Western Union (WU) to $10 from $9, maintaining a Market Perform rating, as part of a broader update in the consumer finance and payments sector. The company is actively pursuing a digital transformation, expanding its travel money business, and exploring stablecoin technology, including plans to launch a USDPT on Solana in the first half of 2026. This initiative aims to broaden money movement across its network and enhance treasury flexibility.

feed.title: Bakkt to Acquire Distributed Technologies Research in Stock-Based Transaction
feed.summary: Bakkt (BKKT) has announced its intention to acquire Distributed Technologies Research (DTR), the parent company of Apex Crypto, through a stock-based transaction. This acquisition aims to enhance Bakkt's crypto trading capabilities and expand its product offerings. The deal is expected to close in the first half of 2023, subject to regulatory approvals.

feed.title: Datavault AI Celebrates Successful Completion of Dream Bowl XIV, Pioneering Blockchain Innovation in Sports Entertainment
feed.summary: Datavault AI Inc. announced the successful conclusion of Dream Bowl XIV, held at AT&T Stadium, integrating blockchain technology for tokenized autographs and enhanced fan engagement. The event featured 70 NFL draft prospects and leveraged Datavault AI's platforms for real-time analytics and secure asset tokenization, including meme coin distribution for exclusive merchandise lotteries. This pioneering effort aims to set a new standard for fan engagement and revolutionize sports entertainment through AI and Web 3.0 solutions.

feed.title: Endeavor blockchain buys Mawson infrastructure (MIGI) shares
feed.summary: Endeavor Blockchain, a ten-percent owner of Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc. (NASDAQ:MIGI), recently acquired 195,000 shares of MIGI stock for a total of $917,550. These purchases occurred between December 26, 2025, and January 7, 2026, with prices ranging from $4.33 to $4.60 per share. Despite the company's "weak" financial health and a significant revenue decline, the stock is considered undervalued by InvestingPro, and the insider buying suggests potential stabilization, with MIGI regaining Nasdaq compliance after a reverse stock split.

feed.title: How Simplify Bitcoin Strategy Plus Income Etf (MAXI) Affects Rotational Strategy Timing
feed.summary: This article analyzes the Simplify Bitcoin Strategy Plus Income ETF (MAXI) and its impact on rotational strategy timing. It highlights conflicting sentiment across different time horizons, suggesting choppy market conditions. The analysis includes a strong risk-reward setup, institutional trading strategies (position, momentum breakout, risk hedging), and multi-timeframe signal analysis for MAXI.

feed.title: TBH: Takeaways From Recent Virtual Meeting With Management
feed.summary: Brag House (NASDAQ: TBH) management is optimistic about its pending merger with House of Doge, the official corporate arm of the Dogecoin Foundation. The proposed reverse takeover aims to advance Dogecoin as a decentralized global currency and expand TBH's target market beyond Gen Z gamers to include Dogecoin users by leveraging its community-building expertise and data insights. The combined entity expects to generate diversified revenue through digital payments, asset management, real-world asset tokenization, and digital media.

feed.title: Sharps Technology Launches Solana Validator With Coinbase
feed.summary: Sharps Technology has partnered with Coinbase Institutional to launch an institutional-grade Solana validator, marking a significant shift in its digital asset strategy from passive token holding to active network participation. Coinbase Institutional will manage the technical operations and security of the STSS Validator, allowing Sharps to contribute to Solana's decentralization and security while earning staking rewards. This move highlights a growing trend among public companies to actively engage with blockchain infrastructure beyond just treasury diversification.

feed.title: ALT5 Sigma Corp SEC 10-Q Report
feed.summary: ALT5 Sigma Corp has released its latest 10-Q report, showcasing significant financial growth and strategic expansion in its fintech operations. The company reported a substantial increase in revenue and a turnaround to net income, largely due to unrealized gains on cryptocurrency assets. This growth is attributed to strategic acquisitions like ALT5 Sigma, Inc. and Mswipe, and a focused shift away from its discontinued biotechnology segment.

feed.title: Sharps Technology Partners With Coinbase To launch Solana Validator Node
feed.summary: Sharps Technology (Nasdaq: STSS), a medical device firm, is partnering with Coinbase to launch a Solana validator node. This strategic move involves dedicating a portion of Sharps' 2 million SOL token treasury to the validator, making it one of the first U.S.-listed firms to actively participate in Solana's network infrastructure beyond simply holding the cryptocurrency. This initiative aims to generate recurring revenue through staking rewards, aligning Sharps with other digital asset treasury firms that are establishing validator operations.

feed.title: Wellgistics Health Adds Quantum Key Encryption to PharmacyChain(TM) AI-Enabled Blockchain Smart Contract Partnership with DataVault AI
feed.summary: Wellgistics Health Inc. has strengthened its PharmacyChain™ platform by integrating Quantum Key Encryption through a partnership with DataVault AI. This collaboration aims to enhance data security and integrity within the $634 billion prescription drug market, leveraging AI-enabled blockchain smart contracts to address inefficiencies, fraud, and payment delays. The companies have completed their feasibility assessment and set key milestones for pilot deployment by the end of 2026, including selecting blockchain platforms, establishing HIPAA-compliant data transfers, and launching a pilot program with an early adopter pharmacy.

feed.title: BitMine adds 24,000 ether, but warns accumulation may slow without shareholder approval
feed.summary: BitMine (BMNR) announced the acquisition of 24,000 Ethereum. However, the company cautioned that the rate of future accumulation could decrease if shareholder approval is not secured.

feed.title: Datavault AI to Participate in ICR Conference 2026; CEO Nathaniel Bradley to Present Real-World Asset Tokenization (RWA) Today
feed.summary: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ:DVLT) announced that CEO Nathaniel Bradley will participate in the ICR Conference 2026 in Orlando, Florida, presenting on Real-World Asset (RWA) tokenization. The presentation, scheduled for January 12, 2026, aims to provide an overview of the company's strategy and market positioning in RWA. Datavault AI, a leader in AI-driven data solutions, is leveraging this opportunity to engage with institutional investors and communicate its long-term growth initiatives.

feed.title: Solana’s Institutional Awakening: How Coinbase’s Regulated Futures Transformed SOL into a Global Asset Class
feed.summary: The article discusses how Coinbase's introduction of regulated Solana futures in 2025 significantly transformed SOL into a legitimate institutional asset class. This move brought regulatory certainty, liquidity, and 24/7 trading, leading to a surge in institutional interest, a more stable market for SOL, and predictions for a Spot Solana ETF. The community and ecosystem have embraced this institutionalization, with technical advancements and traditional financial giants validating Solana's status.

feed.title: Portnoy Law Firm Announces Class Action on Behalf of DeFi Technologies, Inc. Investors
feed.summary: The Portnoy Law Firm has announced a class action lawsuit against DeFi Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: DEFT) on behalf of investors who purchased securities between May 12, 2025, and November 14, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that DeFi Technologies made false and misleading statements regarding delays in its DeFi arbitrage strategy, understated competition, and was unlikely to meet revenue guidance for fiscal year 2025. Investors have until January 30, 2026, to file a lead plaintiff motion.

feed.title: Wellgistics Health Adds Quantum Key Encryption to PharmacyChain(TM) AI-Enabled Blockchain Smart Contract Partnership with DataVault AI
feed.summary: Wellgistics Health, Inc. has integrated Quantum Key Encryption into its PharmacyChain™ AI-enabled blockchain smart contract platform through a partnership with DataVault AI. This enhancement aims to secure pharmaceutical data against future quantum computing threats and improve data-driven outcomes in the prescription drug market. The companies have completed feasibility assessments and set key milestones for pilot deployment by year-end 2026, focusing on increasing transparency, efficiency, and fraud prevention in the $634 billion U.S. prescription drug market.

feed.title: Fintech deal folds stablecoin tech into a global payments platform
feed.summary: Bakkt (NYSE: BKKT) has announced its agreement to acquire Distributed Technologies Research Ltd. (DTR) to enhance its global stablecoin settlement and programmable payments strategy. The acquisition will involve Bakkt issuing Class A shares representing 31.5% of the Bakkt Share Number, approximately 9.1 million shares, to DTR shareholders. This move is expected to accelerate Bakkt's time-to-market for stablecoin settlement and support its neobanking strategy, with the company also announcing a name change to "Bakkt, Inc." and an Investor Day in March 2026.

feed.title: Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) Announces ETH Holdings Reach 4.168 Million Tokens, and Total Crypto and Total Cash Holdings of $14.0 Billion
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) announced its total crypto and cash holdings have reached $14.0 billion, including 4.168 million ETH tokens and $988 million in cash. The company, which now owns 3.45% of the ETH token supply, aims to increase its ETH per share and is urging stockholders to vote YES on proposal #2 to support an increase in authorized shares. Bitmine plans to launch its MAVAN staking solution in Q1 2026 and remains the largest "fresh money" buyer of ETH globally.

feed.title: 37M unaccounted shares prompt Bitcoin reward push at education firm
feed.summary: Genius Group (GNS) has set a share count date of February 13, 2026, to resolve a discrepancy of 37 million unaccounted shares linked to its 2023 ERL spin-off. This exercise aims to identify owners and clarify the allocation of 50 million GNS shares. Additionally, 16.7 million verified ERL shares will be integrated into the Bitcoin Loyalty Payment Program, significantly expanding its participation and offering a $0.10 per share bonus.

feed.title: Turning Kansas hydrogen drilling assets into digital tokens
feed.summary: Netcapital Inc. (NASDAQ: NCPL) has signed PureWave Hydrogen (TSX.V: PWH) as its first client to tokenize hydrogen drilling assets in Kansas, marking its first potential revenue-generating real-world asset tokenization initiative. This move aims to create a repeatable template with a consistent fee structure for scalable platform revenue. Netcapital's CEO, Rich Wheeless, stated that this initiative will broaden investor access to asset-backed projects through regulated digital infrastructure while maintaining investor protections.

feed.title: Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) Announces ETH Holdings Reach 4.168 Million Tokens, and Total Crypto and Total Cash Holdings of $14.0 Billion
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) announced that its Ethereum (ETH) holdings have reached 4.168 million tokens, contributing to a total crypto and cash holding of $14.0 billion. The company now owns 3.45% of the total ETH supply and urges stockholders to approve proposal #2 to increase authorized shares to continue its aggressive ETH accumulation strategy. Bitmine also highlighted its progress with the MAVAN staking solution, expected to launch in Q1 2026, and its status as the world's largest 'fresh money' buyer of ETH.

feed.title: Figure Technology Solutions Reports Preliminary Q4 2025 & December Operating Data
feed.summary: Figure Technology Solutions (Nasdaq: FIGR) announced its preliminary operating data for Q4 2025 and December 2025, showing significant growth across various metrics. Consumer Loan Marketplace Volume increased by 131% year-over-year in Q4 2025 and 134% year-over-year in December 2025, reaching $2.705 billion and $869 million, respectively. The company also reported substantial growth in $YLDS in Circulation and Democratized Prime Matched Offers Balance, highlighting the expansion of its blockchain-native capital marketplace.

feed.title: Wellgistics Health Adds Quantum Key Encryption to PharmacyChain(TM) AI-Enabled Blockchain Smart Contract Partnership with DataVault AI
feed.summary: Wellgistics Health (NASDAQ:WGRX) has partnered with DataVault AI (NASDAQ:DVLT) to integrate quantum key encryption into its PharmacyChain™ AI-enabled blockchain smart contract platform. This collaboration aims to enhance the security, transparency, and efficiency of the US prescription drug market, which is valued at $634 billion. The companies have completed their feasibility assessment and set milestones to deploy the PharmacyChain™ solution, leveraging DataVault AI's technology to create secure digital twins of pharmacy processes and transactions, ultimately improving patient care and pharmacy profitability.

feed.title: Pharmacies test quantum-proof security for prescriptions and payments
feed.summary: Wellgistics Health (NASDAQ:WGRX) has partnered with DataVault AI (NASDAQ:DVLT) to integrate quantum key encryption and DataVault's Information Data Exchange into Wellgistics' PharmacyChain blockchain platform, along with its EinsteinRx AI for pharmacy dispensing optimization. This collaboration aims to enhance security, efficiency, and fraud prevention within the $634 billion U.S. prescription drug market, with pilot milestones set throughout 2026. The initiative targets a network of over 6,500 independent pharmacies to address challenges like supply chain inefficiencies, lack of transparency, and delayed payments.

feed.title: Sumitomo Mitsui Trust Group Inc. Acquires 1,676 Shares of BlackRock $BLK
feed.summary: Sumitomo Mitsui Trust Group Inc. increased its stake in BlackRock by 0.5%, purchasing an additional 1,676 shares, bringing its total holdings to 359,324 shares valued at approximately $418.9 million. This ownership represents about 0.23% of BlackRock. The article also details significant insider sales by BlackRock's CFO and a director, alongside institutional investor activities and analyst ratings which generally rate BlackRock as a "Moderate Buy".

feed.title: Figure Technology Solutions Reports Preliminary Q4 2025 & December Operating Data
feed.summary: Figure Technology Solutions (Nasdaq: FIGR) released its preliminary operating data for Q4 2025 and December 2025, highlighting significant growth across its platforms. The company reported substantial increases in Consumer Loan Marketplace Volume, $YLDS in Circulation, and Matched Offers on its Democratized Prime platform compared to both the previous quarter and the prior year. These results underscore Figure's expanding role in the blockchain-native capital marketplace for tokenized assets.

feed.title: Fintech firm builds $1.5B crypto treasury linked to a fast-growing stablecoin
feed.summary: ALT5 Sigma (NASDAQ: ALTS) reported strong Q3 2025 financial results, including $57 million in net income and an increase in stockholders' equity to $1.6 billion. The company established a strategic $WLFI digital asset treasury, valued at approximately $1.53 billion, linked to USD1, one of the fastest-growing stablecoins. This move positions ALT5 Sigma to benefit from the expanding WLFI ecosystem and strengthens its balance sheet and operational capacity in blockchain-powered payments and trading.

feed.title: AGM Group Holdings Inc. and Amber Premium Sign MOU to Explore RWA Tokenization Collaboration
feed.summary: AGM Group Holdings Inc. and Amber Premium have signed an MOU to explore collaboration in real-world asset (RWA) tokenization, aiming to bridge traditional finance and blockchain technology. This partnership seeks to leverage AGM's strengths in high-performance computing hardware and Amber's expertise in digital asset management to enhance liquidity and transparency. The strategic move also positions AGM to potentially combine RWA tokenization with AI, creating new financial products and a decentralized AI training network.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Highlights Record Net Inflows at Valour in 2025, Underscoring Core Business Momentum Beyond AUM Price Volatility
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies reported record net inflows of $138.2 million for Valour in 2025, emphasizing that these inflows indicate strong business momentum despite market volatility and a bear market backdrop. Valour achieved its highest annual total with no months of net outflows, demonstrating consistent client demand and a diversified product suite of 102 listed ETPs. The company's integrated issuer model, which includes various monetization strategies beyond traditional management fees, is designed for scalable growth and margin expansion.

feed.title: Enlivex Therapeutics stock price target raised to $13 by H.C. Wainwright
feed.summary: H.C. Wainwright has raised its price target for Enlivex Therapeutics (NASDAQ:ENLV) to $13 from $7, maintaining a Buy rating. This upgrade follows a late 2025 PIPE transaction that secured $212 million, significantly strengthening the company's liquidity and enabling its first RAIN prediction markets token treasury strategy. The funding, partially in cryptocurrency, and the appointment of former Italian Prime Minister Matteo Renzi to the board highlight Enlivex's strategic growth initiatives.

feed.title: Brazil: Bunge begins supplying low-carbon soybean meal
feed.summary: Bunge Global SA has initiated the supply of 12,000 tonnes of fully traceable, low-carbon soybean meal to Mantiqueira Brasil, South America's leading chicken egg producer. This initiative supports regenerative agricultural practices and aims to reduce carbon footprints and enhance supply chain transparency using blockchain technology. Bunge estimates its soybean meal has a 40-70% lower carbon footprint than the Brazilian market average, validated by independent verification and primary farm data.

feed.title: Why HUT 8 Stock Is a Sell Even After a 171% Surge in 6 Months
feed.summary: Despite a 171% surge in the past six months, Hut 8 Corp. (HUT) is identified as a sell due to its heavy reliance on Bitcoin price movements, exposure to long-term power and grid constraints, and a high valuation compared to peers. The company's financial performance is inherently volatile, tied to crypto market fluctuations, and its ambitious project pipeline faces significant execution risks. Given these factors, along with an overvalued stock and mixed earnings estimates, the article suggests significant downside risk for investors.

feed.title: Datavault AI Celebrates Successful Completion of Dream Bowl XIV, Pioneering Blockchain Innovation in Sports Entertainment
feed.summary: Datavault AI (NASDAQ:DVLT) announced the successful conclusion of Dream Bowl XIV, an event that integrated AI and blockchain technology into sports entertainment. Key innovations included tokenized autograph sessions for verifiable digital collectibles and Meme Coin distribution for exclusive merchandise lotteries. The event, broadcast on ESPN+, showcased emerging collegiate football talent and demonstrated Datavault AI's commitment to revolutionizing data ownership and monetization in sports.

feed.title: NovaBay Pharmaceuticals (NBY) stock slides premarket after 102% surge — dilution risk back on radar
feed.summary: NovaBay Pharmaceuticals (NBY) saw its stock slip roughly 10% in premarket trading after a 102.5% surge on Friday, driven by thinly traded microcap momentum. The dip is attributed to dilution risks as traders focus on the company's capital structure, including authorized pre-funded warrants exercisable after January 1, 2026, and a potential reverse stock split. The company is also exploring a pivot towards "emerging financial infrastructure and network-based markets" and blockchain-based assets, while its cash reserves are projected to cover operating costs through November 7, 2026.

feed.title: Citizens Financial Group Inc. RI Has $11.11 Million Stock Position in Morgan Stanley $MS
feed.summary: Citizens Financial Group Inc. RI increased its stake in Morgan Stanley (NYSE:MS) by 19.0% in Q3, now holding 69,868 shares valued at approximately $11.11 million. This comes as Morgan Stanley expands its crypto ventures with Ethereum ETF filings and a planned digital wallet, alongside positive analyst ratings and price target increases. However, CEO Edward Pick recently sold 100,000 shares, reducing his direct ownership by nearly 15%.

feed.title: Wall Street Analysts Think CleanSpark (CLSK) Is a Good Investment: Is It?
feed.summary: CleanSpark (CLSK) currently has an average brokerage recommendation (ABR) of 1.40, suggesting a strong buy, with 11 out of 15 firms rating it as "Strong Buy." However, Zacks Equity Research advises caution, noting that brokerage recommendations often have a positive bias due to their vested interests. The article recommends using the Zacks Rank, a proprietary stock rating tool based on earnings estimate revisions, to validate investment decisions, as CleanSpark currently holds a Zacks Rank #4 (Sell) despite its favorable ABR.

feed.title: Earnings due Jan 14: BMNR Bitmine Immersion AMEX pre-market focus on revenue
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion Technologies, Inc. (BMNR) is experiencing pre-market focus ahead of its January 14, 2026 earnings report, with investors keen on revenue guidance following a mixed last quarter (EPS beat, revenue miss). Meyka AI rates BMNR as a "BUY" with a grade of 83.31 and projects significant upside targets for both monthly and yearly performance. Despite low reported P/E, high P/S and P/B ratios suggest accounting distortions, pointing to potential volatility and the need for careful due diligence.

feed.title: SEC delays PENGU and T. Rowe crypto ETFs as Grayscale seeks options green light
feed.summary: The SEC has delayed decisions on two crypto-related ETFs, the Canary Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) ETF and the T. Rowe Price Active Crypto ETF, to further evaluate their market structure, investor protection, and manipulation concerns. Concurrently, a proposal to list standardized options on the Grayscale CoinDesk Crypto 5 ETF has entered the public comment phase, aiming to expand derivative tools for digital assets beyond Bitcoin and Ether. These actions indicate the SEC's cautious approach to increasingly diverse crypto investment products.

feed.title: Lloyds Banking Group Enables UK’s First Public Blockchain Transaction with Tokenized Deposits
feed.summary: Lloyds Banking Group has completed the UK's first public blockchain transaction using tokenized deposits, partnering with Archax and the Canton Network. This involved issuing tokenized deposits on the Canton Network to acquire a tokenized Gilt, demonstrating how traditional banking can integrate with blockchain for more efficient financial operations. The initiative highlights the potential for instant settlement, automated smart contracts, and enhanced transparency in the financial sector, positioning Lloyds as a leader in digital finance.

feed.title: Canaan (CAN) Growth Momentum Strengthens Following 3.0 MW Proof-of-Concept Project Announcement
feed.summary: Canaan Inc. announced a 3.0 MW proof-of-concept project with Bitforest Investment in Manitoba, Canada, aimed at monetizing waste heat from crypto mining for agricultural applications. This 24-month pilot project involves deploying 360 Avalon A1566HA-460T liquid-cooled servers and four cooling modules, with the goal of capturing up to 90% of consumed electricity to preheat water for greenhouses. The initiative reinforces Canaan's strategy to position high-density computing as an energy-efficient infrastructure asset, highlighting benefits like low power costs and potential for replication in colder regions.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Regains Compliance with Nasdaq Minimum Bid Price Requirement
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. announced it has successfully regained compliance with Nasdaq's minimum bid price requirement of $1.00 per share, securing its listing on The Nasdaq Capital Market. The company's common stock maintained the required bid price for 10 consecutive business days from December 11 to December 24, 2025. CEO Jarrett Boon stated that the strategic capital restructuring has removed delisting risk and positioned the debt-free company for focused execution and growth in 2026.

feed.title: Insider Buying: Bonk, Inc. Board Member Mitchell Rudy Acquires Stock to Close Q4
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (Nasdaq:BNKK) announced that board member Mitchell Rudy purchased 13,142 shares of company stock at the close of Q4 2025. This purchase signals his confidence in Bonk, Inc.'s "revenue-to-treasury" strategy and its recent transformative quarter, which included acquiring a majority revenue interest in BONK.fun and streamlining its capital structure. Rudy believes the current valuation does not fully reflect the company's potential.

feed.title: Key facts: Morgan Stanley files for Solana ETF; large investors boost SOL futures
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley has filed for a Solana ETF designed to track SOL's performance. The ETF plans to use third-party custodians and engage in staking to enhance its net asset value. This development comes as futures for Solana show increased long positions, particularly from large investors, indicating strong confidence in its ecosystem.

feed.title: Key facts: Morgan Stanley files for Solana ETF; large investors boost SOL futures
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley has filed for a Solana ETF, which will track SOL's performance, using third-party custodians and staking to enhance net asset value. Concurrently, large investors are increasing their long positions in SOL futures, indicating strong confidence in the Solana ecosystem. For this positive trend to continue, Solana's price needs to maintain support between $130 and $135 to prevent liquidations.

feed.title: FTAC Emerald Acquisition Corp. Announces Special Meeting of Stockholders to be Held on December 17, 2024
feed.summary: FTAC Emerald Acquisition Corp. (FTAC Emerald) has announced a virtual Special Meeting of Stockholders for December 17, 2024, at 11:00 a.m. Eastern Time. Stockholders will vote on proposals to facilitate the proposed business combination with Fold, Inc., including extending the deadline to December 20, 2025. The Board of Directors unanimously recommends voting "FOR" all proposals to enable the completion of the business combination in early 2025.

feed.title: Is Hyperscale Data’s (GPUS) Aggressive Bitcoin Treasury Strategy Redefining Its Core Investment Narrative?
feed.summary: Hyperscale Data (GPUS) is shifting its investment narrative by focusing on a significant Bitcoin treasury, which now rivals its market value, despite ongoing losses and risks of dilution. The company's transparency through weekly asset updates and the recent shelf registration for US$8.60 million in stock highlight its emphasis on Bitcoin accumulation and financing needs, sharply dividing analyst opinions on its fair value. Investors are encouraged to assess their comfort with this balance sheet concentration, financing risk, and stock volatility.

feed.title: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ:DVLT) Announces a Distribution Date of February 21, 2026 for Warrants to Purchase Common Stock to Eligible Record Equityholders of Datavault AI
feed.summary: Datavault AI Inc. announced that its board of directors has set February 21, 2026, as the distribution date for warrants to purchase shares of Common Stock to eligible record equity holders. The warrants will be distributed on the basis of one warrant for every sixty shares held, with an exercise price of $5.00 per share and an expiration date one year after distribution. Exercise of the warrants is conditioned upon holding at least one Dream Bowl Meme Coin II token per warrant.

feed.title: Microcap AirNet Stock Nearly Doubles On Kazakhstan Bitcoin Mining Deal, Retail Buzz Explodes
feed.summary: AirNet Technology Inc. (ANTE) stock nearly doubled after announcing a joint venture to establish a bitcoin mining operation in Kazakhstan. The company plans to deploy 3,000 to 5,000 cryptocurrency mining machines within two months, leveraging its existing connections from previous mining ventures in the region. This news has led to significant retail investor interest and increased trading volumes for ANTE.

feed.title: Ethereum Chill: Fidelity’s FETH ETF Registers a Notable Outflow as Token Weakens
feed.summary: The Fidelity Ethereum Fund ETF (FETH) experienced a notable outflow of $13.29 million on January 8, 2026, as Ethereum prices continue to slump. This redemption, representing about 0.57% of the fund’s assets, indicates a tactical de-risking by investors amid market uncertainty and bearish technical signals for ETH-USD, which is down 18.2% over three months. The outflow highlights fluctuating sentiment in crypto-linked ETFs, with investors either locking in profits or cutting losses.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Bolstered Q4 Balance Sheet with $1 Million Strategic Injection from BONK.fun Operations
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (Nasdaq:BNKK) announced a significant strengthening of its Q4 2025 balance sheet through a $1 million strategic injection derived from its BONK.fun operations. This injection comprised $500,000 in cash for liquidity and $500,000 in BONK digital assets, directly contributing to the company's treasury goals. The move validates their "Revenue-to-Treasury" business model, turning ecosystem activity into treasury value without shareholder dilution.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Completes Strategic Capital Structure Optimization to Support Institutional Growth and Digital Asset Strategy
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. has announced a 1-for-35 reverse stock split, effective December 11, 2025, as a crucial step in its transformation from a beverage company to a digital asset holding company. This move aims to align its share structure with its new revenue-generating model, attract institutional investors by optimizing its share price, and regain compliance with Nasdaq's minimum bid price requirement. The company has also eliminated debt, acquired a majority interest in Bonk.fun, and built a significant treasury of BONK digital assets.

feed.title: Solana ETF Flows and Whale Moves Hint at Bullish Potential
feed.summary: Solana (SOL) is showing bullish potential despite recent modest declines, driven by steady ETF flows, significant whale activity, and strong long-term technical chart patterns. Analysts suggest a reclaim of $222 could unlock further upside, with projections reaching $1,000 by mid-year. On-chain data, including a large withdrawal from Binance, reinforces this optimistic outlook.

feed.title: 140,000 Shares in BitMine Immersion Technologies, Inc. $BMNR Purchased by Robeco Institutional Asset Management B.V.
feed.summary: Robeco Institutional Asset Management B.V. has purchased 140,000 shares of BitMine Immersion Technologies, Inc. (BMNR) for approximately $7.27 million, establishing a new position in the company. Several other institutional investors also acquired stakes in BMNR during the third quarter. Analysts have assigned a "Buy" consensus rating for BMNR, with a target price of $43.00, despite the stock having a negative P/E ratio and recent trading around $30.06.

feed.title: Black Titan Introduces DAT+ and Releases First Pillar Focused on Utility-Driven Digital Asset Participation
feed.summary: Black Titan Corporation (NASDAQ:BTTC) unveiled its Digital Asset Treasury Plus (DAT+) framework, a strategic approach for evaluating and engaging with digital assets. The company released Pillar 1: Active Utility Deployment & Cash Flow Potential, emphasizing practical ecosystem participation for digital assets. Additional pillars focusing on risk management, token utility integration, strategic partnerships, and liquidity standards will be released to further detail the comprehensive strategy.

feed.title: WisdomTree extends reach of Prime app, plots new features
feed.summary: WisdomTree has expanded the availability of its blockchain-enabled Prime app to 11 additional states, bringing its total reach to 32 states. The asset manager aims to make the app, which offers digital funds and tokenized assets like Bitcoin and Ether, available to most of the US population by the end of 2023. Future plans for the app include adding features such as debit card connectivity, peer-to-peer functionality, and more funding options to provide a unified save, spend, and invest experience for users.

feed.title: UPXI - Upexi Inc Latest Stock News & Market Updates
feed.summary: This page provides the latest news and updates for Upexi Inc (UPXI) stock, a company that delivers innovative consumer products and is involved in digital asset ventures. Recent news includes participation in investor conferences, a shift to a high-yield treasury strategy, a Nasdaq closing bell ceremony, and a shelf registration statement for capital raising. The company also announced a private placement offering, a share repurchase program, and reported record digital asset revenue for Q1 2026.

feed.title: Marathon Digital Holdings, Inc. (MARA) Stock Slides as Market Rises: Facts to Know Before You Trade
feed.summary: Marathon Digital Holdings, Inc. (MARA) stock closed down 2.11% in the latest trading session, underperforming the broader market. The company is projected to report an EPS of -$0.23, a significant decline year-over-year, despite an anticipated revenue increase of 14.97% to $246.48 million for the upcoming earnings. MARA currently holds a Zacks Rank of #3 (Hold) within an industry that ranks in the bottom 34% of all industries.

feed.title: IREN and NAKA Shares Drop After Note Deals
feed.summary: Bitcoin miner IREN and healthcare firm Kindly MD (merged with Nakamoto) announced multimillion-dollar convertible note offerings, leading to drops in their share prices. IREN announced an $875 million offering, and Kindly MD revealed a $250 million deal with Antalpha, aiming to reduce dilution risk and expand Bitcoin holdings, respectively. These deals occur amid a general slowdown in venture capital activity within the crypto sector.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Bolstered Q4 Balance Sheet with $1 Million Strategic Injection from BONK.fun Operations
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. announced a significant strengthening of its Q4 2025 balance sheet with a $1 million strategic injection derived from its BONK.fun operations. This injection, comprising $500,000 in cash and $500,000 in BONK Digital Assets, validates the company's "Revenue-to-Treasury" business model and enhances both liquidity and treasury holdings. The move demonstrates the effectiveness of their strategy to acquire revenue-generating assets within the decentralized finance space.

feed.title: Bitcoin Chill: Fidelity’s FBTC ETF Suffers a $247 Million Outflow as Price Slump Deepens
feed.summary: Fidelity's Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund (FBTC) experienced a significant outflow of $247.6 million on January 8, 2026, representing about 1.37% of its total assets under management. This substantial redemption indicates a shift in investor sentiment amid declining Bitcoin prices, which have fallen by nearly 20% in the last three months. The outflow suggests a broader risk reassessment in the crypto market as investors grapple with volatility.

feed.title: Ethereum News: Ethereum Founder Claims ETH Outperformed Bitcoin Over Decade
feed.summary: Ether Machine co-founder Andrew Keys asserts that Ethereum has significantly outperformed Bitcoin over the past decade, arguing investors would be 30 times wealthier choosing ETH. Keys, who identifies as an "Ethereum guy," plans to launch a large institutional Ethereum vehicle and projects that Ethereum will benefit most from the GENIUS Act. His firm is also pursuing a Nasdaq IPO, backed by substantial Ethereum funding.

feed.title: Galaxy Digital CEO: Only Crypto Treasuries With Real Products Will Thrive
feed.summary: Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz asserts that crypto treasuries must evolve beyond merely holding crypto and become real companies with tangible products and services to survive. He notes that simply holding crypto no longer creates shareholder value, and many Bitcoin treasuries are trading below their holdings' value, struggling to justify their valuations, especially with the advent of direct-exposure crypto ETFs. Novogratz suggests that distressed treasuries should buy back discounted stock and build sustainable revenue streams to create tangible value for shareholders.

feed.title: Precision Trading with Global X Blockchain Etf (BKCH) Risk Zones
feed.summary: This article provides an in-depth analysis for the Global X Blockchain Etf (BKCH), highlighting strong sentiment, institutional trading strategies, and AI-generated signals. It outlines specific entry/exit zones, targets, and stop losses for long, breakout, and short positions across different time horizons. The analysis emphasizes risk-reward ratios and multi-timeframe signal analysis to aid precision trading.

feed.title: La Rosa Holdings completes $11 million convertible note financing
feed.summary: La Rosa Holdings Corp. (NASDAQ:LRHC) has completed an initial closing of an $11 million senior secured convertible note financing, selling it for $9.9 million. The company plans to use $7 million of the proceeds to acquire cryptocurrency as a treasury asset and $2 million to redeem Series X Super Voting Preferred Stock. This financing comes amidst financial challenges for the company, including a negative EBITDA and a low market capitalization, but follows a reported 15.78% return over the last week.

feed.title: La Rosa Holdings Signs Multiple Financing Agreements
feed.summary: La Rosa Holdings has completed the initial closing of a $11.0 million senior secured convertible note with a 10% interest rate, maturing in 24 months, and convertible at $0.8347 per share. The net proceeds of $9.635 million will be used for a crypto treasury asset purchase, partial redemption of preferred shares, and general corporate needs. To secure this financing, the company entered into several agreements, including a Security and Pledge Agreement, a Subsidiary Guaranty, an Intellectual Property Security Agreement, and an Account Control Agreement.

feed.title: Price-Driven Insight from (BITS) for Rule-Based Strategy

It outlines three distinct trading strategies (Position, Momentum Breakout, Risk Hedging) with specific entry, target, and stop-loss levels. The analysis also includes multi-timeframe signal analysis and details AI-generated signals for BITS.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies (NASDAQ:DEFT) Downgraded by Wall Street Zen to "Sell"
feed.summary: Wall Street Zen downgraded DeFi Technologies (NASDAQ:DEFT) to "Sell" due to the company missing quarterly EPS and revenue estimates, despite other analysts maintaining a "Moderate Buy" consensus. The firm reported a $0.01 EPS against an expected $0.07, and revenue of $22.53 million compared to a $41.0 million estimate. Additionally, multiple law firms have issued class-action alerts with a Jan 30, 2026, lead-plaintiff deadline, indicating heightened litigation risk for the company.

feed.title: Morgan Stanley to Release Its Own Crypto Wallet Amid Digital Asset Push: Report
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley is reportedly planning to launch its own cryptocurrency wallet as part of a broader push into digital assets. This move signifies traditional financial institutions' growing interest in and adoption of the crypto space. The new wallet would allow the investment bank to offer clients more direct access to and management of their digital asset holdings.

feed.title: IShares Bitcoin Trust Options Spot-On: On January 9th, 616.13K Contracts Were Traded, With 6.53 Million Open Interest
feed.summary: On January 9th, the iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT.US) experienced significant options trading activity, with 616.13K contracts traded. Call options represented 66.47% of these transactions. The open interest for IBIT registered 6.53 million contracts, which is 88.05% of its 30-day average.

feed.title: Bitcoin News: Bitcoin Whale Dumps $9 Billion Through Galaxy Digital in Historic Sale
feed.summary: A Satoshi-era investor conducted one of the largest crypto transactions ever, selling 80,000 Bitcoin (worth approximately $9 billion) through Galaxy Digital as part of a "broader real estate planning strategy." Despite the massive sell-off, the market absorbed the Bitcoin with minimal movement, demonstrating its depth and institutional maturity. Galaxy Digital did not disclose the client's identity, and Bitcoin briefly dipped before recovering above $117,300.

This news comes amidst other significant developments for Circle, including regulatory approval for a national trust bank, a strategic partnership with Intuit, and an expanded presence in the cryptocurrency market through a partnership with Bybit.

feed.title: Western Union Trademark Filings Signal Crypto, Web3 Exploration
feed.summary: Western Union has filed multiple trademark applications with the United States Patent and Trademark Office, signaling its intent to explore the crypto and Web3 space. These filings suggest the company may launch its own virtual currency exchange and cryptocurrency token, as well as expand into managing and administering digital assets. This move comes after years of cautious observation, likely spurred by increasing competition in international money transfers and the growing adoption of blockchain technology.

feed.title: Arrive AI Embraces Cryptocurrency for Everything
feed.summary: Arrive AI (NASDAQ: ARAI) announced its intention to use Bitcoin to pay vendors, clients, and employees who prefer cryptocurrency. CEO Dan O’Toole plans to be the first staffer to accept compensation in crypto and aims to eventually create a proprietary "Arrive Coin" for its ecosystem. The company believes embracing cryptocurrency will help attract top tech talent and enhance efficiency, transparency, and investment opportunities.

feed.title: Insider Buying: Bonk, Inc. Board Member Mitchell Rudy Acquires Stock to Close Q4
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. board member Mitchell Rudy purchased 13,142 shares of the company's common stock at the end of Q4 2025, demonstrating confidence in the company's "Revenue-to-Treasury" strategy. This move follows a transformative quarter for Bonk, Inc., including the acquisition of a majority revenue interest in BONK.fun and an improved capital structure. Rudy believes the current valuation undervalues the company's potential.

feed.title: Insider Buying: Bonk, Inc. Board Member Mitchell Rudy Acquires Stock to Close Q4
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (Nasdaq:BNKK) announced that board member and core ecosystem contributor Mitchell Rudy purchased 13,142 shares of the company's common stock at the close of the fourth quarter. This acquisition demonstrates Rudy's strong belief in Bonk, Inc.'s strategic direction and its capacity to capitalize on the digital asset economy, following a transformative quarter for the company. Rudy expressed confidence that the current valuation does not reflect the company's true potential after successfully building out its treasury, revenue engines, and achieving a public listing.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Shareholder Alert: ClaimsFiler Reminds Investors With Losses In Excess Of $100,000 Of Lead Plaintiff Deadline In Class Action Lawsuits Against DeFi Technologies Inc. - DEFT
feed.summary: ClaimsFiler is alerting investors with losses over $100,000 in DeFi Technologies Inc. (DEFT) to a lead plaintiff deadline of January 30, 2026, in a securities class action lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that DeFi and its executives failed to disclose material information, leading to a significant revenue decline and stock price drop after a lowered 2025 revenue forecast was announced. Investors who purchased DEFT securities between May 12, 2025, and November 14, 2025, are encouraged to seek legal counsel.

feed.title: Upexi, Inc. Implements High Yield Strategy and Announces Investor Conference Participation
feed.summary: Upexi, Inc. has announced a new high-yield strategy for its Solana treasury and increased its Solana holdings by 3.2% to 2,174,583 SOL. The company repurchased over 416,000 shares at $1.92 each and its CEO acquired 200,000 shares. Upexi will also participate in January investor conferences including Alpha North and Sidoti.

feed.title: Deadline Alert: DeFi Technologies Inc. (DEFT) Shareholders Who Lost Money Urged To Contact Glancy Prongay & Murray LLP About Securities Fraud Lawsuit
feed.summary: Glancy Prongay & Murray LLP is urging shareholders of DeFi Technologies Inc. (DEFT) who suffered losses to contact them regarding a securities fraud lawsuit. The lawsuit claims DeFi made misleading statements and failed to disclose issues with its arbitrage strategy and competition, leading to significant stock price drops in November 2025. The deadline to file a lead plaintiff motion is January 30, 2026.

feed.title: Hut 8 (HUT) touches 4-year high on Bitcoin frenzy
feed.summary: Hut 8's stock (HUT) reached a four-year high, reflecting a significant surge in its value amid a broader Bitcoin frenzy. This marks a notable performance for the company in the current cryptocurrency market upswing.

feed.title: Black Titan Introduces DAT+ Collaborative Engagement Pillar to Support High-Value Decentralized Ecosystems
feed.summary: Black Titan Corporation has announced the fourth pillar of its DAT+ initiative, focusing on structured collaboration with decentralized projects. This pillar outlines a framework for providing insights on tokenomics, contributing to governance, and supporting ecosystem development for technically strong and long-term potential projects. The company aims to engage with projects that align with its strategic objectives and operational standards to foster growth in decentralized ecosystems.

feed.title: Inverse Bitcoin Bets Unwind as BTCZ Bleeds 15% of Assets in a Single Day
feed.summary: The T-Rex 2X Inverse Bitcoin Daily Target ETF (BTCZ) experienced significant outflows of $1.53 million in a single day, representing about 15% of its total assets under management. This withdrawal indicates a shift away from bearish Bitcoin positioning, as investors who had bet against Bitcoin's rally are now reducing their exposure. This trend, combined with a "Hold" technical stance on BTC-USD despite a 25.49% drawdown over three months, highlights an undecided market in transition.

feed.title: Morgan Stanley continues crypto push, plans wallet in the second half of 2026
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley is continuing its expansion into the cryptocurrency space, with plans to launch bitcoin, ether, and solana trading on its E-Trade platform in the first half of 2026, alongside a proprietary digital wallet in the second half of the year. This move follows the firm's recent filing of S-1 registration statements for its own BTC, ETH, and SOL exchange-traded funds, signaling a significant shift from its previous stance on digital assets. The investment bank views this as an adaptation to changes in financial infrastructure, blending traditional finance with decentralized finance.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Bolstered Q4 Balance Sheet with $1 Million Strategic Injection from BONK.fun Operations
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. announced a significant strengthening of its Q4 2025 balance sheet with a $1 million injection derived from its BONK.fun operations. This infusion, comprising $500,000 in cash and $500,000 in BONK digital assets, validates its "Revenue-to-Treasury" business model. The company aims to increase current assets without dilution and move towards its goal of accumulating 5% of BONK's circulating supply from operational profits.

feed.title: Largest Crypto ATM Operator Eyes Acquisitions, Global Expansion
feed.summary: Bitcoin Depot, the largest crypto ATM operator, plans to go public on the Nasdaq in Q1 2023 through a SPAC merger. CEO Brandon Mintz stated that transaction volumes are not correlated to crypto prices and the company aims for acquisitions of smaller players and international expansion, including obtaining a New York license. The company also launched BDCheckout and is exploring growth opportunities beyond North America.

feed.title: Deadline Alert: DeFi Technologies Inc. (DEFT) Shareholders Who Lost Money Urged To Contact Glancy Prongay & Murray LLP About Securities Fraud Lawsuit
feed.summary: Glancy Prongay & Murray LLP is reminding investors of DeFi Technologies Inc. (DEFT) that they have until January 30, 2026, to file a lead plaintiff motion in a class action lawsuit. This lawsuit alleges securities fraud, claiming that DeFi Technologies made misleading statements and failed to disclose issues related to its arbitrage strategy, competition, and revenue forecasts, which led to significant stock price declines in November 2025. Investors who suffered losses during the Class Period (May 12, 2025, to November 14, 2025) are encouraged to contact the firm.

feed.title: Black Titan Releases DAT+ Earnings Alignment Pillar Highlighting How Token Utility Interfaces With Economic Activity
feed.summary: Black Titan Corporation (NASDAQ:BTTC) has launched the third pillar of its DAT+ strategy, focusing on how token utility integrates with economic structures in decentralized ecosystems. This pillar aims to analyze how tokens contribute to fee-based revenue, usage-driven consumption, and protocol service payments to ensure operational activity aligns with value flow. Co-CEO Czhang Lin stated that this pillar helps understand the economic framework behind token utility and identifies models that create clearer economic pathways.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Announces Participation in Upcoming Investor and Industry Conferences
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR) announced its participation in several upcoming investor and industry conferences, including the 28th Annual Needham Growth Conference, Jefferies Power, Energy, Clean Energy & Utilities Conference, and Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference. CEO Tyler Page will highlight recent developments and growth strategies. Webcast links and replays will be available on the company's investor relations website.

feed.title: December Lending Market Color: RWAs, DeFi Collateral Shifts & Institutional Credit Signals
feed.summary: The December lending market experienced muted activity with BTC and ETH prices consolidating after a sharp November drop. Key trends included Uniswap's shift to a fee-bearing asset model for its UNI token, a revival in primary market activity for new Layer 1s and perp DEXs as collateral, and increased institutional demand for lending driven by tokenized Real World Assets (RWAs). Additionally, Aave DAO removed USDS and DAI as eligible collateral due to risk considerations.

feed.title: CleanSpark’s Tightrope Walk: Expansion Pains and Power Grid Friction Spark Volatility in Bitcoin Mining Sector
feed.summary: CleanSpark (NASDAQ: CLSK) is facing significant challenges as it attempts to expand its Bitcoin mining operations while dealing with financial strain, increasing network difficulty, and infrastructure constraints. The company is pivoting towards becoming a diversified digital infrastructure provider, including AI and HPC data centers, but this transition presents its own set of hurdles, including massive capital expenditures and regulatory pushback on energy consumption. The article highlights CleanSpark's precarious position as it tries to balance debt, expansion goals, and the competitive landscape of the digital asset industry.

feed.title: BitGo Announces Custody and Transaction Support for iPower’s Digital Asset Treasury
feed.summary: BitGo Holdings Inc. announced its support for iPower Inc. in managing its digital asset treasury, including the custody and execution of Bitcoin and Ethereum transactions. iPower utilized BitGo Bank & Trust for account maintenance and BitGo Prime's OTC trading services for institutional liquidity and discreet execution. Both companies emphasized the importance of strong security, governance, and operational rigor for corporate digital asset participation.

feed.title: Strategy Inc stock slips as MSCI clamps down on index weight gains — Feb 10 is the next date to watch
feed.summary: Strategy Inc (MSTR) shares dropped 4% after MSCI maintained "digital asset treasury" companies in its indexes but froze changes that would increase their index weights. Traders are now awaiting MSCI's February 10 index review announcement as the next key event. The decision eases immediate technical risk but doesn't resolve the debate on whether these firms are operating companies or investment vehicles, impacting how passive funds track the stock, especially since Strategy relies on equity sales to fund bitcoin purchases.

feed.title: Borrowing Crypto With DeFi? TransUnion Shares Real-world Credit Scores
feed.summary: TransUnion is extending its credit scoring services to the DeFi sector, allowing users to leverage their real-world credit histories for blockchain-based loan applications. This initiative, a partnership with Spring Labs and Quadrata, aims to mitigate risk for DeFi lenders and provide borrowers with better terms while preserving user privacy. The move signals a maturation of the DeFi market, addressing concerns about unsecured lending that became prominent after recent crypto market downturns.

feed.title: BTCS Posts Explosive Revenue Growth, Amasses Major Ethereum Holdings
feed.summary: BTCS Inc. (Nasdaq: BTCS) announced record unaudited revenue of approximately $16 million in 2025, a 290% increase from the prior year, driven by its expanding operations in the Ethereum ecosystem. The company's total assets grew by 600% year over year, with Ethereum holdings surpassing 70,500 ETH. CEO Charles Allen emphasized BTCS's focus on building a revenue-generating crypto-native business through strategies like block building and decentralized finance rather than just passively holding digital assets.

feed.title: Insider Buying: Bonk, Inc. Board Member Mitchell Rudy Acquires Stock to Close Q4
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (Nasdaq: BNKK) announced that board member Mitchell Rudy purchased 13,142 shares of the company's common stock at the close of Q4 2025. This stock acquisition signals Rudy's continued confidence in Bonk, Inc.'s strategic direction, particularly after a transformative quarter that included acquiring a majority interest in BONK.fun and fortifying the company’s capital structure. Rudy stated that his investment reflects his belief that the current valuation does not fully capture the potential of Bonk, Inc.'s assets.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Faces Mounting Legal Challenges Amid Recovery
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies is grappling with mounting legal challenges despite a recent rebound in its stock price, trading above one dollar. The company faces potential class-action lawsuits following a significant 47% reduction in its 2025 revenue forecast, attributed to delays in its "DeFi Alpha" arbitrage strategy. A critical deadline of January 30, 2026, looms for investors to file as lead plaintiffs, as new management works to rebuild confidence.

feed.title: BNY Extends Digital Cash Capabilities for Institutional Clients
feed.summary: BNY has launched a new capability to tokenize client deposit balances on its Digital Assets platform, aiming to advance programmable, on-chain cash for institutional market infrastructure. This initiative extends BNY's cash capabilities by creating on-chain digital book entries for existing demand deposit claims, operating on a private, permissioned blockchain with established risk frameworks. The move is designed to reduce settlement friction, improve liquidity efficiency in collateral and margin workflows, and enable programmable payments, with various financial institutions and digital asset participants supporting the effort.

feed.title: Onfolio Holdings receives Nasdaq notice on minimum bid price deficiency
feed.summary: Onfolio Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:ONFO) has received a notice from Nasdaq for not meeting the minimum bid price requirement, as its stock remained below $1.00 for 33 consecutive business days. The company has 180 calendar days, until July 6, 2026, to regain compliance, potentially through a reverse stock split. This recent news follows a third-quarter loss of $0.16 per share despite a 36.3% rise in revenue, and strategic moves involving debt reduction and investments in cryptocurrency assets like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana.

feed.title: Stocks making big moves this week: Parsons, Lockheed Martin, Coinbase, Affiliated Managers Group, and Varonis Systems
feed.summary: This article highlights several stocks that made significant moves this week, including Parsons (PSN), Lockheed Martin (LMT), Coinbase (COIN), Affiliated Managers Group (AMG), and Varonis Systems (VRNS). These movements were driven by analyst ratings, defense budget proposals, diversification into stable crypto services, and strong financial performance.

feed.title: Fidelity’s Crypto Fund Is Giving Investors A Rare Opportunity Right Now
feed.summary: The Fidelity Crypto Industry and Digital Payments ETF (FDIG) provides diversified exposure to the crypto ecosystem, allocating significant portions to direct Bitcoin exposure and Bitcoin mining companies. The fund has recently seen a substantial decline from its late 2025 peak, largely mirroring Bitcoin's price drop. This decline is partly attributed to the underperformance of Bitcoin mining stocks due to increased mining difficulty and falling hashprice throughout 2025, suggesting a potential opportunity for investors if Bitcoin's price rallies.

feed.title: The US spot Solana ETF saw no net inflows yesterday.
feed.summary: The US spot Solana ETF experienced no net inflows yesterday, according to data from SoSoValue. This indicates a period of neutral investor interest in the Solana ETF market. The article is a brief report on this specific financial activity.

feed.title: Mega Matrix Partners with Ihsan Dhahab to Develop an Islamic Precious Metals Real-World Asset Ecosystem
feed.summary: Mega Matrix Inc. announced a partnership with Ihsan Dhahab Sdn Bhd to develop a comprehensive Islamic precious metals real-world asset ecosystem. This collaboration, formalized through an MOU, focuses on establishing a special economic zone in the Middle East, creating Shariah-compliant gold-backed tokens and a digital exchange, and setting up an Islamic digital bullion bank. Mega Matrix will provide technical and financial advisory support, while Ihsan Dhahab will leverage its regional expertise for strategic direction and regulatory approvals.

feed.title: BitFuFu Announces December 2025 Bitcoin Production and Operational Updates
feed.summary: BitFuFu (NASDAQ: FUFU) announced its December 2025 Bitcoin production and operational metrics, highlighting 188 BTC mined, 26.1 EH/s hashrate under management, and a significant reduction in pledged BTC. The company reported holding 1,780 BTC and expressed an optimistic outlook for 2026, citing improved liquidity and Bitcoin's recent strength. BitFuFu will also be attending the DealFlow Discovery Conference in January 2026.

feed.title: A cripto entra no banco: Morgan Stanley lança sua carteira
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley is set to launch a hybrid digital asset wallet in 2026, combining cryptocurrencies with tokenized real-world assets (RWA). This move signals Wall Street's deeper integration with the crypto sector, aiming to bridge traditional finance with digital innovation. The bank is also expanding its crypto access through ETF applications and E*Trade integration, emphasizing controlled exposure for clients.

feed.title: Why Riot Platforms (RIOT) Is Up 6.9% After Pivoting Bitcoin Proceeds Into AI Data Centers
feed.summary: Riot Platforms is shifting its business model from pure Bitcoin mining to AI-focused data center infrastructure. The company sold 1,818 Bitcoin for $161.6 million and raised over $600.53 million in equity to fund this pivot. Investors are now focused on Riot's ability to secure tenants for its expanding data center capacity, as the company has also transitioned to quarterly reporting centered on overall business performance rather than monthly production reports.

feed.title: Stocks making big moves this week: Parsons, Lockheed Martin, Coinbase, Affiliated Managers Group, and Varonis Systems
feed.summary: This article highlights several companies whose stocks made significant moves this week. Parsons, Lockheed Martin, Coinbase, Affiliated Managers Group, and Varonis Systems all saw their stock prices rise due to analyst actions, company performance, or external factors like proposed defense budget increases. The piece provides a brief reason for each company's stock movement.

feed.title: Data: 121,600 SOL transferred to Galaxy Digital, valued at approximately $16.78 million
feed.summary: Arkham data indicates that 121,600 SOL, worth approximately $16.78 million, was transferred from an anonymous address to Galaxy Digital. This transaction occurred at 01:31 according to ChainCatcher's reporting. The article highlights this significant cryptocurrency movement to a major digital asset investment firm.

feed.title: CleanSpark Releases December 2025 Bitcoin Mining Update
feed.summary: CleanSpark, Inc. announced its December 2025 Bitcoin mining and operations update, reporting over a 10% year-over-year increase in Bitcoin production despite rising network difficulty. The company also highlighted strategic achievements from 2025, including its expansion into AI data centers in Georgia and Texas, and its demand response capabilities demonstrated in Tennessee. CleanSpark completed an upsized $1.15 billion convertible notes offering to support its power portfolio growth.

feed.title: Broadridge's Distributed Ledger Repo Platform Processes Nearly $9 Trillion in December
feed.summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions announced that its Distributed Ledger Repo (DLR) platform processed an average of $384 billion in daily repo transactions in December 2025, totaling nearly $9 trillion. This represents a 490% year-over-year increase in daily average, underscoring significant institutional adoption of tokenized real-asset settlement. Broadridge expects continued expansion in participants and use cases for DLR in 2026, solidifying its role in the future of capital markets.

feed.title: Consensys-backed SharpLink stakes $170 million in ETH on Linea
feed.summary: Consensys-backed Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink Gaming has deployed $170 million worth of ether on Linea, a Layer 2 blockchain from Consensys, as part of its strategy to optimize yield from its extensive ETH holdings. This deployment combines native Ethereum staking yield with restaking rewards from EigenCloud, direct incentives from Linea and Ether.fi, all managed with institutional-grade custody by Anchorage. SharpLink aims to capture competitive, risk-adjusted, ETH-denominated returns and has amassed the second-largest corporate ETH treasury, with 864,840 ETH valued at approximately $2.7 billion.

feed.title: Mega Matrix Partners with Ihsan Dhahab to Develop an Islamic Precious Metals Real-World Asset Ecosystem
feed.summary: Mega Matrix Inc. (MPU) has partnered with Ihsan Dhahab to establish a comprehensive Islamic precious metals real-world asset (RWA) ecosystem. This collaboration, formalized through a Memorandum of Understanding, aims to develop a Shariah-compliant gold-backed token and stablecoin, a precious metals exchange, an Islamic digital gold bank, and an integrated precious metals special economic zone primarily in Saudi Arabia. MPU will provide technical expertise in Web3 and stablecoins, while Ihsan Dhahab will leverage its local market knowledge and Islamic finance expertise for strategic direction and regulatory approvals.
