feed.title: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ:DVLT) Announces a Distribution Date of February 21, 2026 for the Dream Bowl Meme Coin II tokens to Eligible Record Equityholders of Datavault AI
feed.summary: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ:DVLT) has announced February 21, 2026, as the distribution date for its Dream Bowl Meme Coin II tokens to eligible record equity holders. The tokens will be distributed at a ratio of one token for every sixty shares of Datavault AI common stock held as of January 7, 2026. Recipients must open a digital wallet with Datavault AI and agree to specific terms, and the company emphasizes that the tokens are digital collectibles for personal use and not intended as investments or financial products.

feed.title: DeFi Development Corp. Releases 2025 Year in Review Highlighting Breakout Growth and Solana Treasury Leadership
feed.summary: DeFi Development Corp. (Nasdaq: DFDV) has released its 2025 Year in Review, showcasing significant growth and its leadership in Solana treasury management. The company, which is the first public entity with a primary treasury allocation to Solana (SOL), raised approximately $378 million and accumulated over 2 million SOL in just nine months. DFDV achieved an 853% return, becoming the top-performing crypto stock of the year and the third-best on Nasdaq, through innovative capital market strategies and active participation in the Solana ecosystem.

feed.title: BTCS Inc. 2025 revenue reaches $16 million, Ethereum holdings exceed 70,000 tokens
feed.summary: BTCS Inc. announced its unaudited 2025 revenue reached $16 million, marking a 290% year-on-year increase and a new historical high, driven by its Builder+, node operations, and Imperium businesses. The company's total assets grew by 600%, with Ethereum holdings exceeding 70,000 ETH by the end of 2025. BTCS plans to continue focusing on Ethereum-centric, revenue-generating cryptocurrency infrastructure in 2026.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Inc. (DEFT) Shareholders Who Lost Money Have Opportunity to Lead Securities Fraud Lawsuit
feed.summary: Glancy Prongay & Murray LLP has announced a securities fraud class action lawsuit against DeFi Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: DEFT), encouraging shareholders who incurred losses between May 12, 2025, and November 14, 2025, to come forward. The lawsuit alleges that DeFi failed to disclose significant delays in its arbitrage strategy, understated competition, and was unlikely to meet its 2025 revenue guidance, thereby misleading investors. Affected investors have until January 30, 2026, to actively participate as lead plaintiffs.

feed.title: After audit work, Above Food nears merger with digital‑asset firm
feed.summary: Above Food Ingredients Inc. (ABVE) announced that it expects to file its audited fiscal 2025 results by the end of January 2026, which will satisfy Nasdaq reporting requirements. The company has completed a significant restructuring, resulting in a streamlined balance sheet, and expects to meet or exceed its profit target for fiscal 2026. This filing will precede the final closing of its transformative merger with Palm Global, a company focused on digital currency and real-world asset tokenization.

feed.title: YZi Labs Accuses CEA Industries Board of Entrenchment, Manipulation
feed.summary: YZi Labs, a major investor in CEA Industries (BNC), has launched a public campaign alleging the board is engaging in manipulative behavior to silence shareholders and pivot away from its original BNB-focused strategy. YZi, which supports the BNB Chain strategy, claims the board's "poison pill" and bylaw amendments are entrenchment tactics. The dispute highlights governance challenges in crypto-linked public companies and calls for a "free and fair" election process for the upcoming Annual Meeting.

feed.title: State of Wyoming Debuts $FRNT, the Nation’s First State-Issued Stable Token, with Franklin Templeton-Managed Reserves
feed.summary: Wyoming has launched $FRNT (Frontier Stable Token), the first state-issued stable token in the U.S., with Franklin Templeton managing its reserves and serving as custodian. This initiative aims to combine the security of state oversight with blockchain efficiency, investing solely in U.S. dollars and short-duration U.S. Treasuries. The stable token is available on Kraken (Solana) and Rain (Avalanche), offering instant settlement and low transaction costs globally.

feed.title: Index Insights: December
feed.summary: December saw equity indices experience an early rise, followed by a mid-month decline, and a subsequent rebound, resulting in minimal changes by month-end for most. The S&P 500 Index saw a slight decline of 0.05% but ended the year up over 16%, while the Cboe U.S. Lag 50 Index increased and the Cboe U.S. Lead 50 Index declined, suggesting a rebalancing towards underperforming stocks. Volatility remained low, and several premium-selling and put-writing indices showed positive returns, with crypto indices stabilizing after a November drop.

feed.title: Bit Digital Inc. Reports Monthly Ethereum Treasury and Staking Metrics for December 2025
feed.summary: Bit Digital, Inc. (Nasdaq: BTBT) announced its Ethereum treasury and staking metrics for December 2025, reporting approximately 155,227.3 ETH holdings valued at $460.5 million. The company acquired 366.8 ETH during the month, staked an additional 642 ETH, bringing total staked ETH to 89% of its holdings, and generated 389.6 ETH in staking rewards. Bit Digital also holds a significant stake in WhiteFiber (Nasdaq: WYFI).

feed.title: Win For Bitcoin Giant Strategy As MSCI Pauses Decision To Exclude Digital Asset Treasury Firms From Indexes
feed.summary: MSCI has announced it will not proceed with its proposal to alter how it classifies companies with significant exposure to digital assets. This decision is a win for firms with digital asset treasuries, including those heavily invested in Bitcoin. The pause means these companies will not be excluded from MSCI's indexes based on their digital asset holdings.

feed.title: Barclays Invests in Crypto Connectivity Startup Ubyx
feed.summary: Barclays has made its first significant investment in digital currency infrastructure by backing Ubyx, a US-based clearing system for digital money founded in 2025. This strategic move highlights Barclays' focus on regulated interoperability for stablecoins and tokenized deposits, rather than issuing its own digital currency. Ubyx aims to unify the fragmented digital money landscape through a many-to-many clearing system, facilitating seamless redemption and acceptance.

feed.title: XRP ETF Withdrawn by Top Issuer: Key Reason
feed.summary: WisdomTree has withdrawn its application for an XRP Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF), a move that puzzled the crypto community. While the exact reason wasn't specified, it's believed the decision was due to market saturation, with several competitors already launching similar products that have garnered significant inflows. Despite WisdomTree's success with Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, their XRP attempt suffered from poor timing in a highly competitive market.

feed.title: Hyperscale Data Announces Estimated Total Assets and Net Assets per Share of $1.14 and $0.50, Respectively, as of December 31, 2025
feed.summary: Hyperscale Data announced estimated total assets of approximately $369 million, or $1.14 per share, and net assets of approximately $168 million, or $0.50 per share, as of December 31, 2025. These preliminary figures highlight the company's strong balance sheet, significant cash and Bitcoin holdings, and ongoing investments in digital assets and AI infrastructure. Hyperscale Data aims to provide monthly updates to stockholders for transparency and long-term value creation.

feed.title: Bitcoin recua para US$ 91 mil, mas Morgan Stanley e Senado dos EUA agitam o mercado cripto em 2026
feed.summary: The crypto market started January 7, 2026, cautiously, with Bitcoin correcting to $91,000, but institutional developments are set to shape the year. Morgan Stanley has applied to launch Bitcoin, Solana, and Ethereum ETFs, signaling deep maturation of crypto financial infrastructure. The US Senate is also set to vote on a comprehensive crypto market bill, which could introduce volatility due to bipartisan concerns.

feed.title: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ:DVLT) Announces a Distribution Date of February 21, 2026 for Warrants to Purchase Common Stock to Eligible Record Equityholders of Datavault AI
feed.summary: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ:DVLT) has announced February 21, 2026, as the distribution date for warrants to purchase shares of its common stock. Eligible record equityholders as of January 7, 2026, will receive one warrant for every sixty shares held, with an exercise price of $5.00 per share. A unique condition for warrant exercise requires holders to possess at least one Dream Bowl Meme Coin II token per warrant.

feed.title: Riot Platforms offloads $161M in Bitcoin in December amid strategy shift
feed.summary: Riot Platforms sold 1,818 Bitcoin for $161.6 million in December as part of a strategic shift away from solely Bitcoin mining. The company aims to monetize its power and data center infrastructure by supporting artificial intelligence workloads, and will transition to quarterly disclosures. This move reflects a broader trend among Bitcoin miners to seek additional revenue streams beyond BTC production, especially after the 2024 halving.

feed.title: Investors Buy the Dip: ProShares’ BITO ETF Sees Fresh Inflows Despite Bitcoin Slump
feed.summary: The ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITO) attracted $18.22 million in new money on January 5, 2026, indicating renewed investor interest despite a recent 23.6% slump in Bitcoin's value over the past three months. This significant inflow suggests some investors are "buying the dip" and using BITO as a liquid way to gain Bitcoin exposure, positioning for a potential medium-term recovery.

feed.title: Wyoming launches first state-backed digital dollar token for public use
feed.summary: Wyoming has launched $FRNT (Frontier Stable Token), the first state-issued stable token in the United States, with Franklin Templeton managing its reserves and acting as custodian. This initiative aims to combine the security of state-managed reserves with blockchain technology's efficiency and transparency. $FRNT offers public accountability and transparent oversight, with its reserves held in trust by the State of Wyoming and invested in U.S. dollars and short-duration U.S. Treasuries.

feed.title: Barclays makes first Stablecoin bet with investment in Ubyx settlement firm
feed.summary: Barclays has made its first direct investment in a stablecoin-related company, acquiring a stake in Ubyx, a US-based startup specializing in stablecoin clearing and settlement. This move aligns with Barclays' strategy to explore new forms of regulated and tokenized money, mitigating risk by focusing on infrastructure rather than issuing its own digital currency. The investment signals growing collaboration between traditional finance and blockchain startups, positioning Barclays at the intersection of regulated finance and blockchain innovation, and potentially reshaping cross-border payments.

feed.title: State of Wyoming Debuts $FRNT, the Nation’s First State-Issued Stable Token, with Franklin Templeton-Managed Reserves
feed.summary: The State of Wyoming has launched $FRNT (Frontier Stable Token), the first state-issued stable token in the United States, with Franklin Templeton managing its reserves and providing custody services. This initiative aims to expand access, lower costs, and strengthen public trust in digital assets through transparent regulation and blockchain technology. Unlike privately issued stablecoins, $FRNT offers public accountability, with reserves held in trust by the State of Wyoming and invested exclusively in U.S. dollars and short-duration U.S. Treasuries.

feed.title: Strategy Inc stock rises after MSCI drops plan to kick bitcoin-treasury firms out of indexes
feed.summary: Strategy Inc. (MSTR.O) saw its stock rise after MSCI announced it would not remove companies holding significant digital assets from its indexes, alleviating a major technical risk. While this offers a reprieve, analysts note that the issue may only be postponed, and the broader review could still lead to reclassification for firms like Strategy, which holds substantial bitcoin on its balance sheet. The company recently purchased more bitcoin and reported a significant Q4 unrealized loss related to crypto prices.

feed.title: Grayscale Investments® Announces Rebalancing of Multi-Asset Funds for Fourth Quarter 2025
feed.summary: Grayscale Investments has announced the rebalancing of its Multi-Asset Funds, including the Grayscale Decentralized Finance (DeFi) Fund, Grayscale Smart Contract Fund, and Grayscale Decentralized AI Fund, for the fourth quarter of 2025. This rebalancing adjusts the weightings of the digital assets within each fund's portfolio based on their respective methodologies. The article details the specific asset weightings for each fund as of January 6, 2026.

feed.title: Bitcoin prices rise: Are BTC ETF inflows setting up a $100K move?
feed.summary: Bitcoin has surpassed $90,000, signaling strengthening demand and stability, with short-term holder losses narrowing and approaching breakeven. Institutional and retail investors are increasing accumulation, evidenced by significant U.S. spot Bitcoin ETF inflows and BTC withdrawals from exchanges. These factors, alongside rising global M2 money supply, suggest a strong potential for Bitcoin to close the gap to $100,000.

feed.title: Yield Hits Ethereum ETFs: Grayscale ETHE Distributes Staking Rewards in First-Ever US Crypto ETP Move
feed.summary: Grayscale's ETHE has made history by distributing staking rewards to its shareholders, becoming the first US-based crypto ETP to do so. This move signifies a new era for Ethereum ETFs, allowing investors to potentially earn yield directly from their ETP holdings.

feed.title: Upexi targets higher-yield Solana treasury strategy for 2026 as holdings near 2.2 million SOL
feed.summary: Upexi (UPXI) plans to implement a new risk-adjusted yield strategy for its Solana treasury in 2026, aiming to increase returns without disrupting current operations. The company's Solana holdings have grown to nearly 2.2 million SOL, and it has been repurchasing shares and seeing insider purchases despite a prolonged crypto market downturn. This move comes as Upexi's share price has significantly fallen, reflecting broader market pressures on digital-asset treasury firms.

feed.title: Bitcoin Slumps, Bears Pile In: Big Money Rushes Into ProShares UltraShort Bitcoin ETF
feed.summary: The ProShares UltraShort Bitcoin ETF (SBIT) saw significant inflows of over $5 million on January 2, 2026, indicating a strong bearish sentiment or hedging activity against Bitcoin. This large inflow, representing 4.27% of the fund's assets under management, suggests traders are positioning for further price declines despite some short-term technical indicators flashing a "Buy" for Bitcoin. The market is watching to see if these inflows are smart hedging or a crowded bearish trade.

feed.title: Bed Bath & Beyond's Marcus Lemonis Says These Big 'Beyond' Changes Will Win Back Customers
feed.summary: Bed Bath & Beyond's new CEO, Marcus Lemonis, has unveiled a new strategic reset focusing on broader customer support and services beyond just retail. This strategy includes three pillars: omnichannel retail, digital and financial services including blockchain, and targeting key moments in home ownership with an AI-powered operating system called Beyond Home OS. Lemonis aims to make home ownership and maintenance easier and more rewarding for customers.

feed.title: Lloyds Runs First UK Tokenised Deposit Deal on Public Blockchain Network
feed.summary: Lloyds Banking Group has successfully completed the UK's first tokenised deposit transaction on a public blockchain network, utilizing the Canton Network. This pioneering deal involved the issuance of tokenised sterling deposits by Lloyds Bank PLC to purchase a tokenised Gilt from Archax, demonstrating interoperability between blockchain and traditional banking systems. The initiative highlights the potential for greater speed, flexibility, and transparency in financial transactions through tokenisation.

feed.title: Morgan Stanley entra com pedido para lançar ETFs de bitcoin e Ethereum
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley has filed three applications with the SEC to launch cryptocurrency ETFs for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana, signaling an expansion into the crypto market. The bank intends to leverage staking for its Ethereum ETF, where rewards will be reinvested into the fund's total assets rather than distributed directly to investors. This move by Morgan Stanley is seen as a significant step towards the institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies, with other financial institutions expected to follow suit.

feed.title: Solana Treasury Firm DeFi Dev Corp Turns to Yield Farming as $1,500 SOL Breakout Looms
feed.summary: Nasdaq-listed DeFi Development Corp is shifting its Solana treasury strategy to actively deploy SOL reserves into on-chain yield strategies through a partnership with Hylo, a Solana-native protocol. This move aims to generate recurring revenue and long-term accumulation, reflecting a broader trend of crypto treasuries functioning as operational tools. Technical analysis suggests a potential breakout for SOL, with a target near $1,500 if it surpasses the $200-$220 resistance level.

feed.title: MicroStrategy surges after MSCI stalls delisting
feed.summary: MicroStrategy's stock surged over 5% after MSCI announced it would not exclude digital asset treasuries (DATs) from its indices, providing a reprieve for the company. MSCI, however, plans further research and consultation on how to classify companies with significant non-operating assets like digital assets, while maintaining the 50% allocation threshold. MicroStrategy, a major Bitcoin holder, had previously argued against the exclusion, stating it is an operating business that uses its BTC holdings to create shareholder returns.

feed.title: Signing Day Sports, Inc. Provides Update on Business Combination
feed.summary: Signing Day Sports, Inc. announced progress on its proposed business combination with BlockchAIn Digital Infrastructure, Inc. The transaction is expected to close in February or March 2026, with Signing Day Sports becoming a wholly owned subsidiary of BlockchAIn Inc. This strategic move aims to enhance digital infrastructure for AI and HPC, pending shareholder and NYSE American listing approvals.

feed.title: BTCS Inc. Reports Record 2025 Revenue of $16 Million and 600% Asset Growth
feed.summary: BTCS Inc. announced record preliminary revenue of approximately $16 million for the year ending December 31, 2025, marking a 290% increase from 2024, alongside a 600% surge in total assets and over 70,500 ETH holdings. The company is focused on developing its Imperium platform and aligning shareholder interests through its unique Bividend program, emphasizing its strategic position within the Ethereum economy beyond just being a crypto operator. CEO Charles Allen expressed confidence in this strategy, aiming for continued growth and consistent financial performance in 2026.

feed.title: A Look At HIVE Digital Technologies (TSXV:HIVE) Valuation After December 2025 Bitcoin Production Update
feed.summary: HIVE Digital Technologies reported its December 2025 production, mining 306 Bitcoin with an average hashrate of 23.3 EH/s. Despite a recent 90-day share price decline, its 3-year performance shows a gain. The company's P/E ratio of 21.2x is below software peers but above an estimated fair P/E of 6.1x, suggesting it could be seen as expensive based on some fundamental models, while offering a discount compared to industry averages.

feed.title: DeFi Development Corp. Reports Record Year in 2025 with Innovative Solana Treasury Strategies and 853% Stock Performance
feed.summary: DeFi Development Corp. (DFDV) had a record-breaking year in 2025, raising $378 million and accumulating over 2 million SOL in its Solana-focused treasury. The company achieved an 853% return, making it the top-performing crypto stock and third-best on Nasdaq, driven by innovations like its validator business, liquid staking token (dfdvSOL), and tokenized equity (DFDVx). DFDV aims for 1.0 SOL Per Share by December 2028, but heavy reliance on Solana's volatility presents potential risks for investors.

feed.title: Popular crypto company dumps $162 million in Bitcoin
feed.summary: Riot Platforms, a Bitcoin mining company, sold 1,818 BTC worth $161.6 million in December 2025, marking its largest single-month Bitcoin sale. This extensive sale reflects the significant slump in the crypto market during that period, with the average selling price per BTC dropping from $96,560 in November to $88,870 in December. The company generated 460 Bitcoin in December, and its stock (RIOT) was down 1% in pre-market hours on January 7.

feed.title: Morgan Stanley pede aval para ETFs de Bitcoin, Solana e Ethereum nos EUA
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley has filed regulatory requests with the SEC to launch Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) linked to Bitcoin, Solana, and Ethereum. This marks the first such initiative by a major U.S. bank to directly offer cryptocurrency-backed ETFs. The move comes as regulatory changes under President Donald Trump encourage traditional financial institutions to engage more with the digital asset market.

feed.title: Hyperscale Data Announces Estimated Total Assets and Net Assets per Share of $1.14 and $0.50, Respectively, as of December 31, 2025
feed.summary: Hyperscale Data, Inc. (GPUS) reported estimated total assets of $369 million, or $1.14 per share, and net assets of $168 million, or $0.50 per share, as of December 31, 2025. This unaudited financial data highlights the company's strong balance sheet, digital asset accumulation, and investments in high-performance computing infrastructure. The company plans to provide monthly updates to stockholders for transparency and long-term value creation and anticipates divesting Ault Capital Group, Inc. (ACG) in Q3 2026 to focus on data center operations and digital assets.

feed.title: BTCS Inc. 2025 revenue reaches $16 million, Ethereum holdings exceed 70,000 tokens
feed.summary: Nasdaq-listed blockchain company BTCS Inc. announced its unaudited revenue for 2025 reached $16 million, marking a 290% year-on-year increase and a new historical high, driven by growth in Builder+, node operations, and Imperium businesses. The company's total assets grew by approximately 600%, with Ethereum holdings exceeding 70,000 ETH by year-end 2025. BTCS plans to continue focusing on Ethereum-centric, revenue-generating cryptocurrency infrastructure and expanding its Imperium business and ecosystem partnerships in 2026.

feed.title: How BONK.fun turned ecosystem activity into a $1M boost for Bonk
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (BNKK) announced a $1 million strategic injection into its Q4 2025 balance sheet, comprising $500,000 in cash for liquidity and $500,000 in BONK digital assets for its treasury. This move, stemming from its majority interest in BONK.fun, validates the company's "revenue-to-treasury" model and advances its goal to accumulate 5% of BONK's circulating supply. Despite the positive financial news, Bonk's stock saw a 7.02% decline following the announcement, fitting a recent pattern where positive operational updates led to negative market reactions.

feed.title: LM Funding America Announces December 2025 Production and Operational Update
feed.summary: LM Funding America announced its unaudited Bitcoin mining and operational update for December 2025, reporting a record 7.5 Bitcoin mined and a strengthened balance sheet from a $6.1 million equity raise. The company's Bitcoin treasury was valued at $31.4 million or $1.46 per share by the end of December 2025, and they continued to scale their immersion mining capacity.

feed.title: Solana Treasury Firm DeFi Dev Corp. Ventures Into Yield Farming
feed.summary: Nasdaq-listed DeFi Development Corp. plans to deploy a portion of its Solana treasury into yield-generating on-chain strategies through a partnership with Solana-based protocol Hylo. This move aims to grow the firm's SOL treasury, support operational needs, and signifies a broader trend of publicly listed companies actively managing crypto treasuries as operational assets. The partnership is expected to enhance returns and provide exposure to emerging incentive structures within the Solana ecosystem.

feed.title: DeFi Development Corp. Releases 2025 Year in Review
feed.summary: DeFi Development Corp. (DFDV) has released its 2025 Year in Review, detailing its transformation into a leading Solana-focused treasury. The company raised $378 million, surpassed 2 million SOL in holdings, launched a validator business, and became the top-performing crypto stock and third-best-performing Nasdaq stock in 2025 with an 853% return. Key milestones include global expansion, community validators, and forward-looking SOL Per Share guidance.

feed.title: Bit Digital Inc. Reports Monthly Ethereum Treasury and Staking Metrics for December 2025
feed.summary: Bit Digital, Inc. reported its monthly Ethereum treasury and staking metrics for December 2025, highlighting holdings of approximately 155,227.3 ETH with a market value of $460.5 million. The company acquired 366.8 ETH during December and staked an additional 642 ETH, bringing total staked ETH to ~138,263, representing ~89% of its holdings and generating an annualized yield of approximately 3.5% in staking rewards. Bit Digital also maintains a significant equity stake in WhiteFiber.

feed.title: Barclays invests in Ubyx to build stablecoin settlement infrastructure
feed.summary: Barclays has invested in Ubyx, a company specializing in enterprise-grade stablecoin settlement infrastructure. This investment aims to enhance the bank's capabilities in leveraging stablecoins for regulated financial settlement, signaling a growing interest in blockchain technology within traditional finance. Ubyx's platform focuses on security, compliance, and scalability, key factors for its adoption in institutional settings.

feed.title: Morgan Stanley’s Bitcoin and Solana ETF filings drag a big U.S. bank deeper into crypto
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley Investment Management has filed for two crypto-linked exchange-traded products, the Morgan Stanley Bitcoin Trust and the Morgan Stanley Solana Trust, signaling a major U.S. bank's deeper entry into the crypto market. While the Bitcoin Trust is a passive vehicle, the Solana Trust aims to reflect staking rewards. This move is seen by some as an effort to retain client fee income and comes amidst a crowded crypto ETF market.

feed.title: MSCI Confirms Continued Index Inclusion for Digital Asset Treasury Companies
feed.summary: MSCI announced on January 6, 2026, that it would not implement the proposed exclusion of Digital Asset Treasury Companies from its Global Investable Market Indexes. This decision confirms the continued index inclusion for such companies, provided they meet all other requirements. H100 Group AB, which was included in the MSCI Global Micro Cap Index in August 2025, welcomed this clarity, viewing it as supportive of institutional visibility.

feed.title: Blink Charging Launches Cryptocurrency Payments at DC Fast Chargers
feed.summary: Blink Charging has introduced cryptocurrency payment options, specifically USD Coin (USDC) on Ethereum, Arbitrum, Polygon, and Base networks, at select DC fast charging stations in the United States. This initial rollout in two Florida locations is the first phase of a broader expansion planned throughout 2026. The move aims to cater to growing consumer interest in using digital assets for everyday transactions, with significant interest noted among younger demographics.

feed.title: Bitcoin ETFs Bring The Heat: $1.2 Billion Flows In First 48 Hours—Analyst
feed.summary: Spot Bitcoin ETFs in the US have seen a significant inflow of $1.2 billion in the first two trading days of 2026, with Bloomberg analyst Eric Balchunas estimating an annualized pace of $150 billion. This surge, following a strong performance in 2025, indicates growing institutional interest, highlighted by Morgan Stanley's recent filings for Bitcoin and Solana ETFs. The demand is expected to absorb circulating Bitcoin supply, potentially impacting market liquidity and price.

feed.title: Hyperscale Data Announces Estimated Total Assets and Net Assets per Share of $1.14 and $0.50, Respectively, as of December 31, 2025
feed.summary: Hyperscale Data announced its estimated financial position as of December 31, 2025, with total assets of approximately $369 million ($1.14 per share) and net assets of about $168 million ($0.50 per share). These preliminary figures highlight the company's significant cash and Bitcoin holdings, strong balance sheet, and ongoing investments in high-performance computing infrastructure. The company plans to provide monthly updates to stockholders for transparency and long-term value creation.

feed.title: Brian Quintenz Joins SUI Group Board of Directors
feed.summary: Former CFTC Commissioner Brian Quintenz has been appointed to the SUI Group's board of directors, effective January 5, 2026. This strategic move aims to enhance the company's regulatory leadership and bolster its SUI treasury strategy. Quintenz's expertise is expected to increase institutional confidence in SUI Group and potentially advance institutional adoption within the digital asset landscape.

feed.title: SMX Announces $111.5M Equity Purchase Agreement with Target Capital 1, LLC
feed.summary: SMX (Security Matters) PLC has entered into an equity purchase agreement with Target Capital 1, LLC, totaling $111.5 million. This agreement includes the purchase of a $11.5 million convertible promissory note and an option for Target Capital to purchase up to $100 million in SMX ordinary shares, providing SMX with flexible funding for business development. A portion of the net proceeds will also be used to acquire bitcoin or another cryptocurrency as a reserve asset, subject to mutual consent.

feed.title: Solana Treasury Firm DeFi Dev Corp Turns to Yield Farming to Boost SOL Reserves
feed.summary: DeFi Development Corp (DFDV) has announced it will deploy a portion of its Solana treasury into on-chain yield-generating strategies through a partnership with Hylo. This move aims to actively compound SOL, fund operations, and strengthen its Solana holdings, rather than leaving assets idle. The revenue generated will support DFDV's budget, increase SOL holdings, and assist with share repayments, furthering the company's "Treasury Accelerator Program."

feed.title: Solana treasury firm cuts ties with analyst over default allegations
feed.summary: Upexi, a Nasdaq-listed consumer products company focused on Solana treasury, has terminated its asset management agreement with GSR Strategies. The termination on December 26, 2025, followed months of mutual default allegations, escalating into arbitration. Despite the dispute, Upexi plans to ring the Nasdaq Closing Bell, signaling confidence.

feed.title: Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms (RIOT) raised $200 million via BTC sales
feed.summary: Bitcoin mining company Riot Platforms (RIOT) sold $200 million worth of Bitcoin in November and December 2025 to fund the first phase of its Corsicana AI data center build. VanEck’s head of digital assets, Matthew Sigel, noted that these sales represent a growing trend of miners funding AI infrastructure by selling BTC, particularly when credit conditions are tight. These sales may also have contributed to Bitcoin's price decline in 2025.

feed.title: Should You Invest $100 in SoFi Technologies Right Now?
feed.summary: SoFi Technologies is presented as a promising growth stock, with its shares surging 70% in 2025 and strong third-quarter earnings growth driven by its financial services segment. The company's investments in blockchain and AI are highlighted as key future growth drivers, despite its current high valuation. Analysts project strong annualized earnings growth, making it a potential buy-and-hold investment.

feed.title: Signing Day Sports Provides Transaction Update on Proposed
feed.summary: Signing Day Sports (NYSE American: SGN) has provided an update on its proposed business combination with BlockchAIn Digital Infrastructure, Inc. The transaction is progressing, with BlockchAIn Inc. having filed a Registration Statement on Form S-4 with the SEC. The closing of the transaction is anticipated in February or March 2026, subject to shareholder approval and NYSE American listing approval, and is expected to make Signing Day Sports a wholly owned subsidiary of BlockchAIn Inc.

feed.title: DeFi Development Corp. Releases 2025 Year in Review Highlighting Breakout Growth and Solana Treasury Leadership
feed.summary: DeFi Development Corp. (DFDV) has released its 2025 Year in Review, detailing its transformation into a leading Solana-focused treasury. The company achieved significant milestones, including raising $378 million, surpassing 2 million SOL in treasury holdings, and launching its own validator business. DFDV ended 2025 as the top-performing crypto stock of the year, delivering an 853% return.

feed.title: LM Funding mined 7.5 BTC in December and purchased 47 BTC.
feed.summary: LM Funding America, Inc. (NASDAQ: LMFA) announced a record monthly Bitcoin production of 7.5 BTC in December 2025. The company also purchased 47 bitcoins for approximately $6.1 million through recent equity financing and is expanding its immersion mining facility. As of December 31, 2025, LMFA held 356.3 bitcoins, valued at about $31.4 million.

feed.title: Forex.com Owner StoneX Adds Crypto Offering Under MiCA Licence
feed.summary: StoneX Digital, part of the StoneX Group which also owns Forex.com, has secured a Crypto-Asset Service Provider licence under the EU's MiCA regulation from the Central Bank of Ireland. This authorization allows StoneX Digital to provide digital asset execution and custody services to institutional and corporate clients across the EU. The move aligns with StoneX Group's long-term strategy and follows a period of strong financial performance for its FX and CFD trading business.

feed.title: |8 Lessons for Investors From Market Turbulence in 2025
feed.summary: |The article outlines eight key lessons for investors derived from the market turbulence of 2025, offering insights on forecasting difficulties, equity valuations, inflation, the US dollar, international diversification, gold, cryptocurrency, and private credit strategies. It emphasizes the importance of patience, diversification, and maintaining a long-term perspective in the face of market uncertainties. The author suggests specific strategies, such as including inflation hedges and non-dollar assets, to build portfolio resilience for the future.

feed.title: Token Economy Leader Open World and VerifyMe Announce Plans to List on Nasdaq via Proposed Strategic Merger
feed.summary: Open World Ltd. and VerifyMe, Inc. (NASDAQ: VRME) have announced a letter of intent for a strategic merger, with plans for the combined entity to continue listing on Nasdaq under a new ticker symbol. This merger aims to create a leader in institutional-grade on-chain solutions and real-world asset tokenization, leveraging Open World's expertise in Web3 ecosystem launches and VerifyMe's precision logistics and brand protection technologies. The combined company will focus on providing compliant, enterprise-grade infrastructure for the digital economy, addressing key barriers to digital asset adoption such as identity, security, and regulatory alignment.

feed.title: Investors Tiptoe Back Into Ethereum as Bitwise’s ETHW ETF Sees $19 Million Inflow
feed.summary: The Bitwise Ethereum ETF, ETHW, experienced a significant $18.99 million inflow on January 5, 2026, signaling renewed investor confidence despite a recent 32.1% drop in Ethereum's price over the past three months. This substantial inflow, representing about 5% of the fund's AUM, suggests a "buy-the-dip" strategy by institutional and sophisticated retail investors, anticipating a long-term recovery for the cryptocurrency.

feed.title: Hyperscale Data Announces Estimated Total Assets and Net Assets per Share of $1.14 and $0.50, Respectively, as of December 31, 2025
feed.summary: Hyperscale Data announced its estimated total assets of $369 million ($1.14 per share) and net assets of $168 million ($0.50 per share) as of December 31, 2025. These unaudited figures highlight the company's strong balance sheet, including $91 million in cash and Bitcoin holdings, and its ongoing investments in high-performance computing infrastructure and digital assets. Executive Chairman Milton "Todd" Ault III emphasized a commitment to transparency through monthly updates for stockholders.

feed.title: RETRANSMISSION: HIVE Digital Technologies Delivers Strong Year-Over-Year, Quarter-Over-Quarter and Month-Over-Month Growth, Maintaining over 2% of the Global Bitcoin Network
feed.summary: HIVE Digital Technologies reported strong December 2025 Bitcoin production results, showcasing significant year-over-year, quarter-over-quarter, and month-over-month growth, while maintaining over 2% of the global Bitcoin network. The company produced 306 BTC in December 2025, a 197% increase year-over-year, and plans to expand its hydroelectric-powered data center capacity in Paraguay by an additional 100 megawatts by Q3 2026. This growth and expansion highlight HIVE's operational resilience and strategic focus on green energy infrastructure for Bitcoin mining and AI computing.

feed.title: Short Ether Crowd Hits the Exit: Nearly 5% of ProShares UltraShort Ether ETF’s Assets Redeemed in a Day
feed.summary: The ProShares UltraShort Ether ETF (ETHD) experienced significant outflows on January 2, 2026, with nearly 5% of its assets being redeemed. This withdrawal suggests that short traders may be taking profits or adjusting their risk exposure after a volatile quarter for Ether. Despite a recent 32.09% decline in ETH-USD over three months, the near-term technical outlook is neutral, potentially encouraging short sellers to exit their positions.

feed.title: Brian Quintenz Joins SUI Group Board of Directors
feed.summary: Former CFTC Commissioner Brian Quintenz has been appointed to the SUI Group Holdings Ltd. board of directors, effective January 5, 2026. This strategic move aims to enhance regulatory leadership and strengthen the SUI treasury strategy, potentially boosting institutional confidence and adoption of the Sui ecosystem. His expertise in digital asset regulations is expected to be critical for maintaining institutional rigor and engaging with policymakers.

feed.title: The iShares MSCI World ETF: A Concentrated Bet on U.S. Technology
feed.summary: The iShares MSCI World ETF (URTH) is increasingly concentrated in U.S. technology stocks, with the U.S. constituting about 70% of its holdings, making its performance closely tied to a few American tech giants. Recent MSCI methodology decisions have temporarily stabilized the fund by postponing the removal of Digital Asset Treasury firms, avoiding significant outflows. However, investors face potential reweighting risks, valuation concerns in the tech sector, and the influence of systematic fund flows.

feed.title: Hut 8 (HUT) Touches 4-Year High on Bitcoin Frenzy
feed.summary: Hut 8 (HUT) stock reached a four-year high, driven by its subsidiary's increased Bitcoin holdings, placing the company among the top 20 treasury holders of the cryptocurrency. The company also announced a significant $7 billion 15-year data center leasing agreement with Fluidstack, with a potential to increase to $17.7 billion, supported by Google as a financial backstop. This surge reflects renewed cryptocurrency strength and positive corporate developments.

feed.title: CIFR Shares Plummet: Opportunity or Warning?
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (CIFR) stock has fallen by 3.63% amidst anticipation of its financial performance reveal and broader cryptocurrency market uncertainty. The company's Q3 financial results showed a net loss despite increased revenue, with significant infrastructure investments and high debt-to-equity ratio indicating a high-risk expansion strategy. While gross margins are healthy, negative pretax and profit margins, alongside a high price-to-sales ratio, suggest potential overvaluation and fiscal challenges, leaving investors to weigh the opportunity of future growth against current financial risks.

feed.title: Key facts: Barclays invests in U.S. stablecoin firm Ubyx; repurchases 56.45M shares
feed.summary: Barclays has made its first stablecoin-related investment in the U.S. firm Ubyx, aligning with its strategy to explore digital money and tokenized assets. Additionally, Barclays repurchased 56.45 million shares on January 6, 2026, reducing its issued share capital.

feed.title: Netcapital Acquires Iverson Design Assets and Proprietary AI Design Technology Suite
feed.summary: Netcapital Inc. (NASDAQ: NCPL, NCPLW) has acquired Iverson Design, LLC, along with its full intellectual property portfolio including AI-driven design and rendering technologies. This acquisition aims to enhance Netcapital's transition to tokenization and digital asset offerings by providing visually appealing and easy-to-understand experiences for investors and issuers. Michael Iverson, founder of Iverson Design, will join Netcapital as Chief Design Director and Head of AI Experience.

feed.title: Shares of Strategy Inc. rose 5.7% after MSCI decided not to remove digital asset treasury companies from its indexes
feed.summary: Shares of Strategy Inc. rose 5.7% following MSCI's decision not to remove digital asset treasury companies from its indexes. This indicates a positive market response to the index provider's decision regarding companies involved in digital assets.

feed.title: Riot Platforms sells $161 million in Bitcoin, trimming its holdings to 18,005 BTC
feed.summary: Riot Platforms sold 1,818 Bitcoin in December 2025 for approximately $161 million, reducing its total holdings to 18,005 BTC. This sale is part of its strategy to fund operational expansions through Bitcoin liquidation. The company will also shift from monthly to quarterly production updates beginning in 2026.

feed.title: Strategy shares jump 5.7% after MSCI keeps digital asset treasury firms in indexes
feed.summary: Shares of Strategy Inc. (MSTR) surged 5.7% after MSCI decided to retain digital asset treasury companies in its indexes, easing market uncertainty for the Bitcoin-heavy firm. MSCI will conduct a broader review to differentiate investment firms from companies utilizing digital assets as a core operational component. Separately, Morgan Stanley has filed with the SEC to launch Bitcoin and Solana ETFs, signaling increased Wall Street interest in cryptocurrency investments.

feed.title: AI for investors
feed.summary: MSCI has decided not to exclude digital asset treasury companies (DATCOs) from its global equity indexes, maintaining the current inclusion rules after investor feedback. This decision defers any potential changes until a broader consultation and review in February 2026. MicroStrategy shares rose 6% in after-hours trading following the announcement, reflecting market relief for bitcoin-heavy firms as immediate forced selling by index-tracking funds is avoided.

feed.title: Solana treasury firm cuts ties with analyst over default allegations
feed.summary: Upexi, a Nasdaq-listed consumer products company, has terminated its asset management agreement with crypto research firm GSR Strategies, effective December 26, 2025. This follows months of disputes and mutual default allegations regarding GSR's management of Upexi's digital asset treasury, which includes a significant holding in Solana (SOL). The conflict has escalated to arbitration, with Upexi planning to vigorously defend against counterclaims.

feed.title: Strategy jumps as MSCI allows digital asset treasury companies to stay in global indexes
feed.summary: MSCI has decided not to exclude digital asset treasury companies (DATCOs) from its global indexes, providing a massive reprieve for companies like Strategy. This decision led to a sharp rise in shares of affected companies in after-hours trading. While the immediate threat of exclusion is removed, MSCI plans further review and consultation on the treatment of DAT companies, suggesting the possibility of reconsideration in the future.

feed.title: Canaan launches pilot converting Bitcoin mining heat to power greenhouse heating
feed.summary: Canaan Inc. has launched a 3MW pilot project in Manitoba, Canada, in partnership with Bitforest Investment. The project repurposes waste heat from Bitcoin mining using 360 liquid-cooled servers to heat a tomato greenhouse, aiming for 90% energy conversion. This initiative marks Canaan’s first venture into heat recovery applications for its mining hardware in agricultural settings.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Regains Compliance with Nasdaq Minimum Bid Price Requirement
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. announced it has regained compliance with the Nasdaq minimum bid price requirement. The company's common stock maintained a closing bid price of $1.00 or more for at least 10 consecutive business days, securing its continued listing on The Nasdaq Capital Market. This achievement allows Bonk, Inc. to focus on execution and growth in 2026 with a debt-free balance sheet and active digital asset revenue streams.

feed.title: Strategy's stock rallies 5% after MSCI says will not bar DATs 'for the time being'
feed.summary: MSCI has decided against immediately excluding Digital Asset Treasuries (DATs) from its index products, easing uncertainty for crypto-related equities like Strategy. The firm will, however, conduct a broader review of "non-operating companies" to potentially create new assessment criteria for index eligibility, acknowledging institutional investor concerns that some DATs resemble investment funds. Strategy's stock rallied over 4% in after-hours trading following the announcement.

feed.title: MSCI Keeps DAT Companies in Global Indexes: MSTR Stock Up 5%
feed.summary: MSCI announced its decision to keep Digital Assets Treasury (DAT) companies, including Strategy Inc. (MSTR), in its global stock market indexes, reversing an earlier potential exclusion. This decision, influenced by public consultation, led to a 5% surge in MSTR stock and is expected to positively impact the crypto industry, particularly Bitcoin. The inclusion could drive increased demand for Bitcoin and align its price performance with the S&P 500.

feed.title: Strategy Inc (MSTR) stock jumps after hours after MSCI drops index-exclusion plan for bitcoin treasuries
feed.summary: Strategy Inc (MSTR) shares jumped after hours after MSCI announced it would not exclude companies holding significant digital assets from its global stock indexes. This decision avoids potential forced selling by passive funds and supports MicroStrategy's strategy of bitcoin accumulation. The company recently increased its bitcoin holdings and relies on capital markets despite significant unrealized losses on digital assets.

feed.title: Paying to charge your EV with crypto? Some US stations now do it
feed.summary: Blink Charging (NASDAQ: BLNK) has launched cryptocurrency payments at select Blink-owned DC fast charging sites in the U.S., allowing EV drivers to pay with USD Coin (USDC) on Ethereum, Arbitrum, Polygon, and Base networks. The service is live in Chipley, FL and Madison, FL, with plans for further expansion throughout 2026. This initiative aims to increase payment flexibility and convenience for EV drivers, aligning with growing consumer interest in stablecoins for everyday transactions.

feed.title: A Look At Customers Bancorp (CUBI) Valuation As Leadership Formally Transitions To Sam Sidhu
feed.summary: Customers Bancorp (CUBI) has completed a leadership transition with Sam Sidhu becoming CEO, while founder Jay Sidhu moves to Executive Chairman. The company shows strong recent and long-term shareholder returns, and its stock is currently undervalued at $77.17 against a narrative fair value of $85.33, driven by its cubiX platform and digital asset activities. Investors are encouraged to consider the potential for growth, regulatory risks, and compare the P/E ratio against industry averages.

feed.title: YZi Labs Challenges CEA Industries Board Over Crypto Strategy and Shareholder Rights
feed.summary: YZi Labs is confronting CEA Industries' board over its digital asset strategy and governance issues, including the adoption of a "poison pill" and changes to company bylaws that restrict shareholder rights. The investment firm is also concerned about delays to CEA's 2025 annual meeting and alleges inconsistencies in the company's statements regarding its token strategy. This dispute highlights increasing investor scrutiny over governance and transparency in publicly traded crypto-focused companies.

feed.title: Bullish for Strategy? MSCI keeps digital asset treasury companies in indexes
feed.summary: MSCI has decided, for now, not to exclude digital asset treasury companies (DATCOs) from its market index, which led to a 5.7% rise in Michael Saylor’s Strategy shares. While inclusion continues for now, MSCI plans broader consultations to differentiate between investment companies and operational companies holding digital assets. This decision ensures DATCOs remain eligible for passive index funds, preserving demand and liquidity for digital assets.

feed.title: MSCI Will Not Exclude Bitcoin Treasury Companies Like Michael Saylor’s Strategy From Global Indexes
feed.summary: MSCI has decided against excluding digital asset treasury companies (DATCOs), such as Michael Saylor's Strategy, from its global indexes. This decision reverses fears of potential classification as investment funds, which would have led to their removal and significant market outflows. MSCI plans further consultation on non-operating companies but will keep DATCOs included under existing rules for now, alleviating uncertainty in the digital asset market.

feed.title: MSTR News: Strategy surges 6% on MSCI decision not to exclude digital asset treasury firms from indexes
feed.summary: Shares of Michael Saylor-led MicroStrategy (MSTR) surged 6% in after-hours trading following MSCI's decision not to exclude digital asset treasury companies (DATs) from its indexes. MSCI stated that further research is needed to distinguish between investment companies and those holding digital assets as part of core operations. This resolve removes a significant overhang for DATs, potentially boosting capital inflow into the sector and causing Bitcoin to also see a modest gain.

feed.title: Netcapital Inc. Acquires Iverson Design to Enhance Tokenization and Digital Asset Platform
feed.summary: Netcapital Inc. has acquired Iverson Design, LLC, a creative studio specializing in AI-driven design and visualization tools, to enhance its tokenization and digital asset platform. Michael Iverson, the studio's leader, will join Netcapital as Chief Design Director and Head of AI Experience, bringing his expertise and Iverson Design’s intellectual property portfolio. This acquisition aims to simplify complex financial concepts and improve investor experiences through compelling visual content for tokenized investments.

feed.title: Bitcoin Price Nears $95,000 as $697M BTC ETF Inflow Fuels Optimism
feed.summary: Bitcoin's price is approaching $95,000, reaching its highest level in six weeks, driven by a significant $697.25 million inflow into US Spot Bitcoin ETFs on a single day. While strong ETF demand and optimistic analysts like Timothy Peterson point to potential further gains, derivatives data and options market sentiment suggest a more complex picture. This surge in ETF inflows indicates renewed investor confidence in regulated crypto products and could help sustain prices through 2026.

feed.title: AI visuals aim to make tokenized investments easier to grasp
feed.summary: Netcapital (NCPL) has acquired the assets of Iverson Design, including its proprietary AI design and real-time rendering suite, for 980,000 common shares. This acquisition is intended to enhance Netcapital's tokenization and digital asset offerings by making complex financial concepts more visually appealing and understandable for investors and issuers. Michael Iverson, the founder of Iverson Design, will join Netcapital as Chief Design Director and Head of AI Experience.

feed.title: Global X to launch infrastructure ETF while crypto funds surge
feed.summary: Global X is preparing to launch a new ETF focused on US infrastructure development, while two of its cryptocurrency funds have achieved significant asset under management (AUM) milestones. The firm's US Infrastructure Development ETF aims to capitalize on federal spending in the US, and its Australian-listed Global X 21Shares Bitcoin ETF has surpassed $100 million in AUM following US regulatory approvals. Additionally, Global X's Ethereum ETF has accumulated $22.6 million since its 2022 launch, reflecting growing confidence and demand in the crypto sector after recent SEC approvals.

feed.title: Digi Power X Announces 1,150% Year-over-Year Liquidity Growth and Provides Update on Implementation of First B200 GPU Cluster in Alabama with Plans to Begin Data Processing in Q1 2026
feed.summary: Digi Power X Inc. reported a significant 1,150% year-over-year liquidity growth, reaching $100 million as of January 1, 2026, positioning the company to fund its AI infrastructure buildout. The company is deploying its ARMS 200 modular data center platform, has installed its first NVIDIA B200 GPU cluster in Alabama, and plans to launch its GPU-as-a-Service platform, NeoCloudz, in Q1 2026. Digi Power X remains debt-free and is transitioning from cryptocurrency mining to AI-optimized critical load infrastructure.

feed.title: Cipher Welcomes Industry Veterans Lee Bratcher and Drew Armstrong
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ: CIFR) has announced the appointments of Lee Bratcher as Head of Policy and Government Affairs and Drew Armstrong as Head of Strategic Initiatives. These industry veterans are expected to strengthen Cipher's team and support its continued growth in industrial-scale data centers, bitcoin mining, and high-performance computing (HPC) hosting. Bratcher brings extensive experience in energy policy and regulatory landscapes, particularly in Texas, while Armstrong's background includes leadership roles in digital infrastructure and early investments in bitcoin mining infrastructure.

feed.title: TeraWulf stock slides late Tuesday as bitcoin retreats; what WULF traders are watching next
feed.summary: TeraWulf (WULF.O) shares dropped 2.2% to $13.32 as bitcoin retreated from its early-week highs, highlighting the sector's sensitivity to cryptocurrency price movements. Traders are now focusing on upcoming U.S. inflation data and the Federal Reserve's late-January meeting for further market direction. The company, which operates bitcoin mining and is expanding into high-performance computing, will likely see investors scrutinize its next earnings report for progress on HPC contracting and capital needs.

feed.title: Galaxy Ventures Promotes James Kibbie to Principal
feed.summary: Galaxy Ventures has promoted James Kibbie to Principal, recognizing his significant contributions to the firm's investment strategy, particularly in payments, stablecoins, and onchain capital markets. Kibbie has been instrumental in leading successful investments and providing valuable strategic guidance to portfolio companies, supporting their growth and innovation in the digital assets space. This promotion highlights his expertise and leadership in advancing Galaxy Ventures' mission to back visionary founders building utility into global financial systems.

feed.title: MSCI Will Not Exclude Digital Asset Treasury Firms From Its Indexes
feed.summary: MSCI has announced it will not exclude digital asset treasury companies (DATCOs) from its MSCI Global Investable Market Indexes (MSCI Indexes) as part of the February 2026 Index Review. This decision means currently included DATCOs will remain, provided they meet other index inclusion requirements. However, MSCI plans to conduct a broader consultation on the treatment of non-operating companies in general.

feed.title: 'Shocker': Morgan Stanley's Bitcoin and Solana ETF filings signal deep institutional commitment to crypto
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley has filed S-1 registration statements with the SEC for spot Bitcoin and Solana ETFs, a development that surprised many in the crypto community. This move signals a deeper institutional commitment to cryptocurrency and could encourage other major investment firms to launch their own branded Bitcoin ETFs. The filings reflect a shift in Morgan Stanley's stance on crypto, prompted by increasing client demand and the successful start to the year for spot Bitcoin ETFs.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Regains Compliance with Nasdaq Minimum Bid Price Requirement
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (Nasdaq: BNKK) announced it has regained compliance with the Nasdaq minimum bid price requirement of $1.00, following its common stock maintaining the price for 10 consecutive business days from December 11 to December 24, 2025. This achievement secures the company's listing on The Nasdaq Capital Market and removes the risk of delisting. The CEO stated that with a debt-free balance sheet and active digital asset revenue engines, the company is well-positioned for growth in 2026.

feed.title: Bitcoin Depot to pay $1.9M to scam victims in Maine crypto ATM case
feed.summary: Bitcoin Depot has settled with the state of Maine, agreeing to pay $1.9 million to scam victims who used its crypto ATMs. The multi-year case alleged that Bitcoin Depot's kiosks facilitated widespread fraud targeting vulnerable consumers through high fees and a lack of fraud prevention. The settlement also grants Bitcoin Depot a money transmitter license and requires compliance with new consumer protection standards.

feed.title: Hyperscale Data Bitcoin Treasury at 532.6978 Bitcoin and Held Approximately $43.1 Million of Cash as of January 2, 2026
feed.summary: Hyperscale Data announced its Bitcoin treasury and cash allocated to committed purchases totaled approximately $80.2 million as of January 4, 2026, representing about 102% of its market capitalization. The company aims to reach a $100 million digital asset treasury and intends to maintain parity with its market capitalization through ongoing Bitcoin accumulation. As of January 4, 2026, its subsidiary Sentinum held 524.6978 Bitcoin (valued at $48 million), and Ault Capital Group held 8 Bitcoin.

feed.title: Morgan Stanley files to launch first bitcoin, Solana ETFs
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley has filed to launch its first exchange-traded funds (ETFs) for Bitcoin and Solana. This move signifies a major step for the financial giant into the cryptocurrency market through regulated investment products. The article was published on January 6, 2026, at 11:52 AM EST by Remy Samuels.

feed.title: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) Announces the Company’s Shares Are Live on the Solana Blockchain Through Opening Bell
feed.summary: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) has announced that its shares are now live on the Solana blockchain through Superstate's Opening Bell platform. This marks a significant development as it is the first time a regulated public equity can be used as collateral within a live decentralized finance (DeFi) market. This integration allows ex-US holders of tokenized FWDI shares to post their equity as collateral on Kamino, a Solana lending protocol, enabling them to borrow stablecoins against these tokenized shares.

feed.title: Former CFTC Commissioner Brian Quintenz joins SUI Group board
feed.summary: SUI Group, a Nasdaq-listed company associated with the Sui blockchain ecosystem, has appointed Brian Quintenz, a former CFTC Commissioner, as an independent director to its board and audit committee. Quintenz brings a wealth of regulatory and capital markets experience, having served at the CFTC and as global head of policy at a16z crypto. His appointment is expected to bolster SUI Group's treasury strategy, which is centered on the SUI token.

feed.title: Alliance Entertainment Launches Alliance Authentic™, Introducing The Ultimate Vinyl Collectible™ and a New Marketplace for Authenticated, Numbered Vinyl Collectibles
feed.summary: Alliance Entertainment Holding Corporation has launched Alliance Authentic™, a new platform for authentic, certified, investment-grade vinyl collectibles. This platform introduces "The Ultimate Vinyl Collectible™"—uncirculated, limited edition, encapsulated, digitally verified, and individually numbered vinyl records sourced directly from music labels. It also provides a peer-to-peer marketplace for secure trading, offering collectors a trusted way to buy, sell, and verify authentic vinyl.

feed.title: AI for investors MLQ.ai | Morgan Stanley Files Bitcoin and Solana ETF Applications
feed.summary: Morgan Stanley submitted S-1 filings to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on January 6, 2026, for exchange-traded funds tracking Bitcoin and Solana prices, aiming to expand its presence in cryptocurrencies. This move follows the SEC's approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs two years prior and aligns with significant institutional interest and robust market inflows observed in early 2026. The strategic filing diversifies Morgan Stanley's crypto exposure beyond Bitcoin, targeting Solana's unique appeal, and positions the firm to potentially broaden access for both retail and institutional investors.

feed.title: DEFT Investors Have Opportunity to Lead DeFi Technologies Inc. Securities Fraud Lawsuit with the Schall Law Firm
feed.summary: The Schall Law Firm has announced a class action lawsuit against DeFi Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: DEFT) for alleged securities fraud between May 12, 2025, and November 14, 2025. Investors are encouraged to contact the firm before January 30, 2026, to discuss their rights, claiming the company made false statements regarding arbitrage strategy delays and competition.

feed.title: Understanding the Setup: (DEFI) and Scalable Risk
feed.summary: This article analyzes Hashdex Bitcoin Futures Etf (NASDAQ: DEFI), highlighting a strong near-term sentiment but neutral mid and long-term outlook. It identifies a significant 53.9:1 risk-reward setup targeting a 15.7% gain with only 0.3% risk, and provides three AI-generated trading strategies for different risk profiles. The analysis suggests support is being tested and, if held, resistance will be the next target.

feed.title: Publicly traded medtech buys $40M bitcoin in nod to MicroStrategy
feed.summary: Semler Scientific, a publicly traded medical technology company, announced the purchase of 581 bitcoin for approximately $40 million, adopting bitcoin as its primary treasury reserve asset. The company's chairman, Eric Semler, stated their belief in bitcoin as a reliable store of value and an investment with the potential for outsized returns, similar to digital gold. This move positions Semler Scientific alongside MicroStrategy in its commitment to bitcoin, with plans to allocate excess cash to future bitcoin purchases.

feed.title: Morgan Stanley Files Bitcoin and Solana ETF Applications
feed.summary: Financial giant Morgan Stanley has filed applications for Bitcoin and Solana ETFs, putting it in direct competition with firms like BlackRock and Fidelity in the rapidly expanding crypto ETF market. This move follows Morgan Stanley's recent decision to open crypto access to all clients, signaling a significant shift towards mainstream institutional adoption of digital assets. The proposed Bitcoin ETF will hold actual Bitcoin, while the Solana ETF plans to stake a portion of its holdings for staking rewards, potentially redefining crypto ETF returns.

feed.title: Riot Announces December 2025 Production and Operations Updates
feed.summary: Riot Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ: RIOT) reported its December 2025 production and operations updates, producing 460 Bitcoin and generating $161.6 million in net proceeds from Bitcoin sales. The company also announced that this would be its final monthly update, transitioning to quarterly reports to align with its broader strategy and long-term objectives. Riot highlighted increased deployed hash rate and significant power credits earned, detailing its performance metrics.

The company's common stock maintained a closing bid price of $1.00 or more for 10 consecutive business days from December 11 to December 24, 2025. This achievement was critical for the company, affirming strategic capital restructuring decisions and allowing a renewed focus on growth and execution.

It outlines detailed institutional trading strategies, including position trading, momentum breakout, and risk hedging, along with multi-timeframe signal analysis. The report also emphasizes an exceptional 40.9:1 risk-reward setup targeting an 11.8% gain against a 0.3% risk.

feed.title: SEC clears Coeptis merger proxy as shareholders prepare to vote
feed.summary: Coeptis Therapeutics announced that the SEC has declared its Form S-4 effective for the proposed merger with Z Squared, paving the way for shareholder vote. The company will begin mailing definitive proxy statements to stockholders of record as of January 2, 2026, for an Annual/Special Stockholder Meeting scheduled for January 30, 2026. A Nasdaq listing application for the combined company has been submitted, though approval is not guaranteed, meaning the company might trade on OTC Markets if not approved.

feed.title: StoneX Digital Secures MiCA Authorisation to Expand Regulated Digital Asset Services Across the EU
feed.summary: StoneX Digital, a division of StoneX, has obtained its Crypto-Asset Service Provider (CASP) license under the EU’s Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA) from the Central Bank of Ireland. This authorization allows StoneX Digital to expand its regulated digital asset services, including execution and custody, across the European Union. The move aims to integrate new technologies into existing investment lifecycles for institutional and corporate clients, building scalable infrastructure for regulated innovation.

feed.title: Treasure Global Concludes Alumni Capital Equity Line
feed.summary: Treasure Global Inc. has concluded its equity line facility with Alumni Capital LP, streamlining its capital structure without further dilution from this agreement. This allows the company to focus on scaling its fintech and digital-asset initiatives like OXI Wallet, UNIRWA, and Quarters Elite. The facility reached its scheduled end on December 31, 2025, with no early termination penalties.

feed.title: Greenleaf Trust Sells 2,576 Shares of BlackRock $BLK
feed.summary: Greenleaf Trust significantly reduced its stake in BlackRock by 43.4%, selling 2,576 shares and retaining 3,358 shares valued at approximately $3.915 million. This divestment occurred amidst other institutional investors adjusting their positions and notable insider selling by Director Rachel Lord and CFO Martin Small. BlackRock reported Q3 EPS of $11.55, missing estimates, but saw revenue rise 25.2% to $6.51 billion, while continuing to pay a quarterly dividend of $5.21.

YZi Labs calls for a free and fair director nomination and election process and refutes CEA Industries' claim that it has never considered alternative tokens, citing BNC CEO David Namdar's comments. YZi Labs intends to provide stockholders an opportunity to elect new board members at the 2025 Annual Meeting, which the company states has already been delayed past its anniversary date.

feed.title: Lemonis Becomes CEO of Bed, Bath & Beyond Inc., Details his Expansive Vision for the ‘Beyond’
feed.summary: Marcus Lemonis has been appointed CEO of Bed Bath & Beyond, Inc., outlining an expansive vision to transform the company into an "Everything Home Company" that serves as an essential operating system for homeowners. His strategy extends beyond traditional retail to include home services, financial products, and an AI-powered operating system called "Beyond Home OS." This move comes after his departure from Camping World and follows his efforts as Executive Chairman to stabilize the company and undo previous strategic reversals.

feed.title: Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) Announces ETH Holdings Reach 4.144 Million Tokens, and Total Crypto and Total Cash Holdings of $14.2 Billion
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) reported its crypto and cash holdings totaling $14.2 billion, including 4.144 million ETH tokens, underscoring its position as the largest "fresh money" buyer of ETH globally. The company holds 3.43% of the total ETH supply and will host its Annual Stockholder Meeting on January 15, 2026, to discuss increasing authorized shares and its MAVAN staking solution. Bitmine aims to achieve 5% ETH ownership and continues to be a highly traded stock in the US.

feed.title: Sequans to Participate in the 28th Annual Needham Growth Conference on January 13, 2026
feed.summary: Sequans Communications S.A. announced that Dr. Georges Karam, President and CEO, will participate in a fireside chat at the 28th Annual Needham Growth Conference on January 13, 2026. He will also hold one-on-one meetings with investors throughout the day. Sequans is a leading fabless semiconductor company specializing in wireless 4G/5G cellular technology for IoT and a pioneer in Bitcoin Treasury.

feed.title: Late quarterly report draws Nasdaq notice as fintech works to catch up
feed.summary: ALT5 Sigma Corporation (NASDAQ: ALTS) announced it expects to file its delayed Q3 2025 Form 10-Q report in the coming days to cure a Nasdaq deficiency notice. The fintech company, based in Las Vegas, California, stated it is actively communicating with Nasdaq to address all compliance matters. CEO Tony Isaac affirmed their commitment to regulatory compliance and transparency, anticipating the filing will help regain Nasdaq compliance.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Regains Compliance with Nasdaq Minimum Bid Price Requirement
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (Nasdaq:BNKK) has successfully regained compliance with the Nasdaq minimum bid price requirement by maintaining a closing bid price of $1.00 or more for 10 consecutive business days from December 11 to December 24, 2025. This achievement secures the Company's continued listing on The Nasdaq Capital Market. CEO Jarrett Boon stated that with a debt-free balance sheet and active digital asset revenue generation, the company is now focused on execution and growth in 2026.

feed.title: Digital asset firm Bonk avoids Nasdaq delisting as shares meet $1 rule
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (Nasdaq:BNKK) has regained compliance with Nasdaq's minimum bid price requirement by maintaining a closing bid of $1.00 or more for 10 consecutive business days between December 11 and December 24, 2025. This ensures its continued listing on The Nasdaq Capital Market, removing a significant delisting risk. The company reports a debt-free balance sheet and cash flow from digital asset revenue, planning to focus on growth and execution in 2026, despite recent stock price volatility following positive operational updates.

feed.title: VerifyMe and Token Economy Leader Open World Announces Plan for Strategic Merger
feed.summary: VerifyMe, Inc. (NASDAQ: VRME) and Open World Ltd. have announced a strategic merger plan to create a publicly traded company on Nasdaq. The combined entity aims to deliver institutional-grade on-chain solutions and real-world asset tokenization, leveraging Open World's Web3 expertise and VerifyMe's logistics and authentication technologies. This merger is intended to set new global standards for secure, enterprise-grade real-world asset tokenization, addressing identity, security, regulatory alignment, and trust in the digital asset space.

feed.title: The Bull Case For Hut 8 (HUT) Could Change Following Its US$200M Bitcoin-Backed Credit Expansion
feed.summary: Hut 8 Mining Corp. has expanded its Bitcoin-backed credit agreement with Coinbase Credit Inc. to US$200 million, fully utilizing it for corporate purposes, especially AI infrastructure buildout. This move enhances financial flexibility for projects like the River Bend and Vega data centers, but also intensifies execution risk. The company's future remains linked to Bitcoin prices and the successful commercialization of its AI infrastructure, which is projected to drive significant revenue growth.

feed.title: Antalpha 2025 Annual Business Review Report
feed.summary: After a successful IPO in 2025, Antalpha experienced significant business growth, driven by expanding Bitcoin financial services, launching the RWA Hub, and strategic acquisitions. The company reported a 52% revenue increase and a total value locked (TVL) of $2.36 billion, signaling its emergence as a global fintech ecosystem. Antalpha focused on strengthening platform capabilities, continuous growth in financial performance, and strategic capital operations, including the acquisition of Prestige Wealth Inc., which became Aurelion Inc., the first Nasdaq-listed company with Tether Gold as its core reserve asset.

feed.title: Goldstrom Partners with SMX to Deliver End-to-End Traceability and Circularity in Precious Metals

Goldstrom will assist in developing SMX's molecular-marker technology and blockchain-backed digital product passports for the gold and silver supply chain. This partnership aims to provide clients with audit-grade transparency, provenance, and sustainability, supporting compliance and ESG demands.

feed.title: Bitfarms Completes Latin America Exit with $30M Paraguay Facility Sale, Accelerating North American AI and HPC Expansion
feed.summary: Bitfarms Ltd. (Nasdaq: BITF) has completed its exit from Latin America by selling its 70-megawatt facility in Paraguay for up to $30 million. This strategic move allows the company to pivot towards high-performance computing (HPC) and artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure in North America, where it anticipates higher returns. The funds from the sale will be used to invest in new data center projects designed for AI and HPC applications, aligning Bitfarms with the growing demand for compute power in the sector.
