feed.title: Nano Labs stock surges after BNB reserve expansion
feed.summary: Nano Labs Ltd (NASDAQ:NA) stock surged over 8% in premarket trading after announcing an expansion of its BNB cryptocurrency reserves to over 130,000 tokens, valued at approximately $112 million. Concurrently, the company has begun implementing a previously approved $25 million share repurchase program. These strategic moves aim to enhance long-term corporate value and protect shareholder interests, positively influencing investor sentiment.

feed.title: Hut 8 Signs Amended and Restated Credit Agreement With Coinbase Credit
feed.summary: Hut 8 has expanded its secured credit facility with Coinbase Credit through a Fourth Amended and Restated Credit Agreement. This amendment increases the available principal by up to $70 million, bringing the total facility to $200 million, which Hut 8 drew in full on December 22, 2025. The loan is secured by Bitcoin held with Coinbase Custody and is intended for general corporate purposes.

feed.title: ZOOZ Strategy Ltd. Annual Shareholder Letter
feed.summary: ZOOZ Strategy Ltd. has transformed from a kinetic energy storage company into ZOOZ Strategy, adopting Bitcoin as its primary treasury reserve asset. The company views Bitcoin as a premier store of value and is positioning itself to bridge conventional capital markets with the digital asset economy. For 2026, ZOOZ plans to optimize legacy operations, improve transparency with a Treasury Dashboard, generate yield from Bitcoin, and explore strategic expansion within the Bitcoin ecosystem.

feed.title: Trump media firm to issue new cryptocurrency to shareholders
feed.summary: Trump Media and Technology Group, the firm behind Truth Social, will issue a new cryptocurrency to its shareholders, adding to the Trump family's digital asset ventures. The token, operating on the Cronos blockchain through a partnership with Crypto.com, aims to reward shareholders and promote market transparency. This move comes as Donald Trump advocates for looser crypto regulations, despite some of his past crypto bets faltering and concerns about potential conflicts of interest.

feed.title: IPW’s Stock Gains, BMNR Adds To Ethereum Position While Crypto Equities Tread Water
feed.summary: iPower (IPW) saw its stock climb after disclosing its first purchases of Bitcoin and Ethereum totaling $2.21 million as part of a new digital asset treasury strategy. Meanwhile, Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) significantly increased its Ethereum holdings, adding 32,938 ETH and staking another 118,944 ETH. The broader cryptocurrency market experienced a modest gain, though crypto-linked equities generally remained subdued.

feed.title: DJT Jumps over 5% after Trump Media Offers a First-of-Its-Kind Cryptocurrency to Shareholders
feed.summary: Trump Media & Technology Group (DJT) announced a new cryptocurrency distribution to its shareholders, causing its shares to jump over 5%. This initiative aims to create a "circular economy" by incentivizing DJT investors to use Trump-branded financial products, with the new rewards token tied to the Cronos blockchain through a strategic alignment with Crypto.com. The token launch follows a significant merger with TAE Technologies, a nuclear fusion firm, as the company expands its reach in the digital economy.

feed.title: Can FUTU's One-Stop Strategy Insulate Itself From Market Volatility?
feed.summary: Futu Holdings Limited (FUTU) reported an 86.3% year-over-year revenue surge in Q3 2025, driven by brokerage commissions and interest income from margin financing and securities lending. The company is diversifying into crypto trading and wealth management, leading to significant growth in these areas, and launched a self-service request-for-quote function for structured products. FUTU's "one-stop" financial ecosystem aims to capture more customers and generate steady revenue despite market volatility, with the stock outperforming peers and carrying a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).

feed.title: DeFi Technologies CEO Sets Out 2025 Growth Blueprint and Global Expansion Drive
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies has outlined its 2025 growth strategy, aiming to become a leading global provider of asset management services and investment products through its vertically integrated platform. The company plans significant global expansion, specifically in Europe, LATAM, Africa, and the Middle East, leveraging new listings on major stock exchanges. Despite facing challenges with profitability and valuation, analysts have issued a "Buy" rating for the TSE:DEFI stock with a C$3.00 price target.

feed.title: Flora Growth Signs Note Settlement Agreement With DeFi Development
feed.summary: Flora Growth (FLGC) has entered into a Note Settlement Agreement with DeFi Development to retire a Solana-denominated convertible note. The settlement, effective January 6, 2026, involves Solana, cash, and common shares, eliminating the related debt and principal/interest obligations. The company expects this agreement to terminate the note and provide mutual releases for both parties.

feed.title: Trump Media company announces plans to award shareholders digital tokens
feed.summary: The Trump Media and Technology Group has announced a partnership with cryptocurrency exchange Crypto.com to award its shareholders digital tokens. This move aligns with former President Donald Trump's vocal advocacy for cryptocurrency and his administration's efforts to position the US as a "crypto capital". The tokens will offer benefits related to Truth Social and Truth+, and the initiative is part of Trump Media's strategy to diversify its portfolio and gain momentum, despite struggles since its 2021 launch.

feed.title: BitMine Immersion (BMNR) stock slips today as SEC filing flags $13.2B crypto stash and Jan. 15 vote
feed.summary: BitMine Immersion (BMNR) stock fell by about 1.5% to $27.30 following an SEC filing that disclosed the company's $13.2 billion "treasury" of crypto assets, cash, and other investments, including over 4 million ether tokens. Investors are closely watching a January 15 annual meeting where a vote on raising authorized shares is scheduled, along with the company's staking initiatives. The stock's performance on Wednesday was influenced by year-end tax-loss related selling and choppy crypto trading.

feed.title: What's Going On With Nano Labs Stock Wednesday?
feed.summary: Nano Labs (NASDAQ: NA) is reorienting its capital strategy towards digital assets and shareholder returns. The company saw its stock rise on Wednesday after announcing an expansion of its BNB reserve and the initiation of a previously approved share buyback program. Nano Labs now holds over 130,000 BNB, valued at approximately $112 million, and has begun executing a $25 million share repurchase.

feed.title: Contact - The Lethbridge Herald - News and Sports from around Lethbridge
authors: First Trust Advisors L.P. via Business Wire
feed.summary: First Trust Advisors L.P. announced the monthly distributions for several of its exchange-traded funds (ETFs). The declaration includes details on expected ex-dividend, record, and payable dates for various actively managed ETFs. The article also outlines important risk factors and disclosures for investors considering these funds.

feed.title: Trump Media plans new token distribution for shareholders in partnership with Crypto.com
feed.summary: Trump Media and Technology Group (DJT) announced a plan to distribute new digital tokens to its shareholders in partnership with Crypto.com. Shareholders will receive one token for every whole share of DJT held, with the tokens issued on Crypto.com’s Cronos blockchain. These tokens may offer periodic rewards tied to Trump Media products, and the announcement led to an increase in DJT shares and Crypto.com's CRO token.

feed.title: BUIDL Fund Delivers Strong Returns and Market Impact
feed.summary: BlackRock's BUIDL fund has distributed approximately $100 million in dividends and its valuation has surpassed $2 billion since its launch in March 2024, showcasing the potential of blockchain-based financial products. The fund invests in U.S. government securities and is increasingly integrated into the crypto ecosystem, serving as collateral and backing for stablecoins, despite regulatory scrutiny over liquidity and operational risks. BUIDL's growth reflects a broader trend of institutional adoption of tokenized money market funds.

feed.title: NextNRG Announces Shareholder Rewards Program Featuring EzFill Fueling Token
feed.summary: NextNRG, Inc. announced a new shareholder rewards program that provides a digital fuel-discount coupon token through its EzFill platform. Shareholders can redeem this token for one fueling event, and it is transferable, allowing them to share the benefit or introduce new users to EzFill's on-demand fueling services. This initiative aims to connect shareholders directly to the platform's value and expand EzFill's market reach while serving as the first phase of a broader engagement strategy.

feed.title: KBW upgrades TeraWulf to outperform, sees AI pivot as catalyst for sharp growth
feed.summary: KBW has upgraded TeraWulf (WULF) to "outperform" from "market perform" and significantly raised its price target, citing the company's strategic pivot towards AI and high-performance computing (HPC) leasing. The investment bank believes the market is undervaluing TeraWulf's potential for rapid EBITDA growth and valuation upside as HPC leasing is expected to become the primary revenue driver, eclipsing Bitcoin mining by 2027. This shift is anticipated to generate substantial financial growth and narrow previous market discounts.

feed.title: Nano Labs Continues to Increase Its BNB Holdings to Over 130,000 BNB, Upgrades Its BNB Strategic Reserve and Officially Launches Share Repurchase Program
feed.summary: Nano Labs Ltd has announced it further increased its BNB holdings to over 130,000 BNB, valued at approximately US$112 million, as part of its long-term strategic reserve strategy. The company also officially launched a share repurchase program worth up to US$25 million to enhance long-term corporate value and safeguard shareholder interests. Nano Labs intends to continue the repurchase program subject to market conditions.

feed.title: Shum Financial Group Inc. Takes Position in BlackRock $BLK
feed.summary: Shum Financial Group Inc. has acquired a new position in BlackRock, purchasing 2,174 shares valued at approximately $2.53 million, making it their 17th largest holding. Institutional investors collectively own over 80% of BlackRock, with major firms like Vanguard and Geode increasing their stakes, while some insiders have trimmed positions. Analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating for BlackRock, with an average price target of $1,316.18, following recent target increases from several firms.

feed.title: Bitcoin ATM Scams Skyrocket In 2025, Americans Defrauded Of Over $333 Million: Report
feed.summary: The FBI reported that scammers defrauded Americans of over $333 million through Bitcoin ATMs in 2025, a significant increase from $250 million in 2024. The trend of fraudulent transactions involving cryptocurrency kiosks is rising, with scammers manipulating victims into converting cash to cryptocurrency and sending it to the scammer's wallet. Despite warnings, individuals continue to fall victim to these scams.

feed.title: Dino game studio tops 10M mobile downloads and mints a ‘Golden Poop’
feed.summary: Snail Inc. (NASDAQ: SNAL) announced significant year-end engagement milestones for its titles, including Bellwright's peak CCU of over 12,800 players and more than 150,000 units sold in Q4 2025, and ARK: Ultimate Mobile Edition surpassing 10 million downloads. The company also detailed a multi-year ARK content roadmap through 2027 and introduced experimental new initiatives like a $USDO stablecoin and a "Golden Poop" digital collectible. These updates aim to strengthen long-term monetization and growth for the company's core intellectual properties.

feed.title: Riot Platforms Announces $500 Million Stock Offering To Fund Capex, Bitcoin Mining Projects: RIOT Stock Edges Lower Pre-Market
feed.summary: Riot Platforms (RIOT) announced a $500 million stock offering to fund capital expenditures, strategic acquisitions, data centers, and Bitcoin mining projects. The company also intends to use proceeds for stock buyback programs and general corporate requirements. This announcement comes as RIOT stock experienced a slight pre-market dip and follows a recent production update showing a 14% year-on-year decrease in Bitcoin production for November.

feed.title: Datavault AI (DVLT) stock today: shares slide in premarket as warrant-dividend plan sharpens focus on Jan. 7 record date
feed.summary: Datavault AI's (DVLT) shares dropped by approximately 20% in premarket trading following announcements of a special dividend of stock warrants and a Dream Bowl Meme Coin II token dividend, both with a January 7 record date. Investors are evaluating the potential dilution from these warrants and the logistical requirements for token distribution. The company also announced its participation in CES 2026 and its inclusion in the S&P Semiconductors Select Industry Index, while some insider share sales were reported for tax obligations.

feed.title: BKCH Archives
feed.summary: This article from 24/7 Wall St. highlights the Global X Blockchain ETF (BKCH) as an optimal investment for blockchain exposure in 2026. It presents BKCH as a way to diversify within the blockchain sector, mitigating the risks associated with investing in individual mining stocks. The article suggests that BKCH offers a more balanced approach for investors interested in the decentralized technology space.

feed.title: Galaxy Digital Predicts $250K Bitcoin Price By Year-End 2027
feed.summary: Galaxy Digital anticipates that Bitcoin will reach $250,000 by the end of 2027, despite a chaotic and uncertain near-term outlook for 2026. The firm notes that 2025 saw significant institutional adoption and maturation of the crypto market, setting the stage for future growth. They also predict stablecoins will overtake legacy rails, and tokenized assets will enter mainstream capital markets in 2026.

feed.title: Arthur Hayes received another 4.85 million ENA from Galaxy Digital, worth approximately $985,000.
feed.summary: Arthur Hayes has acquired an additional 4.85 million ENA tokens from Galaxy Digital, valued at approximately $985,000. Since December 20, he has accumulated a total of 10.905 million ENA tokens, with an estimated total value of $2.227 million, at an average cost of $0.2042 per token. This follows continuous monitoring of his ENA acquisitions.

feed.title: NextNRG Announces Shareholder Rewards Program Featuring EzFill Fueling Token
feed.summary: NextNRG, Inc. announced a new shareholder rewards program featuring a digital fuel-discount coupon token for its EzFill platform. Shareholders will receive a transferable token redeemable for one fueling event, applicable across various vehicles and equipment. This initiative aims to reward investors and expand EzFill's market reach, with plans for additional perks in the future.

feed.title: HIVE Digital (HIVE) Drops 5% - Here's Why
feed.summary: HIVE Digital (HIVE) saw a 5.17% drop, extending its losing streak for a third day, as investors took profits without fresh catalysts to boost buying. This comes despite HIVE Digital successfully listing on the Colombian Stock Exchange, aiming to expand its presence in sustainable high-performance computing, Bitcoin mining, and next-generation AI infrastructure across the Americas. The company's expansion reinforces its position as a major renewable-powered data center operator in Latin America.

feed.title: HIVE Digital (HIVE) Drops 5% – Here’s Why
feed.summary: HIVE Digital Technologies Ltd. (NASDAQ: HIVE) experienced a 5.17% drop, closing at $2.57, extending a three-day losing streak as investors took profits with no new catalysts. This occurred despite recent news of its successful listing on the Colombian Stock Exchange, which expands its presence in sustainable high-performance computing, Bitcoin mining, and AI infrastructure in the Americas. The company aims to offer more investor visibility and reinforce its position as a major renewable-powered data center operator in Latin America.

feed.title: Eightco Holdings (ORBS) Tumbles 8% on Profit-Taking
feed.summary: Eightco Holdings (NASDAQ:ORBS) saw an 8.17% decline on Tuesday, closing at $1.6850, as investors engaged in profit-taking after a previous surge. This surge was triggered by the company's announcement of a $125 million share buyback plan, which its CEO, Kevin O’Donnell, stated reflects strong confidence in the company's strategy and long-term value creation. Eightco Holdings is a Worldcoin-focused treasury company that also invests in Ethereum tokens, having recently secured a $20 million investment from BitMine Immersion Technologies.

feed.title: Eightco Holdings (ORBS) Tumbles 8% on Profit-Taking
feed.summary: Eightco Holdings (NASDAQ:ORBS) fell by 8.17% due to profit-taking after a surge triggered by a $125 million share buyback plan. The company's CEO, Kevin O’Donnell, stated that the buyback reflects confidence in Eightco's strategy and commitment to creating long-term shareholder value. Eightco Holdings is a Worldcoin-focused treasury company that also invests in Ethereum tokens, having recently received a $20 million investment from BitMine Immersion Technologies.

feed.title: Sonim Technologies Stockholders Approve Asset Sale to NEXA, Clearing Path for Strategic Transition
feed.summary: Sonim Technologies stockholders have approved the sale of its rugged mobile phone and hotspot business to NEXA. This strategic move allows Sonim to retire debt and pivot its focus entirely to DNA X, a cryptocurrency trading platform, rebranding as "DNA X, Inc." and trading under the new symbol "DNAX" within 30 days of the asset sale's completion.

feed.title: Benchmark Maintains Buy Rating on Payoneer (PAYO) as B2B Growth and Stablecoin Projects Offset Tariff-Related Macro Uncertainty
feed.summary: Benchmark has reiterated its Buy rating on Payoneer (PAYO) while adjusting its price target to $10 from $12. The firm's positive outlook is driven by Payoneer's growing B2B payment volumes, development in stablecoin projects, and strategic partnership with Oscilar to enhance fraud and risk intelligence systems, which collectively aim to mitigate macroeconomic uncertainties. Payoneer saw strong Q3 2025 revenue growth, particularly in B2B and Checkout revenues, indicating a successful shift towards larger, higher-value customers amidst an evolving digital payments landscape.

feed.title: Lite Strategy finalizes CEO employment agreement with Justin J. File
feed.summary: Lite Strategy, Inc. (NASDAQ:LITS) announced a new employment agreement with Justin J. File, formalizing his role as CEO, CFO, and Secretary, with a base salary of $575,000 and a target annual bonus of 50% of the base salary. The agreement, effective November 14, 2025, includes severance benefits for specific termination scenarios and full vesting of stock options under certain change of control conditions. The company also recently appointed Mr. File as permanent CEO, became the first U.S. publicly traded company to hold Litecoin as its primary reserve asset, and authorized a $25 million share repurchase program, reflecting its new digital asset treasury strategy.

feed.title: Nano Labs Continues to Increase Its BNB Holdings to Over 130,000 BNB, Upgrades Its BNB Strategic Reserve and Officially Launches Share Repurchase Program
feed.summary: Nano Labs Ltd. (Nasdaq: NA) has announced significant progress in its strategic BNB reserve initiative, acquiring over 130,000 BNB, valued at approximately US$112 million, to enhance its long-term strategic reserve. Concurrently, the company has officially launched a board-approved share repurchase program of up to US$25 million to manage market capitalization, enhance long-term corporate value, and safeguard shareholder interests, with plans to continue execution subject to market conditions. Nano Labs, a Web 3.0 infrastructure provider, emphasizes its commitment to high throughput computing and high-performance computing technologies and its strategic positioning in crypto assets with BNB as its primary reserve.

feed.title: Onfolio CEO Wells buys shares worth $49,713
feed.summary: Onfolio CEO Dominic Benjamin James Wells recently purchased 74,499 shares of the company's common stock for a total of $49,713 in two transactions on December 30 and 31, 2025. This insider buying follows a significant price drop for the micro-cap company, which, despite strong revenue growth, remains unprofitable. The company is actively reducing debt and has made substantial investments in cryptocurrency.

feed.title: Bitmine treasury news: Ethereum stock bet is down 80% but South Koreans keep buying
feed.summary: South Korean retail traders are continuing to heavily invest in BitMine Immersion Technologies, despite an 80% drop in its stock value from its July peak. BitMine's pivot to an ether treasury strategy fueled a 3,000% rally, attracting high-risk investors and making it the second most popular overseas equity among South Koreans with $1.4 billion invested this year. The company holds approximately $12 billion in ether, making it the largest digital-asset treasury company dedicated to ETH.

feed.title: Hut 8 stock today: Why HUT is down even as bitcoin edges higher
feed.summary: Hut 8 (HUT) shares fell about 3% despite a modest rise in bitcoin, underperforming other crypto miners. Investors are focusing on Hut 8's recently announced Google-backed AI data center lease and its execution timeline. This pullback highlights the stock's sensitivity to both bitcoin-linked equities and the market's burgeoning demand for AI data centers.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Inc. Notice of January 30, 2026
feed.summary: Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC (KSF) has announced a class action securities lawsuit against DeFi Technologies Inc. (NasdaqCM: DEFT). The lawsuit concerns alleged securities fraud between May 12, 2025, and November 14, 2025, and investors who suffered losses during this period have until January 30, 2026, to request to be appointed as lead plaintiff. The firm alleges that DeFi Technologies' stock price fell significantly after the company disclosed a substantial decline in revenue and lowered its 2025 forecast.

feed.title: Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc. Files Adversary Complaint Seeking Damages for Bad-Faith Bankruptcy Filing
feed.summary: Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc. has filed an adversary complaint in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court, seeking damages against parties for a "bad-faith bankruptcy filing" in December 2024. The company alleges that the petitioning creditors engaged in a coordinated campaign causing significant financial and reputational harm, including a $23 million market capitalization loss. Mawson is pursuing full recovery, including compensatory and punitive damages, to protect shareholder value after the involuntary petition was dismissed with prejudice.

feed.title: Intchains Group Bets On Crypto Gains Despite Revenue Slide
feed.summary: Intchains Group experienced a significant revenue decline in Q3 2025 due to faltering hardware demand, but its net income surged thanks to substantial gains from cryptocurrency holdings, particularly Ethereum. The company is leaning into crypto appreciation and new mining products, with analysts maintaining a "buy" rating and a bullish outlook despite the reduced hardware sales. This shift highlights a trend of tech companies diversifying income streams with blockchain-driven returns and new digital market strategies.

feed.title: OFA Group Confirms Commercial Launch of QikBIM and RWA Platform in 2026, Establishing Core AI Infrastructure for Global Revenue Growth
feed.summary: OFA Group announced the successful completion of application testing for its intelligent building platform QikBIM and continued progress on its Real-World Asset (RWA) platform, confirming commercial launches in early 2026. QikBIM is set to launch on January 15, 2026, and the RWA platform on January 26, 2026, both becoming core pillars for OFA's operations, monetization strategies, and global revenue growth. These platforms aim to integrate architectural design, AI, and digital assets, supporting markets in the US, Europe, and Japan.

feed.title: WULF Stock Rises 3% Pre-Market After Keefe More Than Doubles Price Target
feed.summary: TeraWulf (WULF) stock rose over 3% in Wednesday's premarket trading after Keefe Bruyette upgraded the company from 'Market Perform' to 'Outperform' and more than doubled its price target to $24 from $9.50. The upgrade reflects Keefe's optimism regarding TeraWulf's transition from bitcoin mining to high-performance computing (HPC) leasing. The analyst believes investors are underestimating the scale of TeraWulf's shift and the positive impact of its existing long-term HPC leases on its profitability and future growth, projecting 505% annual EBITDA growth through 2027.

feed.title: iSpecimen Stock Surges 60% After Hours Off A Record Low — What Triggered The Turn?
feed.summary: iSpecimen Inc. (ISPC) stock surged 60% in after-hours trading after announcing a $5.5 million private placement, aiming to ease liquidity concerns and fund operations. This rally follows a significant 89% decline in 2025, driven by recurring operating losses, limited revenue, and investor uncertainty surrounding its Solana blockchain treasury strategy. The new capital raise is intended for marketing, working capital, and general corporate needs.

feed.title: David Beckham-backed Prenetics ceases Bitcoin purchases to focus on IM8
feed.summary: Prenetics Global Ltd., a David Beckham-backed health-sciences company, has announced it will no longer purchase Bitcoin, instead focusing on its IM8 supplement brand. The company will maintain its existing holding of 510 BTC as a treasury reserve asset. This decision marks a change in strategy after an initial purchase of 100 Bitcoin in October at an average price of $109,594 per coin as part of its Bitcoin treasury strategy.

feed.title: Bitdeer Technologies Group Securities Fraud Class Action
feed.summary: Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC (KSF) has announced a securities class action lawsuit against Bitdeer Technologies Group (BTDR) for alleged undisclosed financial problems and a 14% stock decline. Investors who purchased securities between June 6, 2024, and November 10, 2025, have until February 2, 2026, to file lead plaintiff applications. The lawsuit claims Bitdeer failed to disclose material information, leading to a widened net loss of $266.7 million in Q3 2025.

feed.title: High Cryptocurrency Prices and Volatility Have Benefited Coinbase in 2025
feed.summary: Coinbase, as a leading US-based cryptocurrency exchange, has capitalized on high cryptocurrency prices and volatility in 2025. The company's multifaceted roles as an exchange, custodian, and broker, along with its expansion into adjacent businesses like USDC and blockchain infrastructure, have contributed to its success and reduced reliance on volatile transaction revenue. The approval of bitcoin and ethereum ETFs has also benefited Coinbase's custody business.

feed.title: Key facts: JPMorgan Chase posts 38% return; Alibaba to launch payment network
feed.summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co. achieved a significant 38.0% total return by December 29, 2025, outperforming many banking peers and exhibiting a forward P/E ratio above its 10-year average. In related news, Alibaba plans to implement a new tokenized global payment network, utilizing technology developed by JPMorgan to streamline international business-to-business transactions.

feed.title: BitMine (BMNR) stock slips as firm touts 4.11 million ether stash ahead of Jan. 15 vote
feed.summary: BitMine (BMNR) shares declined slightly despite the company announcing its Ethereum holdings reached 4.11 million tokens, part of $13.2 billion in crypto and cash. This disclosure comes ahead of a Jan. 15 shareholder meeting where a proposal to increase authorized shares will be voted on, potentially diluting existing holders but funding future purchases. The company's strategy focuses on its significant ether "treasury" and increasing the portion of its ether that is staked.

feed.title: BitMine (BMNR) stock slides after filing flags 4.11 million ETH stash ahead of Jan. 15 vote
feed.summary: BitMine (BMNR) stock fell by about 3% in after-hours trading after revealing its holdings of 4.11 million ether, 192 bitcoin, and $1 billion in cash, totaling $13.2 billion in crypto and cash. Investors are keenly watching an upcoming January 15 annual meeting, which includes proposals to increase authorized shares and expand staking operations. The company's significant ether holdings make its stock a high-beta proxy for digital asset prices, with even small movements in ETH significantly impacting its valuation.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Inc. (DEFT) Shareholders Who Lost Money Have Opportunity to Lead Securities Fraud Lawsuit
feed.summary: The Law Offices of Frank R. Cruz announced that investors who suffered losses related to DeFi Technologies Inc. (DEFT) have the opportunity to lead a securities fraud class action lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that DeFi Technologies failed to disclose crucial information regarding delays in its DeFi arbitrage strategy, significant competition, and the unlikelihood of meeting its revenue guidance for fiscal year 2025, thereby misleading investors. Shareholders who lost money between May 12, 2025, and November 14, 2025, have until January 30, 2026, to participate as lead plaintiffs.

feed.title: Hyperscale Data Bitcoin Treasury at 519.8687 Bitcoin and Held Approximately $47 Million of Cash as of December 26, 2025
feed.summary: Hyperscale Data announced its Bitcoin treasury totals approximately $76.1 million as of December 28, 2025, which is 117.76% of its market capitalization. The company aims to reach $100 million in Bitcoin on its balance sheet through a strategy of mining and open-market purchases, maintaining parity with its market capitalization. Hyperscale Data will provide weekly updates on its Bitcoin holdings and purchases as part of its ongoing dollar-cost-averaging strategy.

feed.title: CleanSpark's AI Expansion Progresses: Are Revenues Still Far Away?
feed.summary: CleanSpark is actively expanding into AI and high-performance computing (HPC) data centers, securing significant power capacity and land. However, significant revenue generation from these AI initiatives is not expected until 2027 due to extensive construction and commissioning timelines. The company also faces rising competition from other firms like Cipher Mining and IREN Limited, which are making substantial moves in the AI infrastructure market.

feed.title: Galaxy Digital: 2026 Too Volatile to Call, but $250K Bitcoin by 2027 Remains Plausible
feed.summary: Galaxy Digital finds Bitcoin’s 2026 price too volatile to forecast confidently due to macro uncertainty, Fed policy shifts, and political risks, projecting a range of $70K-$130K by mid-2026. However, the firm maintains its $250K Bitcoin target by 2027, citing permanent institutional adoption through ETFs, corporate balance sheets, and pension fund involvement. These structural changes are expected to create a persistent institutional bid and tighten supply, supporting long-term price appreciation despite short-term chaos.

feed.title: Claim your share of the $14.7M XPDI securities class action settlement
feed.summary: Investors who held XPDI Class A stock as of January 14, 2022, at 5 p.m. Eastern time and did not redeem their shares in connection with the merger with Core Scientific Inc. may be eligible for a cash payment from a $14.75 million class action settlement. The lawsuit alleged that XPDI's leaders breached their fiduciary duties during the merger. Class members do not need to submit a claim form to receive a pro rata payment from the settlement fund.

feed.title: Cango Inc. Secures US$10.5 Million Investment from EWCL to Accelerate Growth
feed.summary: Cango Inc. has secured a US$10.5 million investment from Enduring Wealth Capital Limited (EWCL), with EWCL subscribing for additional Class B ordinary shares at US$1.50 per share. This investment will provide substantial capital to accelerate Cango's core growth initiatives as it develops an integrated energy and AI compute platform. The transaction highlights a shared vision for Cango's future between the two companies.

feed.title: Stablecoin News: Western Union Explores Stablecoin Integration Plans
feed.summary: Western Union is exploring ways to integrate stablecoins into its digital wallet infrastructure following the GENIUS Act, viewing them as an opportunity to enhance its remittance business. The financial giant is looking into partnerships for on-ramp and off-ramp services to enable clients to buy and sell stablecoins, foreseeing benefits in faster cross-border transfers, fiat-to-stablecoin conversion, and store-of-value services. This comes after federal stablecoin regulations were established by the GENIUS Act.

feed.title: OFA Group to launch QikBIM and RWA platforms in early 2026
feed.summary: OFA Group (NASDAQ:OFAL) has announced the completion of application testing for its QikBIM intelligent building platform and ongoing testing for its Real-World Asset (RWA) platform. Commercial launches for both platforms are scheduled for early 2026, with QikBIM set for January 15, 2026, and the RWA platform for January 26, 2026. These platforms aim to integrate architectural expertise with AI to provide verifiable data for real-estate assets and generate revenue across North America, Europe, and Asia.

feed.title: Cango Inc. Secures US$10.5 Million Investment from EWCL to Accelerate Growth
feed.summary: Cango Inc. (NYSE: CANG), a Bitcoin miner and AI compute platform developer, announced a US$10.5 million investment from Enduring Wealth Capital Limited (EWCL). EWCL will subscribe for 7 million Class B ordinary shares at US$1.50 each, increasing its shareholding to approximately 4.69% and its voting power to about 49.61%. This capital infusion will fund strategic initiatives in Bitcoin mining, hashrate efficiency, and the development of Cango's energy and AI compute pillars.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Issues Year-End CEO Letter to Shareholders | Corporate
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies Inc. (Nasdaq: DEFT) has issued its Year-End CEO Letter to shareholders, outlining its strategy to be a global leader in asset management services and investment products for decentralized finance. The letter highlights 2025 achievements, including Valour's growth to 102 ETPs, geographic expansion, and strengthening the balance sheet with $100 million raised. CEO Johan Wattenström also addressed the market valuation gap, emphasizing a focus on execution, scaling AUM, accelerating institutional product rollout, and launching Valour Custody as a standalone business.

feed.title: Nano Labs Shareholders Approve Capital Structure Changes and Class B Voting Power Increase
feed.summary: Nano Labs Ltd. shareholders approved significant capital structure changes and governance measures at their AGM on December 30, 2025. These include conditional share consolidation and sub-division, and an increase in Class B ordinary shares voting power from 30 to 50 votes per share. These changes aim to provide greater flexibility in managing the company's share price, capital structure, and voting control within the Web 3.0 and crypto infrastructure markets.

feed.title: Argo Blockchain calls GM, confirms some problems with conversion of ordinary shares into ADS
feed.summary: Argo Blockchain (NASDAQ:ARBK) is convening a general meeting on January 15, 2026, to reappoint a director and authorize the allotment of securities. The company acknowledges difficulties some shareholders face in converting ordinary shares into American Depositary Shares following its London Stock Exchange delisting and offers assistance for conversion, though it makes no recommendation on whether to convert. This follows the recent closing of its restructuring plan.

feed.title: How a $3B stablecoin could reshape payments for this fintech partner
feed.summary: ALT5 Sigma announced its strategic partner World Liberty Financial's USD1 stablecoin has surpassed $3 billion in market capitalization, positioning ALT5 to benefit significantly. As a major holder of WLFI governance tokens, ALT5 anticipates increased demand and value from USD1's growth. The company is actively exploring integrating USD1 into its payment platforms, potentially enabling stablecoin-based settlement for enterprise clients.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies outlines growth strategy in year-end letter
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies (Nasdaq:DEFT) detailed its 2025 achievements and 2026 plans in a year-end letter, highlighting its Valour subsidiary's expansion to 102 ETPs and significant revenue growth. The company also strengthened its financial position by raising $100 million and plans to launch "Valour Custody" as a standalone business in 2026. Despite a "valuation gap," analysts project continued profitability, with InvestingPro indicating the stock is undervalued.

feed.title: Defiance Launches BTFL: The First Daily 2X Long ETF for Bitfarms Ltd.
feed.summary: Defiance ETFs has launched the Defiance Daily Target 2X Long BITF ETF (BTFL), a new single-stock leveraged ETF designed for active traders seeking amplified exposure to Bitfarms Ltd. (Nasdaq: BITF). This ETF aims to deliver 200% of the daily percentage change in BITF's share price, providing a tool for short-term bullish views. The fund is intended for knowledgeable investors who understand the heightened risks associated with daily leveraged (2X) investment results and actively monitor their portfolios.

feed.title: Bolsa de Valores do Brasil, B3, agora permite investir nas maiores mineradoras de Bitcoin do mundo
feed.summary: The Brazilian Stock Exchange (B3) has launched a BDR (Brazilian Depositary Receipt) linked to the Global X Blockchain ETF (BKCH), allowing Brazilian investors to gain exposure to leading global Bitcoin mining companies and exchanges like Coinbase, Riot Platforms, and Core Scientific. This initiative, identified by the code BKCH39, democratizes international exposure to the crypto sector through B3's infrastructure. It is part of B3's broader expansion into digital assets, which includes offerings of crypto products, ETFs, and BDRs, as well as developing blockchain-based solutions and planning its own stablecoin for 2026.

feed.title: DevvStream, Southern, IP3, and XCF to Evaluate Development of America-First Nuclear Power, Advanced Fuels, and Digital Environmental Asset Monetization
feed.summary: DevvStream Corp., Southern Energy Renewables Inc., IP3 Corporation, and XCF Global Inc. have signed a non-binding MOU to explore strategic collaboration focusing on small modular reactor (SMR) nuclear power, electro-sustainable aviation fuel (eSAF) production, and environmental asset monetization. This partnership aims to leverage zero-carbon nuclear electricity to support clean fuel production and energy-intensive markets like AI data centers, while developing robust environmental attribute structures. The initiative seeks to advance U.S.-based nuclear power to strengthen industrial and energy leadership.

feed.title: Argo Blockchain PLC - Calling of General Meeting
feed.summary: Argo Blockchain plc has announced a General Meeting (GM) to be held on January 15, 2026, to address the reappointment of Ralfe Hickman as a director and to grant directors authority to allot securities. The company has also noted difficulties for shareholders wishing to convert ordinary shares to American Depositary Shares following its delisting from the London Stock Exchange and is offering assistance through a recommended broker.

feed.title: Cango Inc. Secures US$10.5 Million Investment from EWCL to Accelerate Growth | Corporate

This investment will raise EWCL's shareholding and voting power significantly, providing crucial capital to accelerate Cango's growth initiatives in Bitcoin mining, energy, and AI compute. The CEO, Paul Yu, highlighted that this strategic alignment reinforces confidence in their roadmap, focusing on operational improvements, fleet upgrades, and synergistic opportunities to build an integrated global infrastructure platform.

DeepSnitch AI is emerging as a compelling alternative, attracting investors with its AI-driven intelligence system designed for volatile markets and offering a projected 100% ROI. While Upexi's Solana-focused strategy faces market headwinds, DeepSnitch AI's real-world utility and strong growth prospects position it as a breakout crypto project for 2025.

feed.title: Cemtrex Stock Pops After Hours On Monday—What's Going On?

The company reported increased revenue and a positive operating income, fueled by growth in its security and industrial services segments. However, concerns remain regarding its $13.5 million debt and $12.1 million in obligations due next fiscal year.

feed.title: The "boring" stocks became the AI winners of 2025, and nobody saw it coming
feed.summary: In 2025, the artificial intelligence investment landscape shifted dramatically, with "boring" companies providing data center infrastructure outperforming traditional tech giants. Data storage companies like Sandisk Corp., Western Digital Corp., and Seagate Technology Holdings Plc took the top spots on the S&P 500, while AI chipmaker Nvidia saw more modest gains. This trend highlights a broader investor pivot towards the "picks and shovels" supporting the AI boom, including power, cooling, wiring, and construction providers for data centers, and even Bitcoin miners retooling for high-performance computing.

feed.title: Tokenized Securities: How BlackRock's BUIDL Fund is Transforming Traditional Finance
feed.summary: BlackRock's BUIDL Fund, launched in March 2024, is a tokenized money market product that recently distributed $100 million in real yield, demonstrating the viability of tokenized securities at an institutional level. The article discusses the implications of tokenization on financial institutions, including increased liquidity and reduced costs, while also addressing operational risks and the critical need for strong regulatory frameworks like AML/KYC compliance and investor protection. This development suggests that tokenized finance is moving beyond experimental stages and is poised to revolutionize financial inclusion and traditional markets.

feed.title: BlackRock’s BUIDL hits $100M in dividends and passes $2B in assets

BUIDL invests in short-dated U.S. Treasuries and cash equivalents, bridging traditional finance and blockchain technology. This milestone highlights the growth of tokenized money market funds as a regulated alternative for institutional investors seeking yield-bearing dollar exposure on the blockchain.

feed.title: Trump Family Crypto Tie Deepens Scrutiny as Alt5 Fires Auditor
feed.summary: Alt5 Sigma, a fintech company with ties to a Trump family-linked crypto project, has fired its auditor after less than three weeks, appointing its third auditor in two months. The company faces potential Nasdaq delisting due to missed financial deadlines and a subsidiary's money laundering conviction. Despite internal turmoil and management changes, Alt5 Sigma remains involved in a $1.5 billion deal with World Liberty Financial.

feed.title: Fintech taps crypto investor to steer digital asset treasury plan
feed.summary: Pineapple Financial (PAPL) has appointed Anthony Georgiades to its Board of Directors and a newly formed Special Advisory Committee. Mr. Georgiades will oversee the company's digital asset treasury strategy, focusing on accumulating Injective (INJ) tokens, and will advise on governance, risk management, and strategic execution as Pineapple integrates on-chain infrastructure with its mortgage technology platform. His expertise in digital assets, institutional investing, and Web3 from Innovating Capital aims to support Pineapple's mission to modernize financial services.

feed.summary: Pineapple Financial Inc. has appointed Anthony Georgiades to its Board of Directors and newly formed Special Advisory Committee. feed.title: iPower Completes Initial Digital Asset Treasury Purchases
feed.summary: iPower Inc. (Nasdaq: IPW) announced it has completed its initial acquisitions under its Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) strategy, deploying capital into digital assets for the first time. The company purchased 15.1 Bitcoin (BTC) and 301.1 Ethereum (ETH) for a total notional value of approximately $1.325 million and $883,600, respectively. iPower plans to continue evaluating additional purchases based on market conditions, as this deployment marks an important milestone in their crypto strategy.

feed.title: Klarna Group (KLAR) Collaborates With Coinbase for Stablecoin Funding
feed.summary: Klarna Group (KLAR) has announced a partnership with Coinbase to allow institutional investors to fund Klarna with stablecoins, marking a significant shift for the buy now, pay later company which had previously avoided cryptocurrency. This move follows Klarna's recent introduction of its own stablecoin, KlarnaUSD, and a collaboration with crypto wallet company Privy, as fintech companies globally explore stablecoins. Despite these crypto initiatives, Klarna's stock is down 30.75% YTD.

feed.title: Pineapple Financial Appoints Anthony Georgiades to Board of Directors and Special Advisory Committee
feed.summary: Pineapple Financial Inc. has appointed Anthony Georgiades, General Partner at Innovating Capital, to its Board of Directors and a new Special Advisory Committee. Georgiades will provide expertise in digital assets, Web3, and institutional investments to guide the company's digital asset treasury strategy, which focuses on accumulating Injective ($INJ) tokens. This move aims to integrate on-chain infrastructure into Pineapple's operations and capital framework, combining modern mortgage technology with blockchain to bring real-world mortgage data on-chain.

feed.title: Buy The BITB ETF Before Bitcoin Rebounds Back to $100,000k
feed.summary: The article discusses the Bitwise Bitcoin ETF Trust (BITB) as a way for investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin after its recent drop from its November 2025 peak of over $107,000. It highlights BITB's direct Bitcoin holding, 0.20% expense ratio, and $3.6 billion in assets, while also comparing it to BlackRock's IBIT as an alternative with deeper liquidity. The author suggests that while timing the market is difficult, BITB offers a regulated vehicle for those who believe in Bitcoin's long-term trajectory towards $100,000.

feed.title: Forward Industries (FWDI) Powers SOL Growth, Brings Equity On-Chain
feed.summary: Forward Industries (FWDI) has announced significant progress in its Solana treasury strategy, including a $1.65 billion private placement and key appointments. The company launched an institutional-grade Solana validator and fwdSOL liquid staking token, while enabling tokenized holding of FWDI shares on the SOL blockchain. With over 6.9 million SOL held as of December 1, 2025, Forward Industries is compounding long-term SOL-per-share and aiming to deliver sustainable shareholder value.

feed.title: BitMine Immersion (BMNR) stock edges up after-hours after $13.2B crypto stash update — what investors watch next
feed.summary: BitMine Immersion (BMNR) stock saw a modest after-hours increase following an update on its ether holdings, revealing $13.2 billion in crypto, cash, and investments. Investors are now focusing on a January 15 annual meeting and a January 14 proxy deadline as key catalysts. The company's significant ether position means its stock price often acts as a proxy for cryptocurrency movements, and the upcoming shareholder vote on increasing authorized shares is a critical near-term pressure point.

feed.title: Os principais atrasados do Índice Nasdaq 100 e do QQQ ETF em 2025
feed.summary: Este artigo analisa as empresas com o pior desempenho no Índice Nasdaq 100 e no QQQ ETF durante o ano de 2025. feed.title: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) Powers SOL Growth, Brings Equity On-Chain
feed.summary: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) has detailed significant progress in its Solana treasury strategy, including a $1.65 billion private placement, key executive appointments, and the formation of a crypto advisory board. Forward Industries holds over 6.9 million SOL, earning a substantial APY through its validator infrastructure, and remains debt-free.

feed.title: Bitcoin Depot amends credit agreement and pays down $7 million in term loans By Investing.com
feed.summary: Bitcoin Depot Inc. announced an amendment to its credit agreement, paying down $7 million in term loans and adjusting the amortization schedule. This strategic financial management follows a strong third-quarter revenue report and precedes a leadership change with Scott Buchanan becoming the new CEO in 2026. The company continues to navigate strategic expansions and regulatory challenges.

feed.title: BlackRock hits record milestone in payouts
feed.summary: BlackRock's tokenized money market fund, BUIDL, has reached a significant milestone by distributing $100 million in payouts, showcasing the growing integration of traditional finance and decentralized finance. Launched in March 2024, BUIDL invests in short-term USD-denominated assets like U.S. Treasury bills, allowing investors to earn dividend yield directly on-chain. This achievement highlights the success of tokenized assets in providing investors with income from underlying real-world assets.

feed.title: Datavault AI (DVLT) Announces Dream Bowl XIV Partnership Expansion and Dream Bowl Meme Coin II Dividend
feed.summary: Datavault AI (NASDAQ: DVLT) has announced two initiatives related to Dream Bowl XIV: a partnership with Dream Bowl XIV and NFL Alumni Health to launch Dream Bowl Meme Coin II, and a board-approved dividend of this digital collectible to eligible record holders. These initiatives leverage AI, tokenization, and digital engagement to enhance player health, talent evaluation, and shareholder value, with a record date for the dividend set for January 7, 2026.

feed.title: Key facts: MicroStrategy Acquires 1,229 BTC for $108.8M; MSCI to Review Status
feed.summary: MicroStrategy announced a new acquisition of 1,229 BTC for approximately $108.8 million, increasing its total Bitcoin holdings to 672,497 BTC. This purchase was funded by a stock offering. Additionally, MSCI is set to review MicroStrategy’s status on January 15, potentially impacting its inclusion in equity indices due to its significant cryptocurrency investments.

feed.title: Bank of America (BAC) Estimates Refreshed After Keefe Bruyette Review
feed.summary: Keefe Bruyette analyst Christopher McGratty raised Bank of America's (NYSE: BAC) price target to $64 from $58 and maintained an Outperform rating after refreshing estimates based on recent meetings with management. The bank also announced it would begin allowing wealth advisors to recommend crypto allocations in client portfolios starting in January, expanding the role advisors play in guiding clients on digital asset products. This move aligns with the bank's previous allowance for clients with certain asset thresholds to access bitcoin ETFs since early 2024.

feed.title: Senator Bought Up To $1.6 Million In Bitcoin ETF Shares In 2025 — Here's The Potential Conflict Of Interest
feed.summary: Senator David McCormick (R-Pa.) has made significant purchases of the Bitwise Bitcoin ETF (BITB) throughout 2025, totaling potentially up to $1.6 million. These investments, alongside his role on the Senate Banking Subcommittee on Digital Assets, raise concerns about potential conflicts of interest. McCormick, who has a pro-crypto stance and received an endorsement from Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong, could face scrutiny given his committee assignments and the timing of his Bitcoin ETF acquisitions.

feed.title: IPower To Plow $30M Into Digital Asset Treasury Strategy
feed.summary: iPower Inc. has announced a $30 million convertible note financing facility to launch its Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) strategy, aiming to position the company at the intersection of digital assets and real-world commerce. The initial $9 million in committed funding will allocate approximately $4.4 million to establish a digital asset treasury holding Bitcoin and Ethereum. This move is a crucial step in iPower's broader crypto strategy, building on its existing operating business with $59 million in trailing 12-month revenue.

feed.title: Galaxy Digital CEO Michael Novogratz Flags A Hidden Risk For Investors Still Underweight Crypto
feed.summary: Michael Novogratz, CEO of Galaxy Digital, warned that investors who are underexposed to crypto face significant risk because the market is poised for a sharp upside move. He highlighted current macro factors like falling inflation, a potentially dovish Federal Reserve, and stress in global currency markets as drivers for a shift in asset allocation. Novogratz believes crypto's underperformance relative to other macro-sensitive assets, coupled with a lack of institutional positioning, sets the stage for a "pain trade" scenario where institutions may be forced to chase rising prices.

feed.title: Galaxy Digital (NASDAQ:GLXY) Trading 2.7% Higher - Here's Why
feed.summary: Shares of Galaxy Digital (NASDAQ:GLXY) traded up 2.7% during mid-day trading on Monday, driven by bullish analyst ratings with a consensus "Buy" rating and a target price of $46.00. Notable insider activity includes a director purchasing 10,000 shares, while another insider sold 750,000 shares, reducing their stake by 52%. Trading volume was significantly lower than average.

feed.title: Intuit’s TurboTax and QuickBooks move toward USDC stablecoin payments in Circle deal
feed.summary: Intuit is integrating Circle's USDC stablecoin infrastructure into its TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Credit Karma products to enable faster and lower-cost payments, refunds, and remittances. This strategic partnership aims to utilize stablecoins for programmable, round-the-clock transactions, tapping into Intuit's vast customer base and the over $100 billion annual tax refund market. The move aligns with a broader trend of fintech companies exploring stablecoins for financial operations, as seen with Visa and PayPal.

feed.title: iPower stock plunges after announcing Bitcoin and Ethereum purchases
feed.summary: iPower Inc (NASDAQ:IPW) stock dropped 18% after revealing its first investments in cryptocurrency, purchasing 15.1 Bitcoin and 301.1 Ethereum totaling $2.21 million. These transactions are part of a new "Digital Asset Treasury strategy," which the market reacted to negatively due to concerns about the company's departure from its core business. The company plans to make additional digital asset purchases based on market conditions and capital availability.

feed.title: BlackRock's BUIDL hits $100M in payouts, showing tokenized finance at scale
feed.summary: BlackRock's tokenized money market fund, BUIDL, has distributed $100 million in cumulative dividends since its launch in March 2024, highlighting the growing adoption of tokenized securities. Issued on the Ethereum blockchain and expanding to six others, BUIDL offers institutional investors yield from US dollar–denominated assets. This milestone demonstrates the operational efficiency and scalability of tokenized finance, mirroring traditional financial products while drawing interest from large asset managers.

feed.title: BlackRock’s BUIDL hits $100M in dividends and passes $2B in assets
feed.summary: BlackRock's tokenized money market fund, BUIDL, has distributed approximately $100 million in dividends and its assets have grown past $2 billion since its launch in March 2024. BUIDL, which invests in short-dated U.S. Treasuries, repurchase agreements, and cash equivalents, is the largest tokenized cash product in the market and provides a regulated alternative to stablecoins for institutions seeking yield-bearing dollar exposure. The fund's blockchain-based structure allows qualified institutional investors to hold shares as tokens with yield paid out on-chain, and these tokens are integrated into the crypto market plumbing for various uses.

feed.title: Intuit jumps into stablecoin business with Circle partnership, enables faster tax refunds via USDC
feed.summary: Intuit has partnered with Circle to integrate USDC stablecoin technology across its platforms, including TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Credit Karma. This multi-year agreement aims to revolutionize the tax refund process by enabling faster, lower-cost, and programmable money movement through blockchain technology. The collaboration positions Intuit at the forefront of mainstream cryptocurrency adoption, offering users the option for instant stablecoin-based refunds and payments.

feed.title: Pineapple Financial Appoints Anthony Georgiades to Board of Directors and Special Advisory Committee
feed.summary: Pineapple Financial Inc. has appointed Anthony Georgiades, General Partner at Innovating Capital, to its Board of Directors and a newly formed Special Advisory Committee. Mr. Georgiades will provide expertise in digital assets, Web3, and institutional investment, particularly in overseeing the company's digital asset treasury strategy focused on accumulating Injective ($INJ) tokens. This appointment aims to enhance governance, risk management, and strategic execution as Pineapple integrates on-chain infrastructure to modernize financial services.

feed.title: Trump family-linked ALT5 Sigma draws renewed scrutiny
feed.summary: ALT5 Sigma, a crypto company backed by the Trump family's World Liberty Financial, is facing renewed scrutiny after its newly appointed auditor's license lapsed earlier this year. The company is also at risk of Nasdaq delisting due to its failure to file its Q3 financial report on time. Shares have dropped over 77% since the start of 2025 as the company navigates this period of crisis.

feed.title: Brag House Holdings, Inc. Announces Merger with House of Doge Inc.
feed.summary: Brag House Holdings, Inc. announced a merger with House of Doge Inc. on December 29, 2025, which will lead to Brag House being renamed House of Doge Inc. The merger aims to utilize Dogecoin's market position and includes a 20-year partnership with the Dogecoin Foundation, with House of Doge becoming a wholly owned subsidiary of Brag House.

feed.title: Rezolve Ai Unveils New SQD Revenue Model Backed by Enterprise Customers
feed.summary: Rezolve Ai announced its wholly-owned subsidiary, SQD Network, has launched a "Revenue Pools" model to fund its high-performance blockchain data services through direct customer payments, addressing the increasing demand from large enterprise and institutional clients. This model aims to strengthen the SQD ecosystem by aligning infrastructure capacity with customer usage, promoting demand-driven token usage, and shifting from token issuance to customer-funded operations. The initiative is designed to scale progressively, with SQD token holders able to temporarily lock tokens to support infrastructure, potentially sharing in customer payments.

feed.title: Rezolve Ai Unveils New SQD Revenue Model Backed by Enterprise Customers
feed.summary: Rezolve AI (NASDAQ: RZLV) has introduced a new "Revenue Pools" model through its subsidiary, SQD Network, to fund data infrastructure growth by enabling enterprise customers to directly support capacity. This model allows SQD token holders to lock their tokens to help secure infrastructure, and in return, they may receive a portion of customer subscription payments in stablecoins. The initiative aims to align network growth with customer demand and strengthen the SQD ecosystem by reducing token supply circulation and funding operations through customer payments rather than ongoing token issuance.

feed.title: Portnoy Law Firm Announces Class Action on Behalf of DeFi Technologies, Inc. Investors
feed.summary: The Portnoy Law Firm has announced a class action lawsuit against DeFi Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: DEFT) on behalf of investors who purchased securities between May 12, 2025, and November 14, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that DeFi Technologies made false and misleading statements regarding its DeFi arbitrage strategy, competition from other digital asset treasury companies, and its ability to meet revenue guidance for fiscal year 2025. feed.title: DEFT Shareholders - If you lost money in your DeFi Technologies Inc. investment contact Robbins LLP about leading the class DEFT class action
feed.summary: Robbins LLP has filed a class action lawsuit against DeFi Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:DEFT) on behalf of investors who purchased shares between May 12 and November 14, 2025. feed.title: Crypto Crash Oct 2025: Leverage Meets Liquidity
feed.summary: This article details the crypto crash of October 2025, where over $19 billion in crypto leverage was liquidated, triggering a broader sell-off that continued into December. It analyzes how high leverage, market illiquidity, and architectural flaws in crypto venues, particularly unified margin systems and automatic-deleveraging mechanisms, contributed to the crisis. The author highlights the importance of robust risk management, multi-venue pricing for oracles, and transparent exchange practices to mitigate future destabilizing events in the volatile crypto markets.

feed.title: Guarantor: JPMorgan Chase & Co.
feed.summary: JPMorgan Chase Financial Company LLC has issued Auto Callable Accelerated Barrier Notes, fully and unconditionally guaranteed by JPMorgan Chase & Co., linked to the iShares Ethereum Trust ETF. Investors face significant risks, including the potential loss of principal, credit risks of JPMorgan Financial and JPMorgan Chase & Co., and the high volatility associated with cryptocurrency-backed investments.
