feed.title: DeFi Technologies entra no Brasil com ETPs e BDRs na B3
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies, along with its subsidiary Valour, has officially launched Brazilian Depositary Receipts (BDRs) and five digital asset Exchange Traded Products (ETPs) on Brazil's B3 exchange. This strategic move marks the company's entry into Latin America's largest crypto economy, providing Brazilian investors with locally listed exposure to DeFi Technologies' shares and Valour's ETPs for major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Solana, and Sui. The expansion positions Brazil as a key component of the company's global strategy, leveraging the country's unified language, regulatory framework, and capital market infrastructure.
feed.source: Investing.com Brasil - Finanças, Câmbio e Investimentos
feed.source_domain: Investing.com Brasil - Finanças, Câmbio e Investimentos

feed.title: What's Going On With Jiuzi Holdings Stock Monday?
feed.summary: Jiuzi Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: JZXN) announced a cooperation agreement with EXSAT.NETWORK LTD, the core ecosystem organization of EOS, to develop an institutional-grade cryptocurrency custody business aiming for an initial scale of up to $3 billion. This partnership marks Jiuzi's entry into the global digital asset custody space, strategically expanding beyond its current operations. The company expects this venture to significantly enhance its global presence and industry position within new energy, fintech, and digital assets.

feed.title: Potential Rumblings In The Crypto Market Shine A Spotlight On The REX Osprey XRP ETF
feed.summary: The cryptocurrency market has experienced significant volatility, with Bitcoin seeing a recent drawdown and XRP's performance lagging despite accumulation by large holders. The REX Osprey XRP ETF (XRPR) offers investors a regulated way to gain exposure to XRP's potential recovery without the operational challenges of direct crypto ownership. While XRPR has faced initial difficulties coinciding with its debut, signs of a potential turnaround and increased inflows into the crypto ecosystem are attracting attention.

feed.title: Scilex Holding Company Confirms Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin
feed.summary: Scilex Holding Company (Nasdaq: SCLX) has confirmed the claim process for its Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin, which begins on December 24, 2025. This meme coin, powered by Datavault AI's blockchain technology, integrates sports, digital assets, and shareholder benefits. Eligible shareholders as of November 25, 2025, can claim their tokens through the designated website.

feed.title: Netcapital Earnings Call: Blockchain Pivot Amid Revenue Slide
feed.summary: Netcapital Inc.'s recent Q2 earnings call revealed a strategic pivot towards blockchain and tokenized assets, aiming for high-margin revenue streams despite a significant drop in portal fees. While the company narrowed its loss per share, investors remain concerned about a sharp revenue decline, stubborn operating losses, and the rationale behind recent acquisitions. The long-term success of Netcapital now hinges on its ability to execute this new strategy and generate meaningful revenue, addressing investor skepticism about capital allocation and cost control.

feed.title: Trump Media Bitcoin Holdings Hit 11,542 BTC
feed.summary: Trump Media & Technology Group has increased its Bitcoin holdings to 11,542 BTC, valued at over $1 billion, after a recent purchase of 451 BTC for $40.3 million. This move aligns with the company's strategy to become a Bitcoin-heavy investment vehicle, a trend also noted by BlackRock, which highlighted Bitcoin as a top investment theme for 2025. BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust has seen significant growth, reaching $68 billion in AUM and $63 billion in net inflows.

feed.title: Wall Street Sees More Than 69% Upside for Core Scientific Inc. (CORZ)
feed.summary: Analysts project a significant upside for Core Scientific Inc. (CORZ), with price targets suggesting over 69% growth despite a recent stock decline. The positive outlook is driven by the company's strong growth prospects in high-performance computing (HPC) and its strategic position to meet accelerating demand amidst power constraints. Core Scientific is expected to report improved financial results for Q4 2025, with a forecast of $108.48 million in revenue and a negative $0.14 GAAP EPS.

feed.title: Bitfarms (TSX:BITF) Is Up 6.9% After S&P/TSX Inclusion And AI Pivot Announcement - Has The Bull Case Changed?
feed.summary: Bitfarms (TSX:BITF) has seen a 6.9% increase in its stock price following its inclusion in the S&P/TSX Capped Composite Index and an announced pivot towards AI and high-performance computing data centers. The company plans to convert an 18 MW Washington State facility by December 2026, backed by significant financing. This strategic shift aims to transform Bitfarms from a bitcoin miner into a competitive AI infrastructure provider, though execution risks and dependency on external financing remain key factors for its future performance.

feed.title: Galaxy Digital Predicts Bitcoin Could Reach $250,000 by 2027
feed.summary: Galaxy Digital's Head of Firmwide Research, Alex Thorn, predicts Bitcoin (BTC) could reach $250,000 by the end of 2027, driven by institutional adoption, easing monetary policy, and its role as a dollar hedge. Despite this long-term bullish outlook, Thorn expects 2026 to be "too chaotic to predict" due to macroeconomic ambiguity and political developments, with a cautious near-term forecast as Bitcoin has struggled to regain bullish momentum. Bitcoin is currently trading near $89,000 and is on track for its worst Q4 performance since 2018, leading to downward revisions for its 2025 price target.

feed.title: Blue Gold and Trust Stamp Execute Strategic LOI to Develop Biometric, Passwordless Wallet Infrastructure for Gold-Backed Digital Assets
feed.summary: Blue Gold Limited has announced a strategic Letter of Intent with Trust Stamp, Inc. to develop a biometric, passwordless "Wallet-of-Wallets" platform for its gold-backed digital assets, Standard Gold Coins (SGCs). This partnership aims to enhance the security and privacy of SGC holdings, eliminating the need for traditional passwords and seed phrases, and positioning Blue Gold at the forefront of secure tokenized gold ownership. The solution will leverage Trust Stamp's biometric identity tokenization to provide a non-custodial architecture with advanced governance and recovery features.

feed.title: Intuit (INTU) Stock After Hours Today (Dec. 22, 2025): What Moved Shares After the Bell — and What to Watch Before the Market Opens Dec. 23
feed.summary: Intuit (NASDAQ: INTU) closed modestly higher on Monday and remained stable in after-hours trading, with investors focused on three key developments. These include Intuit's growing push into stablecoin-powered money movement, a new shareholder proposal filing related to a "Diversity & Inclusion Programs ROI Audit," and the upcoming tax season marketing campaign for TurboTax. Analysts maintain a constructive outlook on INTU with an average price target significantly above its current trading price.

feed.title: Jiuzi Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: JZXN) and EXSAT.NETWORK LTD Sign Cooperation Agreement to Jointly Explore and Develop a $3 Billion Cryptocurrency Custody Business
feed.summary: Jiuzi Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: JZXN) has signed a cooperation agreement with EXSAT.NETWORK LTD, the core ecosystem organization of EOS, to explore and develop a cryptocurrency custody business valued at up to $3 billion USD. This partnership aims to build a business framework and technical system for institutional-grade crypto asset depository and custody services, leveraging EXSAT NETWORK's expertise in public chains and wallet technology, while enhancing Jiuzi Holdings' position in the global digital asset market. The collaboration is seen as a significant step in Jiuzi Holdings' "New Energy + FinTech + Digital Asset" strategy.

feed.title: LM Funding America Adds 35 PH/s with Energization of First Oklahoma Immersion Unit
feed.summary: LM Funding America (NASDAQ: LMFA) has energized its first BC40 Elite immersion cooled Foghashing unit in Oklahoma, adding approximately 35 Petahash per second (PH/s) to its energized hashrate. This unit powers 160 Bitmain S21 immersion miners, with a second unit expected to be installed later this month, aiming for a total energized hashrate of 780 PH/s by year-end 2025. The company also reported its Bitcoin holdings were valued at approximately $27.5 million as of November 30, 2025.

feed.title: Firearms retailer GrabAGun begins accepting cryptocurrency payments By Investing.com
feed.summary: GrabAGun Digital Holdings Inc. (NYSE:PEW), an online firearms retailer, has announced it now accepts cryptocurrency payments including Bitcoin, USD Coin, and Tether on its website. This move is aimed at modernizing the purchasing experience and attracting digitally native consumers while maintaining regulatory compliance. Despite facing profitability challenges, GrabAGun boasts a strong liquidity position and recently reported a 10% year-over-year revenue increase in Q3 2025.

feed.title: How a Trump Media Deal With a Crypto Firm Exposes Potential Conflicts of Interest
feed.summary: A deal between Trump Media and Technology Group and Crypto.com has raised concerns about potential conflicts of interest. Crypto.com, previously under investigation by the Biden administration, saw the probe dropped after Trump won the election, subsequently donating $11 million to Trump-affiliated political committees and engaging a lobbyist close to Trump. This arrangement is viewed by ethics experts as a "pay-to-play" scenario, where the crypto firm's financial support correlates with favorable outcomes from the administration and a lucrative partnership with Trump's company.

feed.title: DeFi Development Corp. shareholders approve equity plan amendments and board elections By Investing.com
feed.summary: DeFi Development Corp. shareholders approved amendments to the 2023 Equity Incentive Plan, increasing shares by 1,500,000, and adopted a 2025 Employee Stock Purchase Plan for 250,000 shares. They also re-elected five directors, ratified Wolf & Company, P.C. as auditors, and authorized an increase in common and preferred stock to 1,000,000,000 each.

feed.title: EUDA Integrates QB Utility Token to Create a Digital Health and Rewards Platform Across Its Healthcare Ecosystem
feed.summary: EUDA Health Holdings Limited is integrating the QB utility token into its digital health and rewards platform to enhance customer loyalty and experience across its healthcare ecosystem. This strategic move allows customers and agents to earn and redeem QB tokens for EUDA's various healthcare offerings, creating a unified digital engagement platform built on Binance Smart Chain. The initiative supports EUDA's vision of a modern, interactive healthcare ecosystem that merges wellness, technology, and user interaction.

feed.title: Flora Growth shareholders approve name change, stock plan amendment and share split
feed.summary: Flora Growth shareholders approved key proposals including a potential name change to "ZeroStack Corp.", amendments to its incentive compensation plan to increase issuable shares and options, and authorization for a forward share split. The company also recently acquired $0G tokens, filed a financial update blog post, and entered a strategic partnership with DeFi Development Corp involving a private placement. These moves aim to comply with Nasdaq Listing Rules and position Flora Growth in the evolving digital asset space.

feed.title: LM Funding America Signs Multiple Material Agreements
feed.summary: LM Funding America (LMFA) has entered into several significant agreements to raise capital, including a Securities Purchase Agreement with institutional investors for approximately $6.0 million in gross proceeds. The company also signed a Placement Agency Agreement with Maxim Group and amended certain investor warrants to support its Bitcoin treasury strategy and for general corporate purposes. These actions are detailed in an 8-K SEC filing from December 22, 2025.

feed.title: Signing Day Sports Signs Amendment to Business Combination Agreement With One Blockchain
feed.summary: Signing Day Sports has amended its business combination agreement with One Blockchain to extend key timelines and simplify the capital structure. The Outside Date for the transaction has been moved to February 17, 2026, with a potential extension to April 30, 2026. This amendment also removes a prior provision for super-voting preferred shares, aiming to keep the merger on track.

feed.title: Fold to be included in the Russell 2000 Index
feed.summary: Fold Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: FLD), a bitcoin financial services company, announced its inclusion in the Russell 2000 Index. This milestone is expected to broaden market awareness and increase visibility among investors, validating Fold's position as a successful public company. The company emphasizes its strategy to integrate Bitcoin into everyday commerce, citing strong demand for its Bitcoin Gift Card and the upcoming Fold Bitcoin Rewards Credit Card.

feed.title: JPMorgan Chase stock hits all-time high at 322.89 USD
feed.summary: JPMorgan Chase (JPM) stock reached a new all-time high of $322.89, reflecting a 35.42% increase over the past year and a 35.13% year-to-date return. The company, with a market capitalization of $878.58 billion, also boasts a P/E ratio of 15.94 and a 1.89% dividend yield, having consistently paid dividends for 55 years. Recent developments include the upcoming retirement of investment banking chairman Jamie Grant, a raised price target from TD Cowen, and the launch of a tokenized money market fund on the Ethereum blockchain.

feed.title: WISeKey Issues Year-End CEO Letter to Shareholders
feed.summary: WISeKey International Holding Ltd issued a year-end CEO letter to shareholders highlighting 2025 as a milestone year, marked by the uplisting of SEALSQ, the acquisition of IC’ALPS, and the launch of a $100 million Quantum Fund. The company is strategically positioning itself at the forefront of the digital trust revolution with new solutions and prepares for the WISeSat listing. WISeKey also plans to redomicile to the British Virgin Islands to enhance strategic and operational flexibility, aiming for a primary listing on Nasdaq and secondary on SIX Swiss Exchange.

feed.title: Intuit Stock (INTU) Today: Stablecoin Push With Circle, OpenAI Deal, and 2026 Tax Season Catalysts Investors Are Watching
feed.summary: Intuit (INTU) is entering 2026 with strong catalysts, including a stablecoin partnership with Circle focusing on payments and refunds across its products. The company has also forged a major AI collaboration with OpenAI to integrate AI agents into TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Credit Karma. Additionally, new marketing initiatives for TurboTax and Credit Karma aim to capture market share for the 2026 tax season.

feed.title: Mawson regains Nasdaq compliance, continues capital market listing
feed.summary: Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc. has regained compliance with Nasdaq's listing requirements, ensuring its continued presence on The Nasdaq Capital Market. This follows significant volatility in its stock, a reverse stock split, and ongoing efforts to meet minimum bid price and market value standards. The company, which builds and operates digital infrastructure for AI, high-performance computing, and digital assets, reported a decline in recent revenue and is focusing on carbon-free energy sources for its operations.

feed.title: Greenridge Capital initiates coverage on Cango stock with Buy rating
feed.summary: Greenridge Capital has initiated coverage on Cango Inc. (NYSE:CANG) with a Buy rating and a price target of $4.00, representing a 156% upside from its current price. The firm cites Cango's leadership in Bitcoin mining and its asset-light model for HPC market entry as key drivers, considering the stock "mispriced and overlooked." Despite substantial assets, including over $600 million in Bitcoin and an acquired infrastructure facility, Cango faces a significant debt burden and negative free cash flow.

feed.title: Hut 8 Stock (HUT) Jumps on Benchmark’s Street-High $85 Target as $7 Billion AI Data Center Deal Re-Rates the Story
feed.summary: Hut 8 Corp. (HUT) shares surged after Benchmark raised its price target to $85, citing the company's pivot from crypto to AI and high-performance computing data centers. This re-rating follows Hut 8's 15-year, $7 billion AI data center lease deal with Fluidstack at its River Bend campus, backed by Google, which analysts view as a strategic shift towards institutional-grade digital infrastructure. The market is now valuing Hut 8 based on its long-dated contracted cash flow and expansion potential in the AI infrastructure sector, moving beyond its traditional crypto mining valuation.

feed.title: JPMorgan Chase Stock News Today (Dec. 22, 2025): JPM Eyes Crypto Trading, Faces Tricolor Fallout, and Heads Toward 2025 Earnings
feed.summary: JPMorgan Chase (NYSE: JPM) is exploring cryptocurrency trading services for institutional clients amid a more crypto-friendly regulatory environment. The bank faces fallout from the Tricolor subprime auto lender collapse, including a $170 million write-off and allegations of awareness of accounting issues. Investors are also focused on JPM's projected 2026 expenses of $105 billion and its upcoming Q4 and full-year 2025 earnings release on January 13, 2026.

feed.title: Datavault stock soars on new patents but underlying risks warrant selling
feed.summary: Datavault AI Inc. (DVLT) stock surged nearly 20% following the announcement of two new patents related to blockchain-enabled content licensing and tokenized monetization. While these patents reinforce Datavault's ambition to transform digital content, the article warns of significant underlying risks such as an overvalued stock price (103x sales), lack of consistent cash flow, and its penny stock status, suggesting caution or selling despite the recent rally. The company's future remains speculative without proof of sustained revenue growth and stabilization above compliance levels.

feed.title: Bitmine Immersion's ether holdings exceed 4K tokens in past week (BMNR:NYSE)
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) announced its Ether holdings reached 4.07 million tokens as of December 21, 2025, valued at approximately $12.2 billion. This represents an increase from 3.98 million ETH held the previous week, maintaining a similar total dollar value. The company's crypto holdings continue to be a key indicator for investors.

feed.title: Nscale agrees $865m deal for 40MW of space at WhiteFiber data center in North Carolina
feed.summary: Nscale has secured a $865 million, ten-year deal with WhiteFiber to lease 40MW of data center space at WhiteFiber's NC-1 facility in Madison, North Carolina. Nscale, a neocloud provider, plans to begin using 20MW in April 2026 and another 20MW the following month, with the potential to double its deployment by late 2027. WhiteFiber, the colo and HPC subsidiary of Bitcoin mining firm Bit Digital, acquired the 96-acre site earlier this year, which is being developed to support advanced AI workloads.

feed.title: TeraWulf: Turning Scarce Megawatts Into Contracted AI Cash Flows (NASDAQ:WULF)
feed.summary: TeraWulf (WULF) is shifting from Bitcoin mining to providing high-density compute infrastructure, capitalizing on AI demand and power scarcity. The company has secured significant green financing and begun realizing revenue from High-Performance Computing (HPC) lease agreements, with substantial contracts extending into 2026. Despite potential risks related to execution and market volatility, WULF's strategic execution and contracted capacity position it for continued value growth.

feed.title: Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) Announces ETH Holdings Reach 4.066 Million Tokens, and Total Crypto and Total Cash Holdings of $13.2 Billion
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) has announced that its ETH holdings have reached 4.066 million tokens, contributing to a total of $13.2 billion in crypto and cash holdings. The company now owns 3.37% of the total ETH supply and is making progress towards its goal of acquiring 5%. Bitmine will also hold its annual stockholders meeting at the Wynn Las Vegas on January 15, 2026.

feed.title: Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) Announces ETH Holdings Reach 4.066 Million Tokens, and Total Crypto and Total Cash Holdings of $13.2 Billion
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) announced its ETH holdings have reached 4.066 million tokens, accounting for 3.37% of the total ETH supply, and its total crypto and cash holdings now stand at $13.2 billion. The company continues to make rapid progress towards its goal of acquiring 5% of ETH and will hold its annual stockholders meeting at the Wynn Las Vegas on January 15, 2026. Bitmine also highlighted its position as the largest ETH treasury globally, supported by a premier group of institutional investors.

feed.title: Greenridge Capital initiates coverage on Cango stock with Buy rating
feed.summary: Greenridge Capital has initiated coverage on Cango Inc. (NYSE:CANG) with a "Buy" rating and a price target of $4.00, representing a 156% upside from its current price. The firm cited Cango's market-leading position in Bitcoin mining and its asset-light model for HPC entry as primary drivers. Despite a significant debt burden and negative free cash flow, Greenridge believes Cango is "mispriced and overlooked by the market."

feed.title: Biometric wallet aims to make owning tokenized gold safer and password-free
feed.summary: Blue Gold (NASDAQ: BGL) has signed a Letter of Intent with Trust Stamp (NASDAQ: IDAI) to develop a biometric, passwordless "Wallet-of-Wallets" for its Standard Gold Coins (SGC). Each SGC represents one gram of physical gold, and the partnership aims to enhance security and access to these gold-backed digital assets. This initiative follows Blue Gold's securing access to up to one million ounces of physical gold, reinforcing its commitment to a secure and transparent digital gold ecosystem.

feed.title: Sequans Communications Announces Completion of ADS Repurchase Program and Approval of New Buyback Authorization
feed.summary: Sequans Communications S.A. announced the completion of its previously authorized ADS repurchase program, having repurchased 1,516,973 American Depositary Shares at an average price of $6.17 per ADS, representing approximately 9.7% of outstanding ADSs. The company's Board of Directors has approved a new buyback program for an additional 10% of outstanding ADSs, funded by Bitcoin dispositions, to enhance shareholder value and increase Bitcoin per share. Dr. Georges Karam, CEO, emphasized the company's commitment to accretive growth through disciplined capital allocation.

feed.title: Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) Announces ETH Holdings Reach 4.066 Million Tokens, and Total Crypto and Total Cash Holdings of $13.2 Billion
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) has announced that its ETH holdings have reached 4.066 million tokens, accounting for 3.37% of the total ETH supply, and its total crypto and cash holdings now stand at $13.2 billion. The company continues its aggressive accumulation strategy toward an "alchemy of 5%" of ETH and will host its annual stockholders meeting at the Wynn Las Vegas on January 15, 2026. Bitmine also leads in crypto NAV per share velocity and BMNR stock liquidity, ranking as the 66th most traded stock in the US.

feed.title: Bitmine Immersion Announces ETH Holdings Reach 4.066 Million Tokens, and Total Crypto and Total Cash Holdings of $13.2 Billion
feed.summary: Bitmine Immersion has announced significant crypto and cash holdings totaling $13.2 billion, including 4.066 million ETH tokens, which represents 3.37% of the total ETH supply. The company is rapidly approaching its goal of acquiring 5% of ETH and plans to hold its annual stockholders meeting at the Wynn Las Vegas on January 15, 2026. Bitmine also leads as the top Ethereum treasury globally and is a highly traded stock in the US.

feed.title: You can now buy guns online with Bitcoin as this retailer goes crypto
feed.summary: GrabAGun Digital Holdings Inc. (NYSE: PEW) has announced it is now accepting Bitcoin, USD Coin, and Tether for firearm and accessory purchases online, becoming the first major firearms retailer to do so. This move aims to modernize the purchasing experience, attract a younger, tech-savvy demographic, and reinforce GrabAGun's commitment to innovation while maintaining regulatory compliance. CEO Marc Nemati highlighted the direct response to customer demand for flexible payment solutions and the strategic targeting of digitally native consumers.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Provides Clarifying Update on Share Ownership and Depository Imbalances and Outlines Next Steps and Announces Resignation of Director | Corporate
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies issued a clarifying update regarding share ownership and depository imbalances, following a review requested by the Ontario Securities Commission. The company has engaged ShareIntel to investigate trading irregularities and has contacted multiple broker-dealers for reconciliation. Additionally, Stefan Hascoet has resigned from the board of directors.

feed.title: This real estate firm slashed its software bill 31% by building its own tech
feed.summary: La Rosa Holdings Corp. announced a 31% annualized reduction in its technology operating costs for 2025 compared to 2022, primarily by shifting from third-party software to proprietary in-house platforms. This move, which includes AI-driven automation and blockchain initiatives, is expected to generate $0.35 million in annual savings while improving integration, data ownership, and security. Despite this efficiency, the company's stock experienced a slight decline reflecting a moderate negative market reaction.

feed.title: Ethereum marketer who shaped early narratives joins Bit Digital board
feed.summary: Bit Digital (Nasdaq: BTBT) has appointed Amanda Cassatt, founder and CEO of Serotonin and former CMO of Consensys, to its Board of Directors, effective January 1, 2026. This appointment aims to strengthen Bit Digital's expansion in Ethereum and AI infrastructure, leveraging Cassatt's extensive experience in digital assets, institutional adoption, and product strategy. The company emphasized that Cassatt's expertise will support its focus on productive digital asset strategies and compute-driven business models.

feed.title: Bit Digital Announces Appointment of Amanda Cassatt to Board of Directors
feed.summary: Bit Digital, Inc. has appointed Amanda Cassatt, founder and CEO of Serotonin, to its Board of Directors, effective January 1, 2026. Cassatt's experience in digital assets, institutional adoption, and product strategy is expected to support Bit Digital's expansion in Ethereum and AI infrastructure. Her appointment further strengthens the company's corporate governance and strategic alignment with its Ethereum and AI-focused growth strategy.

feed.title: Bit digital appoints serotonin CEO Amanda Cassatt to board
feed.summary: Bit Digital, Inc. announced the appointment of Amanda Cassatt, CEO of Serotonin, to its Board of Directors effective January 1, 2026. This move aligns with Bit Digital's expansion in Ethereum and AI infrastructure, leveraging Cassatt's expertise in digital assets and institutional adoption. The company also reported strong Q3 2025 revenue growth and a reiterated "Buy" rating from H.C. Wainwright.

feed.title: Galaxy Digital Forecasts Bitcoin to Hit $250000 by End of 2027
feed.summary: Galaxy Digital's Head of Firmwide Research, Alex Thorn, projects Bitcoin to reach $250,000 by the end of 2027, driven by increasing institutional adoption and its role as a hedge against currency debasement. However, Thorn expresses caution for 2026 due to macroeconomic and political uncertainties, and has revised the 2025 target downwards to $120,000 from an initial $185,000. Despite short-term challenges and a bear market, Bitcoin's decreasing volatility and growing institutional engagement are noted as positive long-term trends.

feed.title: Bitfarms Stock (BITF) in Focus on Dec. 22, 2025: S&P/TSX Composite Addition, AI Data Center Pivot, and Updated Analyst Forecasts
feed.summary: Bitfarms Ltd. (NASDAQ: BITF; TSX: BITF) is gaining attention due to its addition to the S&P/TSX Composite Index, a strategic pivot towards high-performance computing (HPC) and AI data center infrastructure from traditional Bitcoin mining, and recent analyst forecast revisions. The company is actively building its AI data center thesis, converting a Washington facility for HPC/AI workloads, and has secured significant financing to support its infrastructure development. While near-term earnings are influenced by mining realities, analysts are optimistic about the long-term potential from its AI-focused transformation.

feed.title: The9 Limited reports $9.5 million net loss for first half of 2025
feed.summary: The9 Limited (NASDAQ:NCTY) reported an unaudited net loss of $9.5 million for the first half of 2025, despite revenues of $8.7 million, primarily from cryptocurrency mining and online game services. The company faced significant operating expenses, an impairment loss on an equity investment, and other financial deductions, resulting in a net loss of $0.01 per share. As of June 30, 2025, The9 Limited held $5.0 million in cash and cash equivalents, with total assets of $99.6 million.

feed.title: China-based firm teams with EOS ecosystem on $3B crypto custody push
feed.summary: Jiuzi Holdings (JZXN) has signed a cooperation agreement with EXSAT.NETWORK LTD, the core ecosystem organization of EOS, to develop a cryptocurrency custody business targeting up to $3 billion. This collaboration aims to establish an institutional-grade custody model with multi-signature, distributed custody, and on-chain transparent auditing. Jiuzi views this partnership as a strategic milestone in its "New Energy + FinTech + Digital Asset" strategy, expecting it to enhance its global position and long-term growth.

feed.title: Jiuzi Holdings And Exsat.Network Ltd Sign Cooperation Agreement To Jointly Explore And Develop A $3 Billion Cryptocurrency Custody Business
feed.summary: Jiuzi Holdings Inc (JZXN) and Exsat.Network Ltd have signed a cooperation agreement aimed at jointly exploring and developing a cryptocurrency custody business. This partnership targets a potential $3 billion market in the cryptocurrency custody sector. The announcement highlights a strategic move into the digital asset space for both companies.

feed.title: Jiuzi Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: JZXN) and EXSAT.NETWORK LTD Sign Cooperation Agreement to Jointly Explore and Develop a $3 Billion Cryptocurrency Custody Business
feed.summary: Jiuzi Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: JZXN) has signed a cooperation agreement with EXSAT.NETWORK LTD to explore and develop a $3 billion cryptocurrency custody business. This partnership leverages EXSAT NETWORK's expertise in public chains and security to establish an institutional-grade custody model with compliance operations, aiming to enhance Jiuzi Holdings' global position in the digital asset space. The collaboration is expected to drive significant growth and revaluation for Jiuzi Holdings' stock.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Provides Clarifying Update on Share Ownership and Depository Imbalances and Outlines Next Steps and Announces Resignation of Director
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies issued a clarifying update on share ownership and depository imbalances, as requested by the Ontario Securities Commission. The company has identified persistent discrepancies in share positions reported by broker-dealers and is working to reconcile these issues, though it believes these imbalances did not impact the 2025 shareholder meeting voting results. Additionally, the company announced the immediate resignation of director Stefan Hascoet.

feed.title: Galaxy Digital sees Bitcoin reaching $250,000 by 2027
feed.summary: Alex Thorn, head of firmwide research at Galaxy Digital, predicts Bitcoin could hit $250,000 by the end of 2027, representing a potential 179% increase. This forecast is based on growing institutional access, broader macroeconomic shifts, easing monetary policy, and rising demand for assets that hedge against currency debasement. Thorn also highlighted decreasing long-term volatility and a shift in Bitcoin’s volatility skew as signs of asset maturation.

feed.title: Multiple Stock Index Providers May Exclude Bitcoin-Holding Companies Following MSCI's Lead
feed.summary: MSCI is considering excluding companies holding digital assets exceeding 50% of total assets from its global benchmarks, potentially impacting Bitcoin-accumulating firms like Strategy and leading to billions in investment outflows. This move, which Saini predicts other index providers will follow, could reshape the digital asset treasury sector and raise the cost of capital for Bitcoin treasury companies. The final decision is expected by January 15th.

feed.title: 21Shares Solana ETF adds new authorized participant agreement
feed.summary: This article reports that 21Shares has added a new authorized participant agreement for its Solana ETF. The announcement signifies an expansion in the operational framework and liquidity provisions for the investment product. Specific details about the new participant are not provided in this very brief content.

feed.title: New patents aim to remake how digital creators get paid on blockchain worldwide
feed.summary: Datavault AI (NASDAQ: DVLT) has secured two U.S. patents for blockchain-based content licensing and tokenized monetization, strengthening its intellectual property portfolio. These patents advance the company's Sumerian Crypto Anchors, DataScore, and DataValue AI agents, enabling the tokenization of intellectual property and real-world assets with quantum-resistant encryption. This development positions Datavault AI at the forefront of the converging digital content, data monetization, and real-world asset tokenization markets, aiming to create tamper-proof revenue sharing and global liquidity for assets.

feed.title: Flputnam Investment Management Co. Trims Position in First Trust Indxx Innovative Transaction & Process ETF $LEGR
feed.summary: Flputnam Investment Management Co. reduced its stake in the First Trust Indxx Innovative Transaction & Process ETF (NASDAQ:LEGR) by 26.4% in the third quarter, bringing their total holdings to 69,198 shares valued at $3.89 million. Other institutional investors like Ameriprise Financial, Twin Peaks Wealth Advisors, and Jane Street Group have also adjusted their positions in LEGR, which focuses on companies involved in blockchain technology. The ETF recently announced an increased quarterly dividend of $0.2611 per share.

feed.title: K Wave Media plans tokenized K-content profits and renews Bitcoin push
feed.summary: K Wave Media (KWM) announced SEC clearance for a resale registration statement, which it believes reopens capital-raising and allows it to resume its Bitcoin Treasury Plan. The company also anticipates closing its Rabbit Walk acquisition, projecting a 25-30% revenue boost, and continues developing its K-IP STO platform, for which 44 IP holders have signed MOUs. CEO Ted Kim emphasized these developments will accelerate growth and shareholder value.

feed.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Honeywell, Strategy, Oracle & more
feed.summary: This article details several companies experiencing significant premarket stock movements. Honeywell fell due to a large one-time charge, while crypto-related stocks like Strategy and Mara Holdings rose as Bitcoin gained. Oracle saw gains after Wells Fargo reiterated an "overweight" rating, and Ollie's Bargain Outlet rose following an upgrade from Loop Capital.

feed.title: WISeKey Issues Year-End CEO Letter to Shareholders

feed.title: MSCI Considering Removing Companies With High Crypto Holdings From Its Major Indexes
feed.summary: MSCI is contemplating the exclusion of companies with significant cryptocurrency holdings from its major indexes if digital assets constitute over 50% of their total assets, a move primarily targeting "digital asset treasury" firms like MicroStrategy (MSTR/Strategy). This potential reclassification is driven by concerns that these companies function more as investment funds than traditional operating businesses. While MicroStrategy retained its spot in the Nasdaq 100, a final decision from MSCI is expected by January 15, 2026, which could lead to substantial passive outflows from index-tracking funds if implemented.

These approvals include changing the company's name, creating a new class of preferred shares, amending its 2022 Incentive Compensation Plan, approving stock option grants for executives, and approving the issuance of Common Shares related to private placement transactions and a possible future forward stock split. The company is positioning itself as a decentralized AI treasury firm investing in AI infrastructure through the $0G token, while also maintaining its pharmaceutical distribution business.

feed.title: Shareholders back plan to turn Flora Growth into ZeroStack, tied to AI crypto
feed.summary: Flora Growth shareholders approved nine proposals, including rebranding the company to ZeroStack Corp. and amending its 2022 Incentive Compensation Plan to align with its new focus on decentralized AI through the $0G token. These approvals formalize the company's shift away from its cannabis business and towards an AI-focused capital structure, including provisions for a future stock split.

feed.title: Hyperscale Data Announces "At-the-Market" Offering of Common Stock
feed.summary: Hyperscale Data, Inc. (NYSE American: GPUS) has announced an "at-the-market" equity offering program to sell up to $50 million in common stock. The company plans to use the majority of the net proceeds to acquire Bitcoin and develop its Michigan data facility, with a smaller portion allocated for working capital and general corporate purposes. The offering will be conducted through Spartan Capital Securities, LLC.

feed.title: Crypto miner chip firm AGM Group raises $500K in new convertible note
feed.summary: AGM Group Holdings Inc. (AGMH) announced a subsequent closing of a convertible promissory note offering, raising $425,000 in gross proceeds from a $500,000 note. This closing is part of a larger $6 million original-issue-discount convertible advances program, with the first tranche totaling $2 million to be issued in two installments. The convertible notes may lead to future share dilution for existing shareholders.

feed.title: Grayscale Rolls Out Ethereum Covered Call ETF ($ETCO)
feed.summary: Grayscale has launched the Grayscale Ethereum Covered Call ETF ($ETCO) to generate income for investors by capitalizing on Ethereum's volatility through a covered call strategy. This ETF, which distributes bi-weekly dividends, aims to provide an income component to existing Ethereum exposure and joins Grayscale's growing suite of income-focused products such as the Grayscale Premium Income ETF ($BPI) and Grayscale Bitcoin Covered Call ETF ($BTCC). The initiative highlights Grayscale's commitment to offering outcome-oriented products to meet diverse investor needs.

feed.title: Deutsche Bank Appointed as Depositary Bank for the Sponsored American Depositary Receipt Program of Metaplanet Inc.
feed.summary: Deutsche Bank has been appointed as the depositary bank for Metaplanet Inc.'s American Depositary Receipt (ADR) program. Metaplanet (OTC: MPJPY) is a Japanese Bitcoin treasury company that utilizes Bitcoin as its primary reserve asset and develops Bitcoin-focused business lines. This appointment enables Metaplanet Inc. to access a broader investor base through the ADR program.

feed.title: Forward Industries, Superstate Introduce Tokenized FWDI Public Shares On Solana
feed.summary: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) has announced that its SEC-registered shares are now live on the Solana blockchain through Superstate's Opening Bell platform. This integration allows ex-US holders of FWDI's tokenized shares to use their equity as collateral on Kamino, a Solana lending protocol, marking the first time regulated public equity can be used as collateral within a live DeFi market. Superstate's Opening Bell facilitates the tokenization of SEC-registered shares, providing programmable, always-on ownership directly connected to the digital-asset economy.

feed.title: Forward Industry Becomes First Company to Allow Borrowing Against their Tokenized Shares
feed.summary: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) has become the first Nasdaq-listed company to tokenize its SEC-registered shares on the Solana blockchain through Superstate's Opening Bell platform. This innovation allows eligible ex-US shareholders to use their tokenized FWDI shares as collateral in decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols, enabling them to borrow stablecoins while retaining stock exposure. This move by Forward Industries is seen as a significant milestone for real-world asset (RWA) tokenization, bridging traditional financial markets with decentralized finance and setting a precedent for other public companies.

feed.title: Virtu Financial (VIRT): Weighing Long-Term Strength Against Recent Weakness in Today’s Valuation
feed.summary: Virtu Financial's (VIRT) recent stock performance has lagged the market this year, despite strong long-term returns over three and five years. The company is currently considered 21.2% undervalued, with a narrative fair value near $40, pointing to a potential gap to close. Its investments in digital assets, new products, and cross-asset services are expected to reduce earnings cyclicality and strengthen its market position, suggesting a fair value of $42.57.

feed.title: Bitcoin price could hit $143,000 in a year, Citi says, citing ETF and regulatory tailwinds
feed.summary: Citigroup projects that Bitcoin (BTC) could reach $143,000 within the next 12 months, driven by increased ETF inflows and positive stock market forecasts, with regulatory catalysts also playing a significant role. The base case forecast assumes Bitcoin finds key support at $70,000, while a bear case could see it drop to $78,500 due to a global recession, and a bull case could push it to $189,000 with increased investor demand. This outlook comes even as Bitcoin's current price is around $88,000.

feed.title: LM Funding America Announces Pricing of Registered Direct Offering for Aggregate Gross Proceeds of $6.5 Million
feed.summary: LM Funding America, Inc. announced a registered direct offering with institutional investors to raise approximately $6.5 million. The offering includes the sale of common stock and pre-funded warrants, along with accompanying warrants to purchase additional common stock. Additionally, the company agreed to reduce the exercise price and extend the term of existing warrants held by an investor.

feed.title: Aether Holdings Appoints Experienced Digital Asset and Capital Markets Executive Wayne Huo as Independent Director
feed.summary: Aether Holdings, a financial technology company, has appointed Wayne Huo as an independent director to its Board. Mr. Huo brings extensive experience in digital assets, capital markets, and public company operations, having co-founded Amber Group and previously served as CEO of its Nasdaq-listed subsidiary. His expertise is expected to guide Aether in product strategy, investor awareness, and integrating AI with data across its platforms.

feed.title: MoneyGram floats stablecoins
feed.summary: MoneyGram is expanding its use of stablecoins for cross-border payments, focusing initially on Latin American countries with volatile economies. The technology operates in the background, pegging customer funds to the U.S. dollar to protect against local currency fluctuations, and is expected to expand to six more countries next year. CEO Anthony Soohoo believes stablecoins will be a major industry theme, particularly following the enactment of the Genius Act, which establishes a regulatory framework.

feed.title: Wellgistics Health Reminds Shareholders of December 19, 2025 Record Date for Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin Tokens
feed.summary: Wellgistics Health, Inc. (NASDAQ:WGRX) reminded shareholders of the December 19, 2025 record date for receiving Dream Bowl 2026 Meme Coin tokens. Eligible shareholders will receive one Dream Bowl token for every share of common stock owned, with distribution details to follow. The tokens are described as digital assets not conferring ownership or economic rights in the company.

feed.title: OFA Group subsidiary enters beta testing for RWA launchpad platform By Investing.com
feed.summary: OFA Group's wholly-owned subsidiary, Hearth Labs, Inc., has started beta testing its real-world asset (RWA) launchpad platform for blockchain infrastructure development. The micro-cap company, with a market value of $8.89 million, aims to provide a structured and compliant entry point for real-world assets into blockchain-based ecosystems. A white paper detailing the platform's technical architecture and compliance framework is expected within 30-45 days.

feed.title: JPMorgan Chase Stock (JPM) News Today: Price Jumps as Rate-Cut Bets Return, Analysts Recalibrate 2026 Outlook
feed.summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (JPM) stock rose today as investors reassess 2026 rate-cut expectations, driving optimism despite concerns over the bank's rising expenses. Analysts are recalibrating their 2026 outlooks, with a key debate centering on whether revenue growth and capital returns can offset increased spending on strategic investments. The bank's digital asset initiatives and upcoming Q4 and full-year 2025 earnings report on January 13, 2026, are also significant factors influencing investor sentiment.

feed.title: SRN Advisors, LLC Announces Changes to Investment Objective, Principal Investment Strategies and Name for the Siren Nasdaq NexGen Economy ETF (BLCN)
feed.summary: SRN Advisors, LLC (SRN) announced that effective December 29, 2025, the Siren Nasdaq NexGen Economy ETF (BLCN) will undergo significant changes. The Fund's investment objective will shift from tracking the Nasdaq Blockchain Economy Index to seeking long-term capital appreciation through an actively-managed strategy. Additionally, its name will be changed to the Siren NexGen Economy ETF.

feed.title: BitMine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) Stock News and Forecast: ETH Treasury Expansion, Proxy Vote, and What to Watch on Dec. 19, 2025
feed.summary: BitMine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) is facing significant investor attention due to its rapid Ethereum (ETH) treasury expansion, a pivotal proxy vote to authorize 50 billion shares, and ongoing controversies. The company's strategy revolves around massive ETH accumulation and developing staking infrastructure, while analysts offer varied but generally positive outlooks despite high stock volatility and dilution risks. Key upcoming dates include a dividend payment, the annual meeting with the critical share authorization vote, and the CFO's separation date.

feed.title: Arrow Electronics Joins Hedera Council to Advance Supply Chain Solutions
feed.summary: Arrow Electronics (NYSE: ARW) has joined the Hedera Council to support decentralized governance of the Hedera Network and develop a global supply chain initiative focused on standards and efficiency. Arrow plans to explore a DLT-based supply chain use case on Hedera to enhance visibility, automated compliance, and predictive logistics. This collaboration aims to leverage Arrow's expertise to drive enterprise-grade solutions on the Hedera network.

feed.title: Wall Street bank JPMorgan says stablecoin market could grow to $600 billion by 2028
feed.summary: JPMorgan projects the stablecoin market could reach $500 billion to $600 billion by 2028, a more conservative estimate than others. The bank notes that stablecoin demand is currently driven primarily by crypto trading rather than payments, although payments adoption is expected to increase velocity. JPMorgan also highlights that banks and CBDCs could offer alternative solutions, potentially limiting private stablecoin growth.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies inicia negociação de BDRs na B3
feed.summary: DeFi Technologies, uma empresa de tecnologia financeira, começou a negociar BDRs (Brazilian Depositary Receipts) na B3, a bolsa brasileira. Esses BDRs representam frações das ações da companhia, negociadas em bolsas como Nasdaq, Cboe Canada e Frankfurt, e permitem que investidores institucionais e qualificados no Brasil acessem as ações ordinárias da DeFi Technologies localmente. A iniciativa se alinha à crescente demanda por ativos digitais no Brasil e oferece uma forma familiar e segura para investidores locais diversificarem suas carteiras com ativos internacionais.

feed.title: Forward Industries (FWDI) Stock: SEC-Registered Shares Go Live on Solana Blockchain
feed.summary: Forward Industries has launched its SEC-registered shares on the Solana blockchain through Superstate's Opening Bell platform, making it the first public equity directly usable in decentralized finance. These tokenized FWDI shares can serve as collateral on the Kamino lending protocol, allowing investors to borrow stablecoins while maintaining their equity exposure. The initiative is bolstered by Forward Industries' Solana treasury strategy, supported by major investors like Galaxy Digital, Jump Crypto, and Multicoin Capital.

feed.title: Aether Holdings, Inc. Appoints Wayne Huo to Board of Directors to Enhance Product Strategy and Governance
feed.summary: Aether Holdings, Inc. has named Wayne Huo to its Board of Directors, bringing extensive expertise in digital assets and capital markets. Huo, a co-founder of Amber Group, will help refine product strategy, boost investor engagement through AI, and guide governance. This appointment is expected to strengthen Aether's mission to provide data-driven solutions for investors.

feed.title: SoFi Technologies (SOFI) Stock Jumps on SoFiUSD Stablecoin Launch: Today’s News, Forecasts, and Investor Takeaways (Dec. 19, 2025)
feed.summary: SoFi Technologies (SOFI) stock saw a 4% daily gain on December 19, 2025, following the announcement of SoFiUSD, a U.S. dollar-pegged stablecoin issued by SoFi Bank. This move positions SoFi as a stablecoin infrastructure provider, aiming to monetize 24/7 money movement and expand its financial infrastructure business. The launch coincides with new stablecoin regulations, and analysts generally project price targets in the mid-to-high $20s for SOFI stock, though valuations vary widely.

feed.title: SoFi Technologies (SOFI) Stock After Hours: SoFiUSD Stablecoin Launch Sparks a Thursday Jump—What to Know Before Friday’s Open (Dec. 19, 2025)
feed.summary: SoFi Technologies (NASDAQ: SOFI) saw a 4.04% jump on Thursday following its announcement of the SoFiUSD stablecoin, issued by SoFi Bank, N.A. This stablecoin is being positioned as an infrastructure layer for banks, fintechs, and enterprise partners, rather than just a retail speculation product. While the stock's after-hours performance was quiet, suggesting the news was largely priced in, investors are now looking for concrete details on its retail rollout timeline and enterprise partner integrations.

feed.title: USBC updates digital asset management agreement with Hyrcanian Asset Management
feed.summary: USBC, Inc. has updated its digital asset management agreement with Hyrcanian Asset Management, LLC, clarifying terms for discretionary treasury management services related to USBC's Bitcoin treasury strategy. The amended agreement replaces a previous arrangement, though specific details of the changes were not disclosed. This move comes amid other significant company developments, including a COO departure, option repricing, and recent board and equity incentive plan approvals, while USBC faces a concerning current ratio of 0.03.

feed.title: Bitcoin miner LM Funding raises $6.5M in stock and warrant sale to investors
feed.summary: LM Funding America (NASDAQ: LMFA) announced a registered direct offering to raise approximately $6.5 million gross, selling shares and various warrants to institutional investors. The offering includes 1,822,535 shares, 7,332,395 pre-funded warrants, and warrants for up to 9,154,930 shares at a combined effective price of $0.71. Additionally, existing investor warrants for 3,472,740 shares will have their exercise price reduced from $2.95 to $0.87, and their term extended to five years, subject to stockholder approval.

feed.title: USBC Signs Amended And Restated Digital Asset Management Agreement With Hyrcanian Asset Management
feed.summary: USBC has signed an Amended and Restated Digital Asset Management Agreement with Hyrcanian Asset Management. This agreement aims to update and clarify how Hyrcanian provides discretionary treasury management services for USBC’s Bitcoin treasury strategy. The revisions are expected to improve clarity, controls, and alignment with USBC's treasury objectives.

feed.title: USBC (NYSE: USBC) amends Bitcoin treasury management agreement with Hyrcanian
feed.summary: USBC, Inc. (NYSE: USBC) has updated its Digital Asset Management Agreement with Hyrcanian Asset Management, LLC on December 12, 2025. This amendment clarifies and restates the terms under which Hyrcanian will provide discretionary treasury management services for USBC's Bitcoin holdings. The 8-K filing indicates that while the terms are revised, Hyrcanian will continue to manage USBC's Bitcoin treasury strategy, with no specific financial amounts disclosed in this regulatory report.

feed.title: How a shipping container maker jumped into AI power and data centers
feed.summary: Safe & Green Holdings (SGBX) has acquired Giant Containers, a custom modular shipping container manufacturer, in a cash and stock deal. This acquisition strengthens Safe & Green's capabilities in areas like containerized power generation and data centers, aligning with the growing demand for AI-driven power. Giant Containers brings an established customer base and a significant project pipeline, positioning Safe & Green to control its supply chain from subsurface to end user.

feed.title: WhiteFiber surges on securing $865 mln data center deal
feed.summary: WhiteFiber (WYFI) shares rose over 23% in premarket trading after the AI infrastructure company announced a 10-year, $865 million co-location agreement with cloud services provider Nscale. This deal secures the first 40 megawatt delivery for WhiteFiber's NC-1 data center campus. WhiteFiber, spun off from crypto firm Bit Digital (BTBT), went public in August and its stock is rated highly by analysts.

feed.title: Why a wellness company is rolling out a $100M Solana crypto treasury
feed.summary: Mangoceuticals, a health and wellness company, announced a partnership with Cube Group to launch an up to $100 million Solana-focused digital asset treasury (DAT) strategy. This initiative aims for high-yield opportunities, targeting 7-8% APY for staked assets and 8-20% APY for actively managed assets, marking a significant diversification beyond its traditional telehealth offerings. The company plans to use its existing shelf registration and potentially ATM equity offerings to fund the accumulation of Solana tokens, though full funding is not guaranteed.

feed.title: Mangoceuticals Signs Master Services Agreement With Cube
feed.summary: Mangoceuticals (MGRX) has signed a Master Services Agreement with Cube to utilize Cube’s digital asset platform for discretionary asset management of Solana tokens for its subsidiary, Mango DAT. The agreement includes a tiered monthly management fee plus an annual management fee based on assets under management. This arrangement allows Mango DAT to manage its Solana token holdings and potentially other digital assets through Cube’s expertise.

feed.title: Core Scientific (CORZ) Gets 7.3% Boost from ‘Buy’ Reco
feed.summary: Core Scientific Inc. (NASDAQ:CORZ) saw its stock jump 7.30% after investment firm Citizens issued a "buy" recommendation and a $30 price target, representing a 106% upside potential. The upgrade reflects confidence in the company's growth prospects for 2026, particularly its pipeline for high-performance computing leasing agreements beyond CoreWeave. Despite previous merger termination with CoreWeave, Core Scientific improved its third-quarter net loss by 68%.

feed.title: Forward Industries (FWDI) Stock: Company Launches SEC-Registered Shares on Solana Blockchain
feed.summary: Forward Industries (FWDI) has launched its SEC-registered shares on the Solana blockchain via Superstate’s Opening Bell platform, making it the first public company equity directly usable in Decentralized Finance (DeFi). These tokenized shares can now act as collateral on Kamino, a Solana lending protocol, allowing investors to borrow stablecoins while retaining equity exposure. The company previously initiated a Solana treasury strategy in September 2025, supported by major investors, to acquire SOL and increase SOL-per-share value.

feed.title: How Ragnarok's classic MMO just added crypto loot and real ownership
feed.summary: Maxion Tech has officially launched Ragnarok Online Landverse America, bringing the classic MMORPG into the Web3 world with blockchain-based item ownership, NFTs, and a player-driven economy. This launch, licensed from GRAVITY Co., Ltd. (NasdaqGM: GRVY), follows pre-registration and pre-sale events and includes various community activities and a limited-time "Welcome Adventure Pack" for new players. The initiative aims to integrate modern blockchain technology with the nostalgic charm of Ragnarok while expanding its global presence.

feed.title: The US spot Solana ETF saw a net inflow of $13.16 million yesterday, while the spot XRP ETF recorded a net inflow of $30.41 million.
feed.summary: On December 18th, the US spot Solana ETF experienced a net inflow of $13.16 million, while the spot XRP ETF saw a larger net inflow of $30.41 million. These figures, reported by Jinse Finance based on SoSoValue data, highlight significant investor interest in these cryptocurrency-backed ETFs. The original article includes current pricing for popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana.

feed.title: LM Funding capta US$ 6,5 milhões por meio de oferta direta registrada
feed.summary: LM Funding America, Inc. (NASDAQ:LMFA), a Bitcoin mining company, successfully raised approximately $6.5 million through a registered direct offering with institutional investors. The offering includes common shares and pre-funded warrants, with an effective combined price of $0.71 per share or pre-funded warrant. This capital raise comes amidst a challenging year for the company, with its stock down 67.3% year-to-date, and follows recent reports of increased revenue and expanded Bitcoin mining capabilities in Q3 2025.

feed.title: LM Funding stock falls after announcing $6.5 million registered offering
feed.summary: LM Funding America Inc (NASDAQ:LMFA) stock dropped 17% after announcing a registered direct offering to raise approximately $6.5 million. The offering includes selling common stock and pre-funded warrants, which could dilute existing shareholders' stakes. The company also agreed to reduce the exercise price on outstanding warrants and extend their term, subject to stockholder approval.

feed.title: Penny Stocks To Watch Now – December 17th
feed.summary: This article identifies seven penny stocks to watch, characterized by high dollar trading volume and prices typically under $5 per share. The listed penny stocks span various sectors, including ETFs, cannabis, biopharmaceuticals, pet wellness, AI-powered mobile commerce, cryptocurrency mining, and robotics.

feed.title: Leveraged Solana Bets Cool as 2x Solana ETF Sees Fresh Outflows
feed.summary: The 2x Solana ETF (SOLT) experienced net outflows of $1,390,872 on December 16, 2025, suggesting a cooling of leveraged Solana bets after a volatile quarter for the cryptocurrency. This outflow represents a small portion of the fund's $305.4 million AUM but indicates a waning risk appetite, especially as Solana's spot price (SOL-USD) has dropped significantly, influencing traders to de-risk rather than "buy the dip." Despite the outflows, SOLT maintains a substantial investor base, underscoring continued demand for high-exposure Solana products.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Completes Strategic Capital Structure Optimization to Support Institutional Growth and Digital Asset Strategy
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. (NASDAQ:BNKK) has completed a 1-for-35 reverse stock split, effective December 11, 2025, as a final step in its transformation into a digital asset holding company. This move aims to align its capital structure with its new revenue-generating business model, attract institutional investors, and ensure continued compliance with Nasdaq listing requirements. The company has focused on eliminating debt, acquiring a majority interest in Bonk.fun, and building a significant treasury of BONK digital assets.

feed.title: LM Funding America Announces Pricing of Registered Direct Offering for Aggregate Gross Proceeds of $6.5 Million
feed.summary: LM Funding America, Inc. has announced a registered direct offering to institutional investors, raising approximately $6.5 million in gross proceeds. The offering includes common stock and pre-funded warrants, alongside warrants to purchase additional common stock. The company also agreed to reduce the exercise price and extend the term of outstanding warrants held by an investor, subject to stockholder approval.

feed.title: Mangoceuticals, Inc. Announces Partnership with The Cube
feed.summary: Mangoceuticals, Inc. announced a partnership with Cube Group to launch a Solana-focused digital asset treasury (DAT) strategy worth up to $100 million. This initiative aims to leverage high-yield opportunities within the Solana ecosystem to drive sustainable, non-dilutive growth for shareholders. The company has also filed a trademark for "MULTI-DAT" and plans to use its NASDAQ-listed vehicle to offer investors direct exposure to Solana.

feed.title: Mangoceuticals, Inc. Announces Partnership with The Cube Group to Launch Up To $100 Million Solana-Focused Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) Strategy
feed.summary: Mangoceuticals, Inc. has partnered with Cube Group to launch a Solana-focused Digital Asset Treasury (DAT) strategy worth up to $100 million. feed.title: How Freedom Holding Corp. Is Scaling Its Business Beyond Kazakhstan
feed.summary: Freedom Holding Corp. is expanding its business beyond Kazakhstan by transferring its digital ecosystem, including banking, investment, payments, insurance, and telecommunications services, into new jurisdictions like Turkey, Georgia, Tajikistan, and European countries. The company focuses on adapting its proven model to local conditions while preserving its technological core, rather than aggressively acquiring assets. Their strategy emphasizes sustainable growth through methodical integration of services, often leveraging a super-app approach.

feed.title: Hut 8 bets on AI infrastructure with 245-megawatt Louisiana data centre deal
feed.summary: Hut 8 Corp. (NASDAQ: HUT) (TSE: HUT) is accelerating its push into artificial intelligence infrastructure with a roughly USD$7 billion deal to lease and develop a 245-megawatt data center in Louisiana. This move reflects a broader industry shift among former cryptocurrency miners toward hosting AI workloads, leveraging high-voltage power access and advanced cooling systems. The project involves partnerships with AI model developer Anthropic and infrastructure firm Fluidstack, with Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ: GOOGL) providing a financial backstop for the 15-year lease.

feed.title: Understanding Momentum Shifts in (BITQ)

feed.summary: The US spot BTC ETF market experienced a significant net outflow of $161 million yesterday, according to AiCoin monitoring, with FBTC seeing the largest outflow at $170 million, followed by ARKB with $12.3 million. AiCoin's tracking strategy suggests a positive correlation between ETF fund inflows and BTC price, offering automatic order placement based on these flows. This data is provided for reference only and does not constitute investment advice.

feed.title: For the first time, public company stock can be used as DeFi collateral
