feed.title: OFA Group Enters Beta Testing Phase for Hearth Labs’ Real-World Asset Launchpad Platform
feed.summary: OFA Group's subsidiary, Hearth Labs, Inc., has initiated the beta testing phase for its real-world asset (RWA) launchpad platform. This platform aims to provide a structured, compliant entry point for RWAs into blockchain ecosystems, with a full rollout expected after testing and the release of a comprehensive white paper. The initiative represents a key milestone in OFA Group’s digital-asset and blockchain infrastructure strategy.

feed.title: ETHA vs. ETHV: iShares Ethereum ETF Beats VanEck Size-Wise
feed.summary: This article compares two spot Ethereum ETFs, the VanEck Ethereum ETF (ETHV) and the iShares Ethereum Trust ETF (ETHA), highlighting their differences in assets under management (AUM), expense ratios, and custodians. While ETHV offers a slightly lower expense ratio, ETHA significantly dominates in AUM and trading volume, making it more liquid. Both ETFs track Ethereum's price and launched after the SEC approved spot Ethereum ETFs, with Coinbase and Gemini serving as their respective custodians.

feed.title: New federal bank charter lets a Bitcoin tool reach every US state
feed.summary: Fold Holdings (NASDAQ: FLD) has gained nationwide access across all 50 U.S. states for its Bitcoin financial services following a strategic partnership with BitGo Bank & Trust. This was enabled by BitGo's approval as a federally chartered bank by the OCC on December 18, 2025, allowing Fold to operate under a single, federally supervised trust framework, replacing fragmented state-by-state restrictions. This expansion facilitates access to Fold’s Bitcoin Gift Card and supports the rollout of the Fold Bitcoin Credit Card, including in previously restricted markets like New York.

feed.title: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) Enables SEC-Registered Equity to Be Used in DeFi via Solana
feed.summary: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) has announced that its SEC-registered shares are now live on the Solana blockchain through Superstate's Opening Bell platform. This integration allows tokenized FWDI shares to be used as collateral on Kamino, a Solana-based lending protocol, for eligible ex-U.S. holders. This groundbreaking move marks the first time a public company's equity can be directly utilized within decentralized finance, distinguishing itself from synthetic tokenized stock models by direct tokenization of Forward's Class A Common Stock.

feed.title: Marquis Who's Who Honors Charles W. Barrett for Expertise in Business Analytics and Financial Technology
feed.summary: Marquis Who's Who has recognized Charles W. Barrett, a senior business financial analyst at PNC Financial Services Group Inc., for his significant contributions to business analytics and financial technology. With over two decades of experience, Barrett is an expert in data analytics, advanced financial systems, and emerging digital technologies, particularly blockchain. He is committed to educating institutions on tokenization, Web3 banking, and AI-enhanced transactions to help them navigate the digital finance era.

feed.title: Micron Technology stock jumps on earnings, and other early movers
feed.summary: Micron Technology (MU) shares jumped nearly 10% after exceeding analyst revenue and profit expectations and providing upbeat guidance. Lululemon Athletica (LULU) rose over 4% on news that activist investor Elliott accumulated a stake over $1 billion. Conversely, Instacart (CART) shares fell 7% amid an FTC probe into its AI pricing tool, while Rivian Automotive (RIVN) climbed 4% following an upgrade and price target increase from Baird. Coinbase Global (COIN) was up nearly 3% after announcing a partnership with Kalshi.

feed.title: Is Bit Digital’s (BTBT) New Crypto-Savvy Board Mix Quietly Rewriting Its Ethereum Risk-Reward Story?
feed.summary: Bit Digital (BTBT) is adapting its board with crypto executive Amanda Cassatt joining, coinciding with an expansion of its Ethereum holdings and staking activity. This move could redefine the company's investment narrative and risk profile, as it increasingly pivots from Bitcoin mining to an Ethereum treasury and staking business. The company's future growth hinges on scaling staked ETH and managing liquidity, with an emphasis on how new governance and crypto expertise will shape its evolving business model.

feed.title: 21Shares Solana ETF On Dec 16 Entered Into A New Authorized Participant Agreement With Macquarie Capital (Usa) Inc
feed.summary: The 21Shares Solana ETF (TSOL) announced that it entered into a new Authorized Participant Agreement with Macquarie Capital (USA) Inc. This agreement was finalized on December 16, 2025. This development is significant for the ETF's operational structure, indicating expanded participation from financial institutions.

feed.title: Intuit Teams Up With Circle To Leverage Stablecoins
feed.summary: Intuit (NASDAQ: INTU) has announced a partnership with Circle Internet Group, Inc. (NYSE: CRCL) to integrate stablecoin technology into its financial services platform. This collaboration aims to utilize Circle's stablecoin infrastructure and USDC to enable lower-cost and programmable money movement across Intuit's offerings, enhancing services like refunds, remittances, savings, and payments. Both companies express a shared commitment to building a more efficient financial system using stablecoins, leveraging Intuit's extensive reach in taxes, credit, and cash flow management.

feed.title: Black Titan Outlines DAT+ Risk Management Pillar Focused on Diversification and Institutional Oversight
feed.summary: Black Titan Corporation (NASDAQ:BTTC) released the second pillar of its DAT+ strategic framework, focusing on a structured, institutional approach to risk evaluation and diversified asset assessment. This pillar emphasizes governance quality, technical resilience, liquidity stability, and economic sustainability across various digital assets. Co-CEO Czhang Lin stated that the risk pillar provides a disciplined framework for evaluating digital assets within an institutional context, highlighting diversification and structural resilience as central considerations.

feed.title: 21Shares Solana ETF Signs Authorized Participant Agreement With Macquarie Capital (USA)
feed.summary: 21Shares Solana ETF (TSOL) has entered an Authorized Participant Agreement with Macquarie Capital (USA) to enhance ETF liquidity through in-kind creations and redemptions. The agreement, effective December 16, 2025, allows for the creation and redemption of 10,000-share Baskets and includes customary indemnification provisions. This partnership is designed to expand the ETF's trading efficiency.

feed.title: Forward Industries (FWDI) Enables SEC-Registered Equity to Be Used in DeFi via Solana
feed.summary: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) has announced that its SEC-registered shares are now available on the Solana blockchain through Superstate's Opening Bell platform, allowing tokenized FWDI shares to be used as collateral on Kamino, a Solana-based lending protocol. This integration marks the first time a public company's equity can be directly utilized in decentralized finance, enabling eligible ex-U.S. holders to borrow stablecoins against their equity while maintaining exposure to FWDI stock. The company highlighted that this initiative, supported by real-time price feeds from Pyth, establishes a foundation for expanded onchain equity functionality and offers existing shareholders the option to hold their shares on Solana.

feed.title: Perfect Timing: Bonk, Inc.'s Acquisition of Majority Interest in BONK.fun Immediately Validated by $1.36 Million Revenue Surge
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. successfully acquired a 51% majority revenue interest in the BONK.fun platform just weeks before it experienced a massive surge, generating $1.36 million in revenue within 14 days. This strategic timing allowed Bonk, Inc. to capture significant economic upside for its shareholders, as the platform's annualized revenue run rate now exceeds its implied asset valuation. The company credits this achievement to strategic execution based on deep ecosystem intelligence in the volatile digital asset markets.

feed.title: Michael Saylor & The Ultimate Bitcoin Strategy
feed.summary: This podcast episode features a discussion between Alex Thorn and Michael Saylor, Strategy Chairman and Founder, covering Strategy's transition into a digital credit issuer, the future of digital banking, and the intersection of Bitcoin and AI. They also reflect on changes in government, markets, and Strategy since Saylor's previous appearance on Galaxy Brains in December 2024. The conversation was recorded on December 16, 2025.

feed.title: Applied Digital Sets Fiscal Second Quarter 2026 Conference Call for Wednesday, January 7, 2026, at 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time
feed.summary: Applied Digital Corporation (Nasdaq: APLD) will host a conference call on Wednesday, January 7, 2026, at 5:00 p.m. Eastern Time to discuss its operations and financial results for the fiscal second quarter ended November 30, 2025. A press release detailing these results will be issued after the market closes on the same day. The company management will provide prepared remarks, followed by a question-and-answer period.

feed.title: Coinbase (NASDAQ: COIN) CFO discloses Rule 10b5-1 stock sales
feed.summary: Coinbase Global, Inc.'s CFO, Alesia J. Haas, reported multiple open-market sales of Class A common stock on December 15, 2025. These transactions, executed under a pre-established Rule 10b5-1 trading plan, involved sales at weighted average prices between $264.56 and $268.00 per share. Following these sales, Haas directly owns 78,714 Class A shares.

feed.title: Is Bit Digital’s (BTBT) New Crypto-Savvy Board Mix Quietly Rewriting Its Ethereum Risk-Reward Story?
feed.summary: Bit Digital (BTBT) is undergoing a board reshuffle with director Xiashu "Bill" Xiong resigning, Zhaohui Deng shifting to an independent role, and crypto executive Amanda Cassatt joining. These changes align with the company's increasing focus on Ethereum holdings and staking activities, signaling an evolving business model. Investors should consider how this new governance and crypto expertise might influence Bit Digital's Ethereum-centric investment narrative, especially given its concentration risk in a single asset class.

feed.title: AlphaTON Capital Corp Announces Intention to Launch Decentralized AI-Native Biotech Platform Focused on Rare Cancers
feed.summary: AlphaTON Capital Corp (NASDAQ: ATON) has announced its intention to launch a decentralized, AI-native biotech platform focusing on rare and immune-suppressed cancers, beginning with mesothelioma. This privacy-first platform will leverage Telegram distribution and Cocoon AI compute, aiming to accelerate therapeutic discovery and development by learning across institutions without centralizing sensitive patient data. The initiative will start by addressing mesothelioma with practical outputs like biomarker insights and trial design simulations, with plans to evolve into a continuous engine for new drug design.

feed.title: Key facts: MSCI may remove crypto firms from indexes; $15B in sales possible
feed.summary: MSCI is considering the removal of crypto treasury firms from its indexes, a move that could trigger $15 billion in forced crypto asset sales and affect 39 firms with a combined market cap of $113 billion. This decision follows pushback on its Bitcoin exposure proposal, with a final ruling expected by January 15, potentially impacting the February 2026 index review.

feed.title: Intuit (INTU) Stock News Today: Circle USDC Stablecoin Deal, TurboTax Push, and Fresh Wall Street Forecasts (Dec. 18, 2025)
feed.summary: Intuit (INTU) has announced a multi-year partnership with Circle Internet Group to integrate USDC stablecoin capabilities into its TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Credit Karma platforms, aiming for faster and lower-cost money movement. This move, alongside a new consumer tax-season campaign, has positively impacted Intuit's stock, with analysts largely maintaining positive forecasts. The company's strategy positions stablecoins as a foundational element for modernizing financial operations across its ecosystem.

feed.title: Bonk, Inc. Completes Strategic Capital Structure Optimization to Support Institutional Growth and Digital Asset Strategy
feed.summary: Bonk, Inc. has announced a 1-for-35 reverse stock split, effective December 11, 2025, to optimize its capital structure and support its new focus as a digital asset holding company. This move aims to align the share float with its new market cap, attract institutional capital by raising the share price, and ensure Nasdaq compliance and stability. This reverse stock split is the final step in a year-long transformation, including debt elimination and significant digital asset acquisitions.

feed.title: The New York Stock Exchange Owner Wants To Invest In MoonPay
feed.summary: Intercontinental Exchange Inc. (ICE), owner of the New York Stock Exchange, is reportedly negotiating an investment in crypto payments company MoonPay, potentially valuing the firm at $5 billion. This move follows MoonPay strengthening its regulatory position in New York and coincides with the former CFTC acting chair, Caroline Pham, joining the company as chief legal officer. ICE's interest is part of its broader strategy to expand into digital assets.

feed.title: Intuit Partners with Circle to Integrate Stablecoin Infra, USDC Across Its Platform
feed.summary: Intuit, the company behind TurboTax and QuickBooks, has partnered with stablecoin issuer Circle to integrate stablecoin capabilities, specifically USDC, across its platform. This multi-year agreement aims to facilitate faster, lower-cost, and programmable financial transactions for consumers and businesses, making refunds, remittances, payments, and savings more efficient. The move reflects a growing trend in traditional finance exploring stablecoins and blockchain-based payment solutions.

feed.title: Leading Solana treasury Forward Industries tokenized FWDI stock via Superstate
feed.summary: Forward Industries (FWDI), the largest Solana treasury firm, has tokenized its stock onchain using Superstate's Opening Bell platform, making it the first public company's equity directly usable within decentralized finance. This move allows tokenized FWDI to be used as collateral on DeFi lending protocols like Kamino, bridging traditional markets with programmable financial systems. The firm holds approximately 6.8 million SOL tokens, valued around $832 million, significantly more than its peers.

feed.title: Forward Industries brings FWDI shares to Solana: a revolution for decentralized finance
feed.summary: Forward Industries (NASDAQ: FWDI) has made its SEC-registered shares available on the Solana blockchain via Superstate's Opening Bell platform, marking the first instance of a public company's equity being directly used as collateral in decentralized finance (DeFi). This integration allows FWDI tokenized share holders to leverage their equity as collateral on Kamino, a leading Solana lending protocol, enabling them to borrow stablecoins while retaining exposure to their underlying equity. The initiative, supported by Pyth for real-time data, bridges traditional financial markets with programmable digital economies, setting a precedent for new opportunities for investors and publicly traded companies within the DeFi space.

feed.title: DeFi Technologies Shareholder Alert: ClaimsFiler Reminds Investors With Losses In Excess Of $100,000 Of Lead Plaintiff Deadline In Class Action Lawsuits Against DeFi Technologies Inc. - DEFT
feed.summary: ClaimsFiler is reminding investors with losses exceeding $100,000 in DeFi Technologies Inc. (NasdaqCM: DEFT) that they have until January 30, 2026, to file as lead plaintiff in a securities class action lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that DeFi and its executives failed to disclose material information, leading to significant revenue decline and a lowered 2025 forecast, which subsequently caused a drop in the company's share price. Investors affected during the period of May 12, 2025, to November 14, 2025, are encouraged to contact ClaimsFiler or Kahn Swick & Foti, LLC for legal options.

feed.title: OFA Group Enters Beta Testing Phase for Hearth Labs' Real-World Asset Launchpad Platform
feed.summary: OFA Group's subsidiary, Hearth Labs, Inc., has initiated the beta testing phase for its real-world asset (RWA) launchpad platform. This platform aims to provide a structured and compliant entry point for RWAs into blockchain ecosystems, with a full rollout, comprehensive white paper, and detailed project overview expected within 30-45 days. The beta testing focuses on validating core functionalities, security, and operational readiness with a limited group of users.

feed.title: Inside the beta test aiming to bring real-world assets onto blockchains
feed.summary: OFA Group (OFAL) announced its subsidiary Hearth Labs has started beta testing a real-world asset (RWA) launchpad platform on December 18, 2025. This phase focuses on validating smart-contract deployment, asset onboarding, and lifecycle management with internal users and strategic participants. OFA plans a full rollout after beta completion, expecting to publish a detailed white paper within 30-45 days, though timing is subject to development and regulatory considerations.

feed.title: BitMine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) Stock Today: ARK Invest Buys the Dip as BitMine Tops 3.97M ETH — Latest News, Forecasts, and What to Watch (Dec. 18, 2025)
feed.summary: BitMine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) is garnering attention due to ARK Invest's "buy-the-dip" strategy and the company's substantial Ethereum treasury holdings, currently at 3.97 million ETH. The stock displays high volatility, reflecting its sensitivity to Ethereum's price, and faces investor scrutiny over corporate governance changes and a proposed increase in authorized shares. Despite analyst targets suggesting significant upside, the stock's future hinges on crypto market sentiment and effective management of its aggressive treasury strategy.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Inc (CIFR) Stock News Today: Analyst Targets, Insider Filings, Bitcoin Link, and the 2026 AI Data Center Outlook (Dec. 18, 2025)
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (CIFR) is navigating both short-term crypto volatility and a strategic pivot towards AI/HPC data center infrastructure. While the stock experiences choppy trading influenced by Bitcoin, analysts generally maintain a bullish "Moderate Buy" rating, anticipating significant upside from its long-dated contracts with hyperscalers like AWS and Fluidstack. However, insider selling and the company's current unprofitability present risks as it transitions its business model.

feed.title: SoFi Launches Fully Reserved Stablecoin to Power Financial Infrastructure for Banks, Fintechs, and Enterprise Partners
feed.summary: SoFi Technologies (NASDAQ: SOFI) has launched SoFiUSD, a fully reserved U.S. dollar stablecoin issued by SoFi Bank, N.A. This makes SoFi the first national bank to offer open access to its stablecoin and stablecoin infrastructure on a public, permissionless blockchain, providing bank-grade oversight and reliability for financial institutions. SoFiUSD aims to streamline operations with faster, more efficient, and transparent money movement, addressing challenges like slow settlement and fragmented providers.

feed.title: LM Funding America adds 35 PH/s at Oklahoma bitcoin mining site
feed.summary: LM Funding America has activated its Oklahoma bitcoin mining site, bringing 35 petahash per second (PH/s) online. This marks the initial phase of their mining operations, with plans to expand capacity. The company aims to increase its mining footprint and generate revenue from cryptocurrency.

feed.title: Lost Money on DeFi Technologies(DEFT)? Join Class Action Suit Seeking Recovery - Contact The Gross Law Firm
feed.summary: The Gross Law Firm is encouraging shareholders of DeFi Technologies (NASDAQ: DEFT) who purchased shares between May 12, 2025, and November 14, 2025, to join a class action lawsuit. The complaint alleges that DeFi Technologies made materially false and misleading statements regarding its DeFi arbitrage strategy, competition, and revenue guidance, leading to artificial inflation of its stock. The deadline to seek lead plaintiff appointment is January 30, 2026.

feed.title: Intuit and Circle Partner to Unlock the Future of Money Movement with Stablecoins
feed.summary: Intuit and Circle have announced a multi-year strategic partnership to integrate stablecoin technology, specifically USDC, across Intuit's platforms like TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Credit Karma. This collaboration aims to provide faster, lower-cost, and more programmable money movement for millions of consumers and businesses. The partnership leverages Circle's stablecoin infrastructure to enhance financial experiences, including refunds, remittances, savings, and payments, for Intuit's global customer base.

feed.title: House of Doge Issues 2025 Shareholder Letter Highlighting Brag House NASDAQ Merger, Treasury Expansion, Diversified Revenue Strategy, and Payments Ecosystem Development
feed.summary: House of Doge released its 2025 Shareholder Letter, detailing its path toward a NASDAQ listing via a merger with Brag House Holdings, expansion of the Official Dogecoin Treasury to over 730 million DOGE, and increased institutional access to Dogecoin. The company is also developing a multi-pillar revenue strategy, advancing its payments ecosystem with planned B2B and B2C solutions, and making strategic sports investments to support long-term adoption and commercialization of Dogecoin. CEO Marco Margiotta emphasized a shift from foundational building in 2025 to focused execution in 2026, aiming to integrate Dogecoin further into everyday economic activity.

feed.title: Intuit and Circle Partner to Unlock the Future of Money Movement with Stablecoins
feed.summary: Intuit (NASDAQ: INTU) has announced a multi-year strategic partnership with Circle Internet Group, Inc. (NYSE: CRCL) to integrate stablecoin technology into Intuit's financial platforms like TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Credit Karma. feed.title: Aug Shorts: Why Motley Fool Global Opportunities ETF stock is trending on social media - Portfolio Return Summary & High Accuracy Investment Entry Signals
feed.summary: This article is a collection of unrelated snippets, interspersed with repetitive advertisements for a "Stock Market Forecast" promising high returns on a $100 investment. Amidst these ads, it mentions the Motley Fool Global Opportunities ETF trending on social media, recruitment for seabird monitors in China, and results from a men's foil fencing competition. The core content about the ETF is buried under a large volume of irrelevant text and promotional material.

feed.title: Healthcare–Bitcoin hybrid KindlyMD plans stock buybacks
feed.summary: KindlyMD, Inc. (NASDAQ: NAKA), a company combining integrated healthcare services with Bitcoin operations through its subsidiary Nakamoto Holdings, Inc., has announced that its Board of Directors authorized a share repurchase program for its common stock. This program reflects the company's confidence in its long-term value and aims to enhance financial flexibility by repurchasing shares through various means, including open-market and private transactions. Repurchases will adhere to regulatory guidelines like Rule 10b5-1 and Rule 10b-18, with timing and amounts determined by management based on market conditions and other factors.

feed.title: WISeKey and OISTE Foundation Presented During the World Human Rights Concert at the United Nations Headquarters in Geneva
feed.summary: WISeKey and the OISTE Foundation participated in the World Human Rights Concert at the United Nations Headquarters in Geneva, reaffirming their commitment to human dignity and secure digital ecosystems. They launched the HUMAN-AI-T initiative, advocating for AI and Quantum technologies that respect Human Rights and ethical values. This collaboration emphasizes that technology must align with human dignity for a secure and inclusive future.

feed.title: OSL Group Partners with Antalpha to Advance Gold Stablecoin and RWA Ecosystem
feed.summary: OSL Group has partnered with Antalpha to develop a comprehensive "Digital Gold" solution for institutional investors, leveraging OSL's compliant infrastructure and Antalpha's fintech ecosystem. As a first step, OSL has listed Tether Gold (XAUT), the largest gold stablecoin, on its exchanges, enabling professional investors in Hong Kong to trade XAUT/USDT and XAUT/USD. This collaboration aims to innovate compliant financial services using gold stablecoins, including collateralized lending and structured digital asset products.

feed.title: AlphaTON Capital: Capture the Best of Telegram Economics at a Steep Discount – Initiation Report
feed.summary: AlphaTON Capital (NASDAQ: ATON) is presented as an arbitrage opportunity allowing investors to gain exposure to the Telegram ecosystem and Toncoin (TON) at a significant discount. The company holds 1.68 TON per share and is positioning itself as a core infrastructure provider for Telegram's expanding ecosystem, including a substantial investment in AI compute infrastructure for Cocoon AI. This strategy aims to generate high-margin, recurring AI-compute revenue while reinforcing demand for TON.

feed.title: LM Funding America Adds 35 PH/s with Energization of First Oklahoma Immersion Unit
feed.summary: LM Funding America announced the energization of its first BC40 Elite immersion cooled Foghashing unit in Oklahoma, adding approximately 35 Petahash to its energized hashrate. This is the first of two planned units, and the company expects to reach around 780 PH/s by year-end, a 75% increase from 2024. LM Funding remains optimistic about Bitcoin's long-term value, holding 301.8 Bitcoin worth about $27.5 million as of November 30, 2025.

feed.title: Pineapple Financial to Host Fireside Chat on January 8th, 2026, with CEO Shubha Dasgupta and Members of the Injective Foundation
feed.summary: Pineapple Financial Inc. announced it will host a virtual fireside chat on January 8, 2026, at 11:00 A.M. ET. CEO Shubha Dasgupta and members of the Injective Foundation will discuss Pineapple's strategic growth, tokenization milestones, blockchain integration, and their collaboration with Injective to optimize digital asset treasury. Questions can be submitted in advance to Pineapple@KCSA.com.

feed.title: C1 Fund Announces Recent Insider Share Purchases, Reflecting Strong Alignment, Long-Term Confidence
feed.summary: C1 Fund Inc. (NYSE: CFND) announced that several board members and senior leadership have recently purchased additional shares of the Company's common stock in open-market transactions, signaling strong alignment with shareholders and confidence in its long-term strategy. These voluntary purchases, made with personal funds, supplement earlier investments and underscore the leadership's conviction in C1 Fund's approach to backing high-quality, infrastructure-focused digital asset businesses. The company has strategically deployed capital in firms like Kraken, Ripple, and Chainalysis since becoming operational.

feed.title: Why SoFi (SOFI) Stock Is Up Today
feed.summary: SoFi Technologies (NASDAQ:SOFI) shares jumped today after the company launched SoFiUSD, a U.S. dollar-backed stablecoin, positioning itself as an infrastructure provider for other financial entities. This move makes SoFi one of the first national banks to offer its own stablecoin infrastructure, aligning with the growing institutional confidence and clearer regulations for stablecoins. The positive news also follows strong underlying performance, analyst target increases, and a favorable macro environment for growth stocks.

feed.title: Dick's Sporting price deepens losses - Forecast tosay - 18-12-2025
feed.summary: Dick's Sporting Goods Inc. (DKS) is experiencing a decline, trading below its 50-day SMA with negative RSI signals indicating bearish pressure. The forecast suggests further decline, targeting a support level of $197.20 as long as the resistance level at $222.00 holds. This analysis points to a bearish outlook for DKS stock in the near future.

feed.title: The Market Finally Gets It: SMX’s PCT is Creating a New Asset Class
feed.summary: SMX (Security Matters) Public Limited's Plastic Cycle Token (PCT) is gaining recognition as it transforms verified recovery into a measurable economic unit, creating a new asset class. The PCT bridges sustainability and economics by providing traceable and provable recovery data, allowing markets to value and build financial structures around environmental efforts. This innovation offers a framework for investors to reward actual recovery outcomes, shifting recovery from a cost center to a revenue-linked activity supported by transparent data.

feed.title: The Market Finally Gets It: SMX’s PCT is Creating a New Asset Class
feed.summary: SMX (Security Matters) Public Limited, through its Plastic Cycle Token (PCT), is introducing a new asset class based on "verified recovery." The PCT transforms theoretically verified recovery events of materials into a traceable, provable, and digital representation, allowing markets to understand and interact with it. This innovation is resonating with investors as it provides a clear, consistent, and data-driven approach to sustainability, moving recovery from a cost center to a revenue-linked activity with measurable value.

feed.title: DTCC move to tokenize $30T in Treasuries—and why one biotech cares
feed.summary: Tharimmune (THAR) commented on the DTCC and Digital Asset partnership to tokenize U.S. Treasury securities on the Canton Network, highlighting the potential for institutional blockchain adoption. The company established a digital asset treasury strategy in November 2025 with a $545 million private placement, has acquired Canton Coin, and is pursuing roles as a Super Validator and application investor to support the Canton Network's expansion. Tharimmune notes the DTCC custodies ~$30 trillion in U.S. Treasuries and the Canton Network processes $9 trillion in monthly transactions, indicating a significant market opportunity.

feed.title: Argo Blockchain completes restructuring, issues new shares and changes ownership
feed.summary: Argo Blockchain Plc has completed a court-sanctioned restructuring plan, significantly altering its capital structure and ownership. As part of this plan, new shares and ADSs were issued to JPMorgan Chase Bank and Growler Mining Tuscaloosa, LLC, resulting in Growler beneficially owning approximately 87.5% of Argo Blockchain’s outstanding ordinary shares. Additionally, the company's senior notes will be delisted from Nasdaq, and its ordinary shares from the London Stock Exchange.

feed.title: Sequans Communications Announces Completion of ADS Repurchase Program and Approval of New Buyback Authorization
feed.summary: Sequans Communications S.A. has successfully completed its previously authorized ADS repurchase program, repurchasing 1,516,973 American Depositary Shares at an average price of $6.17 per ADS. This move, funded by Bitcoin dispositions, represents approximately 9.7% of outstanding ADSs and generated a 6.1% yield in Bitcoin per outstanding ADS. The Board of Directors has also approved a new program to buy back up to an additional 10% of the company's outstanding ADSs, emphasizing a commitment to enhancing shareholder value and optimizing its Bitcoin treasury strategy.
